I would have sworn there was a carnation note on it, it was what I thought it was not knowing what notes it was supposed to have. Hyacinth and lilac, ok, maybe. But it was, flower fresh and somehow spicy, quite longlasting and just inherently very composed, somehow perfect for every ocasion.

this stuff is amazing, i have a full bottle and it smells just as good if not better than when i bought it, it is a rich deep fragrance that lasts a good 24 hours and that is only using a dab or 2(i decanted in a smaller glass bottle) i am not sure why there are no reviews for this but i would love to swap a few of my wants with someone. i have more fragrances than i have added to my have list mostly older scents. I will get a better review this week and breakdown the scent.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: In a dream future Gucci disc all guilty line and comes back with this one, envy, gucci pour homme and gucci pour homme ii.This would be the best designer line of all times.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Sadly discontinued

This is one of my favourite fragrances I’ve ever owned.
It’s simple.. but elegant.

I was gifted this at 14 years old when I was growing up in the UK (I am now 31). I loved it then and I still love it now.

I now live in Australia and could not get a bottle of this anywhere due to it being discontinued or paying an unjustifiable price $$$

This is a very nostalgic and sentimental smell for me so it’s a 10/10.

citrus, woody Cyprus, slight floral note with the tobacco and leather coming through which smell amazing. Very well blended.

I just bought Rasasi Abyan because of fragrantica votes.. and WOW it smells exactly the same. I don’t know how because the notes are completely different but it smells like Gucci by Gucci, but it still isn’t loud and powerful like it needs to be.

I really wish they would remake Gucci by Gucci pour homme making it more powerful and lasted longer as it was very unique and in a lane of its own.

10/10 - scent
8/10 - performance
0/10 - todays price (if you’re lucky enough to find it)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I had this when it was released in 2008 and it just smelled amazing. I can't remember it having bad performance back then because it just jumped off your skin all night long and got loads of compliments.

Such a shame you can't get this anymore. It had such a unique sexy night time going out oriental woody spicyness about it.

I've tried the intense oud version with that jammy rose in it and it's just not the same, they have erased the memory of this forgotten beauty.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
a fragrance that needs to be worn just right, best worn on cool dry or slight wet nights with cold winds but not too much. likes to be worn in say 16* c but not colder. very unique scent profile but not beastly, I love the smoky tobacco that unfolds, its very masculine and makes the wearer feel uncommon.
These types of fragrances are not every day work horses. Just pick the moment and it will delver stellar performance for that brief 2 - 3 hour business meeting, flight, intimate or casual 3 hour barbecue nite out with the guys. It loves to be discovered not announced. It will project no more than 2 feet with gentle wafts lifting off your clothes and skin. I love it

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I still have a quarter left in my bottle from about 15 years ago.
I'm surprised to see that Aurélien Guichard created this, he's a great perfumer with many masterpieces under his belt, including the masterpiece Falcon Leather 🦅

Gucci by Gucci is a classic chypre fragrance. It's a quintessential woody chypre where the fresh citrus top notes balances so well with the rich mossy woody base creating a sharp, elegant tension between brightness and depth 🍋⚖️🪵

It's very elegant, this is what Don Draper wears to his business meetings. 😎

Too bad they discontinued it, along with Gucci Guilty Absolute 🔥⛽

A video review is also available on my YT ▶️

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I never tried out how long it lasts, cause I wouldn't wear this..but something about it is attractive in a masculine way I have to admit. I'd imagine the boss of a cars dealership wearing this while working the nightshift..and he's attractive...loooool. Really surprised that these notes don't last cause it smells like a beast mode perfume...unfortunate.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Firstly im not a beast mode type, though I do own some. BUT, this perfume is so good I wish it performed better. I first smelt it 3yrs and I absolutely loved it, this is a perfect fragrance for me so I brought a bottle. After an hour no one can smell it. Which sucks, I never slam on perfumes for performance, with this im just gutted because it would be in my rotation. But due to it's performance it's not.

Please make an intense, Extreme, Parfum! Boost this thing up!

10/10 - Smell
Performance 2.5/10

This < me being disappointed. Seriously if this lasted atleast 4hrs I'd have a bottle at all times. Im a massive Creed fan, my favorite house infact and some don't last too long but they last long enough to justify it for me. Neroli Sauvage is the only one that doesn't cut it. Another perfume which I absolutely love but the performance is abysmal.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Delancy you re wrong and right at the same time...it is sophisticated BUT yes this was a great clubbing fragrance and its because i have spend many bottles of it , especially going night out.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Im 42 and think maybe I’m too young to appreciate this fragrance

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The tobacco in this scent is beautiful. I don't agree with many reviews here that it's generic. It has a certain sourness that dries down to a kind of honey note within 1-2 minutes. I have yet to find a fragrance that replicates this pleasant sourness. I do agree however that longevity and sillage is weak. But the scent profile more than makes up for it.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Possibly my favourite fragrance of all time, if only it projected more and was more substantial! I've had multiple bottles over the years and found a NoS bottle at a local pharmacist last year. The cypress and violet are beautifully blended and the scent is refined and mature for a designer fragrance.

If they re-released this in a more potent form, I might never touch the rest of the collection again. For now, I just have to accept that 8+ sprays is what it takes, and the 50ml bottle will drain all too quickly.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Idk why people claim this stuff has mediocre performance, this stuff is bold, masculine and strong as hell.

Lasted on my skin for 6 hours prior to a shower, and even after showering it’s still there. I also tried washing it off my skin when I first sprayed it on to no success.

This is a very well put together scent, it’s incredibly masculine and smells like a strong man. It reminds me of like a dryer, greener Creed Aventus kind of

This is all-season, day or night to me. Some people beg to differ when it comes to summer but this is definitely summer appropriate. It’s not sweet at all or too dry and leathery to the point that this would off-put anyone in hot weather.

Got this in a trade, won’t get a ton of wear out of me but I do think it’s a worthwhile pickup if you’re in the market for a versatile, masculine green fragrance.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: My favorite winter fragrance

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is a really solid everyday scent for men. It's woody and masculine without being overpowering. The tobacco note is definitely present but not too sweet or smoky. I get compliments on this one all the time.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Delancy, you are 100% talking about a different Gucci—probably Guilty. There is no chance this could ever be mistaken for a Clubbing fragrance. I'd gift this to my grandfather and know he'd like it. This fragrance was a winner in every way except for longevity/projection.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Haha delancy, get a life. Got outside and touch some grass, and stop taking frags so serious. It’s not that serious, boi X)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Holy shit..

Delancy….

Get over yourself. My lord… I’m all for some personal experience related to a fragrance review. But my god… You sound like a judgmental elitist talking down to the peasants.

Also…. This smells like blonde woods, clean tobacco with some light florals and some greenery. Pretty ho-hum / almost bland to me…

Lighten up…

Oh… Give us a review of Dylan Blue… We’d all love your insight.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: If you are 87 or older and you want to pick up chicks your age, this is the one for you .

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This fragrance is awesome! Received a bottle from my father with around 15ml in it, instantly got me in love the moment I smelled it. It’s a dark fragrance, with some sweet stuff with poor performance, sadly. Wish it was more potent than that, but the smell is majestic!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
How on earth are people calling this "classy" and "sophisticated"? Maybe I'm showing my age (early 30s), but this was a relatively popular sleazy clubbing fragrance in the 2010s...

Maybe this is now considered "sophisticated" in 2024 because the current day male fragrance landscape is drenched in syrupy, le male elixir type fragrances. So this probably seems almost austere compared to the current day fragrance trends, but make no mistake; this was definitely "clubbing juice" back in the day.

The only reason this doesn't have the same current-day clubbing bro "connotation" as Eros and VIP 212 have is because this had a higher price point than those two, and the other two came out a couple of years later with an overall sweeter, more crass profile that the club boi's shifted to.

Extremely obscure reference, but this smells like the PUA/Roosh V movement of the 2010s.

If you know what that was and you've smelled this fragrance, then you will know I've perfectly summed up the type of guy this fragrance was popular with back in the 2010s.

There's no class or sophistication here. It's 2013, and I see an Andrew Tate-looking chrome dome guy who has over sprayed the shit out of this, wearing dated Ksubi ultra-tight skinny jeans (the ones with the million, purposeful pre-made rips in them and random zippers everywhere) with a long sleeve black polyester shirt or v neck t shirt, top three or four buttons undone, hitting up Miami, Bangkok, and Bali clubs, performing his pick up artist "seduction" routine on trashed girls and trying to start fights with every "soy boy" he sees.

I used to smell this so much in clubs back in the 2010s. There was definitely a particular "type" of unsavory guy who wore it. Might sound like I'm being over the top, but to quote LCD Soundsystem: "I was there".

How the great Gucci Envy, Gucci Pour Homme (2003), and Gucci Pour Homme II (2007) were discontinued while this sleaze ball fragrance was allowed to survive is beyond me...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Classy, elegant, sophisticated something just works, versatile and upscale that freshly done mature opening, really well-blended tobacco here with other aromatics, the violets, cypress effervescence works so well there's a touch of sweetness that's very comforting, unique expression of more airy tobacco, it also surprisingly isn't as bad in the performance department as people claim it to be, to me it stays on the skin for a good 6-7 hours (maybe lucked out with a good batch), the jasmine feels more tamed all the notes just come together beautifully, this one's a great example of what seemingly different note structures can work together to do. It is a unique, signature-worthy underrated gem from Gucci, I would say.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I have a 10+ year batch (50ml) on my table but did not keep it very well. One day, I organized my collection, found it, and sprayed it. Oh man, the scent is so good (but weak) I can not believe I almost trash it. However, I heard somebody talking about reformulating the current batch, and I'm unsure if it is still good.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Great Green Masculine scent just has poor longesvity

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I’ve had this for a while and wear it from time to time… Pleasant, aromatic, woody, touch green.. It’s decent.

It reminds me of a D-squared fragrance with an added aromatic / green tobacco note..

It does sit close to the skin..

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The scent is amazing, one of my favourites but the longevity is just extremely weak :(

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: A very rich man gave this to me while we were on a date. I’m not sure why. Anyway, this is a club fragrance. Meaning you need to put on your tightest fitting shirt, skinniest jeans, and finest pointy Italian shoes when wearing this. C’mon ladies we’re going out to the club. One time I wore it to work and it was borderline offensive to everyone around me. Smells like a beautiful man who is good in bed but a bad person.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I am impressed! I have tested this and l ll buy it for sure. Masculine, cypress-tobacco perfume for gentlemen only. I believe we can use it year around except hot summer days. I can't find something similar to this. It's really amazing and women seem to love this type of perfume on us. Perfect for use in the office or on a date. Longevity and sillage moderate. I don't care. 5-6 sprays and let women come closer to smell it on us.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The first perfume i ever bought as a teenager. I wanted to smell "dark" and "sophisticated" and "mysterious". my mother steered me away from drakkar noire. The saleperson at macy's pointed me over to versace eros. I settled on this one instead, thinking i had found my signature fragrance. 6 months later I changed to terre d'hermes instead. Listen, it's not the worst fragrance ever, but it got sour and sickly over time, and was always obnoxiously synthetic and unsubtle. I might be tainted by memories of a confused youth but to me this smells of aspirational sophistication that hasn't been earned or realised.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
one of my the most loved scents in the world, but as always any beautiful scent usually comes across with awful longevity or sillage. i love scent so freaking much but others just can't smell it,all fragrances pretty weak on my skin and i gotta go with like 10 sprays to anyone barely notice me. But fragrance itself just perfect,i hate all tobacco fragrances but this one is definitely exception,its like light not intrusive tobacco with some fresh spiciness and hint of aromatic herbs. This is the perfect scent for a fall,this made me fall in love with tobacco. don't have enough words to express my love for it,all i can say its masculine, light not intrusive tobacco,good woods and its relaxing scent at all.
overall: 9/10
smell:29/10
sillage:1/10
longevity:3/10
good if you adore always carrying with you travel atomiser and spray 7 times every single time

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I really liked this scent. It very quickly became one of my favorites. My friends, however, LOVED it. All of them said I smelled amazing, and this is what they think all men should smell like. There were quite a few "you smell like a rich daddy" comments made. I agree, that is what this smell reminds me of. I wore the sample for two days, and I plan on getting a travel sized bottle in the coming weeks so I can spray it on for nights out.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Smells like Don Draper. If you’re smooth and work in sales/business this probably won’t disappoint you. Easily a signature fragrance and a compliment getter. Performance sucks you’ll need a decanter

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Not my preference of fragrance. Very gentleman like. If you’re under 30 this is not what you are looking for. Imagine smoking a cigar in the woods with whiskey beside you and a trench coat. Above 50 yr old fragrance imo.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
#419 in my "Tour de Fragrance"

Between it's introduction and its discontinuation I probably wore Gucci Nobile for business and office wear more than any other fougere. It's loss was tragic, but like eventually finding a new girlfriend, I found Houbigant's Duc de Vervins L'Extreme and a decade later Dior's Eau Sauvage Parfum and I got over the loss. Gucci's had hits and misses for me. I like and still have Mémoire d’une Odeur. I thought Guilty Pour Homme Parfum was so bad I gave it away. I've also had Gucci Envy until it was discontinued.

I like this Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme, which is supposedly also discontinued, though you still see it on Amazon and eBay. And some folks are saying Gucci Pour Homme is the same scent in a different bottle. I can neither confirm nor deny. I like this sample enough that if there were an EDP version of this scent available I'd own a bottle. It’s like most EDTs not much sillage, longevity three hours at best. A very masculine fragrance, very peppery, woody notes, not too much tobacco for my taste, and some bergamot. Good business wear stuff. Maybe a little dated, by like 20 years, but now you'd say it's a "classic" fragrance like Geoffrey Beene's "Bowling Green."

There are many scents that I'd wish for in an EDP, by Jacques Bogart, Lomani, Vicky Thiel, Ted Lapidus. But they are only available as very moderately performing EDTs, about which I have declared, "I will buy no more forever." At some point I hope to check out Guilty for Men Absolute for myself, if it's not discontinued by then.

Good hunting!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
It's very masculine cypress-tobacco-woody. What sets this fragrance apart is its perfect balance – it's neither too overpowering nor too subtle, making it suitable for various occasions.

The quality of the ingredients is evident, resulting in a luxurious and refined scent that speaks volumes about the wearer's taste. Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme is more than just a fragrance; it's an olfactory journey that evolves beautifully on the skin.

8/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: A bit too generic.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I have 2 older bottles from 2010-2015 period and it was ok, nothing groundbreaking but a solid cypress-tobacco-woody scent. Perfect offcie dumb-reach with nothing offensive.

Recently decided to buy a backup bottle from Notino, it was 2022 batch i think.
I was in SHOCK! Returned it right away! It's absolutely abysmal, disgusting, synthetic mess! Note break-down is nothing alike. Nothing like it was before! Coty is like L'Oreal ruins most of brands they acquire.
1/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
This is could have been a great fragrance if its performance was better.
The scent is an all year round signature scent, for the sophisticated gentlemen, but the sillage is so low and weak (skin scent to arms length even when applying quarter of a bottle) and longevity is poor - 3 hours approximately.
Too bad.
This could have easily been a niche quality purchase if the performance was monstrous.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Zesty greens, citruses. Mild, masculine tobacco based scent. Nuanced and refined. Speaking to the original formula.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Oh, this one...
Only if it had some performance, would have been best work meetings male fragrance ever.
Declaring and standing your position without being aggressive.
Pity...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Had this when I was in university about 13 years ago and it was an amazing fragrance with good lasting power.
Decided to get it again, 2019 batch, the performance is beyond terrible. They're better off just discontinuing this fragrance because it's pointless.
Such a shame.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: sad to hear performance is now extremely bad as the last commenter hinted. I say 'now' because it had a beastly performance in those days back in 2008 when I first had it. I actually am now tempted to get one again just to see for myself how downhill it has gone. It pulled compliments from colleagues left and right. What is happening to these companies man?

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This scent is average. Extremely bad performance!!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Average scent, dreadful performance.
3/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Wow, I’m late to the party on this one. What a nice, versatile fragrance. I can see this one as an office scent or a date night fragrance. I’m a sucker for tobacco and cypress in a composition and here these are blended beautifully. Yes, this is not a projection beast, but it’s also more than a skin-scent. I get about 5hrs longevity with Gucci by Gucci.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I love this scent. If I was rating it on the fragrance alone it'd get a straight 10. The longevity is absolutely woeful though, I can barely smell it on myself after 2-3 minutes, even on clothes it just disappears.

It's a real shame as this is signature scent worthy, it just doesn't last whatsoever. I have two bottles of it, I like it that much, I just wish I didn't need to take an atomiser with me whenever I choose to wear it.

I really hope Gucci release an EDP or Parfum of this. I won't hold my breath though, they'll likely discontinue it like they did with Envy, if they haven't already (I'm assuming it's still on the go as it's very easy to find.)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: A nice fragrance that smells divine, but performs so weakly. Almost disappear in minutes despite the heavy sprays on skin and shirt, leaving a very subtle skin scent. What a pity...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Thats just not good at all. I own it for 4 years and only used it once. Garage next.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: One of the most frustrating fragrances I’ve ever had. Wonderful tobacco and violet notes….masculine and easy to wear. Just a great creation. Sadly the performance is horrid. I’ve only worn it in colder weather so maybe warmer weather will improve things but this scent becomes a skin scent quickly and silliage is pretty nonexistent. Overspraying is a must if want many hours of performance.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Clean and sexy men's fragrance - performs better in warm weather. Longevity is poor however, even if you purchase the original version from the time it has been initially released. The older batches perform better and the tobacco note is more pronounced, but it's hard to find now and not worth the effort with so many modern-day fragrance choices. With reformulation and such poor performance it's not worth buying unless you want an expensive room spray. Gucci house used to release great fragrances, but after it has been acquired by the french holding Kering it has obviously lost its character.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
What a sublime fragrance! Whenever I encounter this, I'm reminded of why I got into this hobby all those years ago..
Fresh tobacco for those who are horrified of the note. Its almost impossible to dislike this, the slightly mediocre performance notwithstanding.
Underrated gem in an underwhelming fragrance house.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: i didn't get any specific notes from this. it just smelled like dove mens unflavored deodorant

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Beautiful violet with lush tobacco. Sophisticated and extremely elegant. I think this would be stunning on a woman just as it is on us guys. Maybe more so. Definitely a unisex vibe.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Gucci by Gucci
I'll start by saying that it's been in my top 5 for six years and it looks like it will be in my top 5 for life.
I think they made an excellent choice with James Franco as the advertising image, the warmth of his gaze defines the essence of gucci by gucci.

All in agreement with its sillage, I deduce that it is extremely "intimate", for personal enjoyment and for those people who enjoy our extreme confidence, so much so to allow them to get close to our neck or chest and feel it in its maximum splendor.

Its aroma gives me a certain serenity, when I have insomnia, I apply a little on my wrist and immediately feel calm, maybe it is the incense note and/or its balsamic accord.

Yes it is true; very Italian scent, elegant and seductive, for formal and evening wear. Easily the signature fragrance for a gentleman.

With one of the best opening I've ever felt, in one word, "perfect". It smells great, too bad it fades so fast,

To my personal taste one of the 5 best tobacco notes I've tried, (pure havane, versace man, gucci envy & michael by Michael kors). Also I perceive a small "bitter" and woody hint which fascinates me a lot.

The bottle is already in the major leagues of design, perfect for collection even if you don't like the contents.

I pray that someday a "parfum or intense" version will be released, the one that came out in 2015, "Gucci pour Homme" with the silver lined box, failed to repair the "defect" of the sillage.

Gucci by Gucci, my respect and admiration, we all have plenty of reasons to criticize its performance, but few of us doubt the quality of its scent, its essence and its impact on perfumery.

"Runs with me until the end”

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Smell wise, it is an amazing fresh-spicy fragrance. There are not a lot of fragrances that can even compete with the smell of Gucci pour Homme. At the other end of the spectrum, longetivity is an absolute disaster, not to mention the alcholic/watery scent it relaeses after a while. It is discontenting that such an amazing smell is ruined by weak performance.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: smells very mature, i see a dad wearing this to a funeral. not bad though. 5/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
To my nose, saying this smells like Abyan (which I own & really enjoy) feels like a stretch that I can't wrap my head around. Abyan comes off (and to me, remains) much more fruity & sweet. For me, they have similar(ish) aspects but I honestly couldn't draw a big comparison between them. Abyan feels much more casual while GBGPH comes off much more of a date night, possibly even dressed up (suit, maybe no tie), though I feel others do that better.

This was an immediate & utter love at first sniff for me. So incredibly intoxicating, manly, grown up, elegant & sexy, but you need to love Tobacco (and I mean love) to really get into this one.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Love this in the winter, and it does smell kinda like RL romance silver imo.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I like the scent but I'm not sure I like it as a cologne. There is some complexity and depth to it and that aspect is awesome. However, the overarching impression to me is it smells like household cleaners. A mix of Pine-Sol and perhaps Lemon Pledge? I love the smell of both as cleaners, but I'm not sure I want to smell like them. It smells "good" but I don't think it is an attractive scent. If I smelled this on someone else I could easily assume they had just cleaned their bathroom.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Man, I love this one so much. The perfect type of "woody" profile. Very nicely balanced with the other notes. Just fantastic fragrance. The only thing is it has pretty bad projection and less than moderate performance, at least so far while I've had it. Like a million other fragrance suggestions we've all heard, I'll let this sit alone in the corner all by itself to see if it matures and gets stronger with better performance. I hope so, and will probably wear some it in the meantime, but will just spray more than usual..

And, as vented in another thread, Gucci stop making a million Guilty flankers, and simply make ONE of this one, an intense version. One that is the exact same scent profile, but just stronger. I'm tired of endless flankers, but intense versions of fragrances like this I welcome with open arms.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Man. This stuff brings such mixed reviews for me. First, I love it. The cypress and tobacco and jasmine are top notch. It's classy, elegant, masculine, not outdated at all. It is 100% signature scent worthy and I feel it's appropriate for all seasons. Seriously, the scent is a masterpiece. Now that that's out of the way. The performance sucks. 3-5 hours if you're lucky. It's truly a shame the performance is below average to abysmal. Oh well, I'll still always have a bottle because it smells that damn good.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Why aren't tobacco perfumes made that way?

Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme a combination of tobacco, violet and cypress, unique, memorable is a legacy that Aurelian Guichard leaves behind, another masterpiece of the house, undeservedly thrown into the shadows.

Gucci by Gucci is a brilliant perfume that has unfortunately been forgotten. I say this because it is unique, a piece of classic and modern art at the same time with a note of fresh aromatic tobacco, slightly smoked... a little hint of darkness. The novelty of this creation comes through the introduction of the Violet and Cypress instead of the sweet or gourmand notes we are used to, transforming the perfume into something green, ozonic and crisp. It makes me think of the air you breathe into the forest after a heavy rain.

It has a romantic vibe, it is tailored by a hand that knows very well how to bring delicacy in a perfume into the same place with elegance and masculinity. A classic italian DNA. The notes may not say much, but the story is what matters. This perfume deserves a sequel that unfortunately I have not found elsewhere.

Performance is typical eau de toilette. On the skin last quite a bit, maybe a few hours due to the reformulations instead I recommend it to be sprayed on clothes. Sillage and projection average. This fragrance requires to be used in autumn and spring on cold temperatures, being quite versatile. Pair it with a shirt, a sweater or a leather jacket.

Gucci by Gucci must be placed alongside the other sacred monsters of the house, Pour Homme, Envy and Rush. It deserves its place in the category of the most successful perfumes, both by its unique factor given by the combination of notes and by the smell. Gucii's souvenir chest would otherwise be much poorer.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: it does smell expensive soap for fifteen minute then only smell like leather shoe and cigar ends performance is very bad from 10 up to 20 sprays to it can project i hate bad smell like that i hate it very disappoint no blind buy unless you like the smell of cigarettes and leather but not for me

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Classic and quite memorable Gucci.
Warm and woody with violet, amber and subtle tobacco notes that shine through the most for me. Decent projection, sillage and longevity. Bright and cripsy opening and sublte, sultry warm yet breezy dry down.

Very hard to dissapoint, its just a great fragrance day or night or for anywear.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: A piece of art. An absolute love for me. This started my fragrance journey. Still I have not managed to find any fragrance close to this one. There is a reason it has not been replicated by any other fragrance out there. It is unique and a scent that definitely needs to be revived. It has nothing to do with the guilty line which is the wrong way Gucci has taken. Gucci has released some of the greatest scents of all time, but sadly rejects her own beauties. Gucci, please continue this line and respect your loyal customers. Aurelien Guichard unfolded his best talent with this one.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: #1 best smelling out of all my collection. Sadly does not last long enough to buy a full bottle, so I will be cherishing my 10ml sample while it lasts. I will be looking for a longer lasting alternative to this if anyone has suggestions

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The very essence and epitome of a true seductive, masculine, and classy Italian scent. This is perfezione (perfection) and bellezza (beauty) in a bottle! You will not be disappointed on a blind buy of this one. Perfect for a date night, but so versatile it basically can be worn in any season or any time of day/night. Probably leans slightly green, but the tobacco and leather balance that out, as well. True masterpiece! Molto Bello!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: No question about it, this is my favorite perfume of all time. It can turn a bad day into a good one, and even heavy raining outside can feel like pure sunshine. It's almost magical.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: MASTERPIECE!!! PLSSSSSSS GUCCI MAKE AN EAU DE PARFUM OR PARFUM FLANKER! WOMAN GO BONKERS OVER THIS SCENT! NO JOKE MAKES EM WEAK IN THE KNEES...... ✌🏼❤

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Am I the only one who feels touches of menthol, mint and patchouli notes here?
Its beautiful and rather casual.
Cypress and mint on the opening imo which dries down to soft leather amber patchouli combination.
You will probably be disappointed about projection and longevity.
3.75/5
Age:+25
Spring and autumn days and nights.
Casual and masculine.
Weak longevity and projection.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Perfect scent however longevity performance is not good enough. This could be my signature scent in terms of smell but it does not go long

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Gucci pour Home and Gucci by Gucci are different. Older one is more fresh, light, and unique. Gucci by Gucci is weak, dark, and rather generic. Bought online, thinking old version, but regret only. Not bad but different, so I wouldn't buy this later.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Gucci's date night fragrance.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Very interesting fragrance. Recently bought a 90ml bottle and having 5 more 3 of 50ml and 2 of 90ml so if someone is interested.... Contact me
Anyway. So from very forest-ish smell to tobacco clean to very dry, linen clean smell. The longevity it's not as bad as I thought. Also there is a good projection. I like it though, but I expected more tobacco. I guess this will grow on me a lot, just need more wearing. Great fragrance - 7.8/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: They were selling this at my local B&M and I only bought one bottle because I’m a moron.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Very unique and nice fragrance, can easily be a signature scent....perfect for spring, fall

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Nice very forestry green scent.
I'm impressed with it's longevity as a skin scent. Been six hours now and it still projects.

Surprisingly linear given the price tag

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I got a sample of this but it wasn't a spray bottle. I applied it to a piece of clothing to test and the initial smell was strong moonshine. I came back to it after some time and decided to apply it to my skin and once it dries down, the moonshine scent dissipates and this turns into a great scent. Performance is quite bad so you need to overspray on this one or carry a small atomizer to reapply. I would say this is ideally for men aged 25 to 40.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
It could be a legend if its performance was better than it is!
Still it is a masterpiece...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
One of few fragrances that kept their uniqueness until today never smelled something like it and I don’t think I will
Great masculine fragrance

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: God this smells heavenly. If only it projected the slightest bit and lasted more than an hour. It could've been a perfect signature scent but it falls flat in all aspects except the actual scent itself. Still, a solid like from me.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Tbh I don’t think this is really worth it to me, it’s kinda basic and bland. If you come across this in the store please please try it on your skin before you get it, they opening smells very sweet but just almost instantly falls off into something completely different, the longevity is below average and the projection is also bad. Do your research before buying and don’t get sold on the top note.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is the definition of man. Perfect for every occasion. You can wear this everywear anytime although i think its better with leather jacket or a suit. But goes perfectly even with a white tshirt... Brings me back so many memories. Love it.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Discontinued! :-(

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I really like this fragrance, but my breath gets taken away and a massive migraine is induced if I spray on more than 1 spray.
I can wear 4 sprays of J’adore Extrait De Parfum, and 8 sprays of Chanel N°5 Eau De Parfum without getting a headache.
How this one causes a hangover-like headache I’ll never know.
I won’t be replacing it when it runs out if it ever even does.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I've been waiting to get this one for a long time, after having tried so many other Gucci fragrances recently. Hate to say it, but this is just another woody aromatic. It doesn't jump out at me as a "wow, this one is special" fragrance like the Gucci Pour Homme 2003. Are you telling me they axed that for this one? What a shame. There's a reason this one doesn't get any mentions in the fragrance community, and with Youtubers. Don't think I've seen this on a top 10 list, ever. This fragrance isn't bad at all, it's a borderline like/okay for me. I've experienced hundreds of frags over the past few years since I got really interested in them, so at this point, I've been spoiled by masterpieces in this category. Perhaps if I found this earlier I'd be higher on it. The bottle is nice; Gucci is the master of clunky, heavy glass bottles and this one doesn't disappoint.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Zesty, woody, pine-y tobacco scent.

* I smell on paper*
Zesty wood because of the bergamot, pine-y because of the cypress and the tabacco makes it gentleman like. It smells expensive, but still a crowd pleaser so you can wear it at the office. It doesn't smell like paper, but I reckon if you like the smell of paper from old books, you will also like this one if you don't mind a pinch of flowers.
I hear some say smokey, but I hate smokey and don't find this smokey at all.

* My womanly 28 y/o opinion *
To me this is a panty dropper. Smells just like James Bond would smell. A confident gentleman who knows how to charmely pop open champagne. You can only wear this from about 30 years old and if you have a calm personality. If you are very extraverted or emotional, the spell that comes along with this scent might be spoiled. Don't tell them, but I buy this one for every boyfriend I have.

To conclude:
You have to love cypress (pine like smell), bergamot (citrussy wood), tobacco smell and don't mind a little flower.
It's widely available, so try it at a store on your skin first! :)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This smells similar to moonshine, not tobacco. Pretty bad.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme is a woody and aromatic fragrance.

At its opening the combination of violet and citrus leaves gives me an olfactory illusion like grape juice. In a few minutes a woody base of mainly tobacco and cypress and to a lesser extent patchouli and amber emerges.

I love the scent in general and it would be one of the best fragrances if it performed better. I have the bottle that now says Gucci Pour Homme, but it is the same aroma as when it said Gucci by Gucci, and the projection was always just as low, although smelling it on my wrist is perceived for about 8 hours.

It's fresh and woody, but not fresh enough to be used in summer or spicy enough to be used in winter, so its best settings are spring and fall and the office.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I like this one, I don't love it. I bought this one at the mall when I was going through a tough time with a break up. I wanted something that would pump up that confidence after being out of the game for a minute. This smell is nice but wasn't exactly a compliment getter. Maybe it had a placebo effect on me because I didn't wear it much but just from wearing it occasionally it did build my confidence up a bit. I've been blessed to have some smoking hot women as my GF's. This is one of the best bottles I've seen in a fragrance. This right here is strong and sturdy and this fragrance made me feel strong and sturdy. The dry down for me is the best part of this. I wouldn't pay more than 45 for this but I bought this at 80. (90mL bottle)

BATCH #4037
2014 2-6
6 YEARS & 8 MONTHS (09 Oct. 2020)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Sexy and traditionally ’manly’ scent. Far better than Gucci Sport. Easy to wear, which also means it’s modern, close to bland. Wood, oud, citrus, slightly spicy.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
My partner insisted on purchasing this fragrance for me shortly after it's release. "Sex in a bottle" is how she described it.

I absolutely love the tobacco note in here, and paired with the other notes, creates a classy, masculine, smoky and seductive composition. It's a shame about the poor performance though. Fits a reserved personality.

The rating on this one should be higher. I agree with some of the reviewers below, this is overlooked and indeed underrated.

Occasion - Intimate

Weather - Cool(Autumn & Spring)

Gucci needs to release a longer lasting eau de parfum flanker. I would blind buy it!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Growing up we all have heard of Gucci, probably one of the most well known designers on earth. When I started my search into the fragrance community I had to own Gucci, I couldnt care less about how it smelled, I just had to own Gucci. So my first fragrance I bought when I got into the community, was Gucci Pour Homme.

The Good:
The good is all in the smell, 100% nothing about the smell do I hate. It's warm and spicy with a good amount of tobacco. You don't smell like a chain smoker when smelling this but the Tobacco is just enough to enjoy. I honestly had a hard time pinpointing certain notes in the note pyramid except for Tobacco. As someone who does Leather crafting as a hobby I found no hints of leather. This isn't to say the smell is bad(it is perfect) I just cant pin point some notes that are supposed to be in here. Finally the bottle, it's just such a dope looking bottle with the weird pin like thing on top, I love it.

The Bad:
The biggest shortcoming is the longevity and projection. It turns into a skin scent like 2 hours in. Yes the smell is amazing but this just makes me so sad. An amazing scent that is fantastic but turns into a skin scent in no time.

Conclusion: Honestly one of the best scents in my collection, if it wasn't for the terrible projection and Longevity. The fragrance is pretty cheap on most websites and I got me 2019 batch online for like $40.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: When I used this back in school days, it earned me tons of compliments from both males and females. The masculine and gorgeous smell always made me feel I was in control. Hard to explain but a masterful formulation in a bottle by Gucci. Won't hesitate to buy again for sure.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I smelled this in a magazine insert years ago, and practically huffed it dry. It was always too expensive for me to justify buying, but I recently bit the bullet. Wow, it's exactly what I was hoping it would be! I'm surprised to see all the negative reviews, and mentions of it seeming watered down. My bottle does not seem watered down at all; I'm experiencing great performance with this fragrance. Sexy and masculine, citrusy up front, then mellows to a beautiful tobacco, woodsy smell. Too bad there's a pandemic at the moment, and I can't wear it anywhere fancy!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is so strooooong. Can't even smell it or tell the notes !

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Smells like a duty-free shop, or maybe it's the other way around. Anyway, it reminds me of an airport.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Beautiful scent with lack of performance. Lasts about 5h top, and becomes a skin scent after 2 hours. It's never a big projector by any means, people would literally need to be right next to you to smell it after 2 hours. Great date scent. Very sophisticated, classy, safe and not overpowering. If you can't stand sweet fragrances and looking for a fresher sensual date fragrance, get this one. I don't recommend going heavy on the spray though because the scent itself can be pretty thick. Just do like 5 sprays first, then reapply 1-2 sprays after 5h. This one of the staples in my collection just for the beautiful scent itself. Do keep in mind that it smell a little sweeter on clothes (just a tiny bit from the tobacco) and last a little longer on clothes too (about 6-7 hours, but a light scent).

UPDATE: After wearing this a little more, I've gotta say the performance seem to be worse than what I thought it originally was. I still can detect it at the 5h mark if I really smell it up close, but everyone in my family said they couldn't smell it at all anymore (that was about the 3h mark). You'd probably have to reapply this one very often if you want people to smell it. It's a very pleasant scent and everyone seem to like it, so if people can smell you they will compliment you on it. On clothes it becomes really faint after 6h

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The second fragrance I ever bought. Simply intoxicating. Patchouli, amber, tobacco and cypress. Clean and fresh. Yes the longevity is not great (~4h) and the projection isn't far. But that is what makes it a great office scent, who wants to accost everyone and bring about a no scent policy anyways.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
It’s allright. Regined and masculine. Keyword for dry down is incense!

I think it kind of resembles Alien Man in the final stages.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
This is my #1 favorite of all time. I put it above my favorite TF and Creed colognes.

Don't not get this because it doesn't "perform well". I always buy a small atomizer from Amazon and transfer some fragrance to carry with me. If it starts getting weak just reapply as needed.

This has a very sophisticated scent through it's entire life. It starts out and ends beautifully (not like glue!?). Also please tell me what glue you use so I know what to buy from now on! Lol, jokes aside it is a beautiful floral woody fragrance. It has a hint of tobacco in the most pleasant presentation of this ingredient that I've ever seen! Worth a shot for sure.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
اذكر انك كنت اجمل عطر استخدمته
و اذكر انك كنت هدية من اجمل شخص
بحياتي
..
اللهم ارحم عبدك عبدالعزيز

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I know this one has always been pretty soft/weak, it I feel like they maybe reformulated more to where it has lost almost all potency! Disappointing because this is a lovely scent.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This one surprised me!! Bery masculine dry tobacco spoces6!! Real much man a ent to bas it doesn't last more than 30 mins :(

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: opens up smelling like straight up glue for a few minutes. but then it starts to change and it really gets good this is a tabacco scent that is not paired with sweetness and it smell goood but unfortunatly doesnt perform that good.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Used to be my go to evening fragrance. Unique date night. Never had a bad comment. Go light on the sprays.

7/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Used to be my go to evening fragrance. Unique date night. Never had a bad comment. Go light on the sprays.

7/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
What a thoroughly FRUSTRATING fragrance!!! Gucci Pour Homme is my absolute favorite men's cologne on the market today--because of its "perfectly modernized" 70s/80s scent! (It is heaven when I get the chance to spray it on at Macy's cologne counter). But I refuse to buy it because of its poor performance and value.....It's effectively a "very light" skin-scent, after the below average projection of the first hour or two!

What both utterly confounds me and ticks me off about the poor performance is that if you take a look at the note breakdown, this fragrance is primarily made up of otherwise STRONG scents (Tobacco, Cypress, Violet, Patchouli, Leather, Resin)???? So it seems that the only one making out ($$$) on this fragrance is Gucci, because it appears they could easily "improve" the performance of this beauty...... if they wanted to :(

P.S. (I noticed the following only after writing my post): Check out how many men "love" this fragrance (below), but cannot recommend it due to poor performance. Shame on you,Gucci!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Great fragrance but poor performance. Creamy element on dry down reminds me a little of Gucci Guilty which has better performance. Would not purchase.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
On first spray its fresh, its actually like the mainstream citrus fragrances in the opening. After some time passes though, it starts to change into a more heavy scent. This heaviness comes from cypress i believe. You can sense it is like a niche smell that strives to be a mainstream cologne. Even though it has tobacco in the notes, don't worry its not overwhelming like tom ford tobacco vanille. The tobacco in this one is perfectly under control. Even though i somehow like the smell, i can't recommend it because of really low silage.
TL;DR: Mainstream Frag with nichy twist, poor silage.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
i remember when it first came out in 2008, i discovered this edt maybe one year later with a sample from a friend. at that time the reputation of gucci by gucci p.h. was "safe, generic, easy" and the main-eventer was the one by dolce and gabbana, all before the "decade of decadence" in the fragrance game started by bleu de chanel and completed by sauvage and its clones.
i think gucci by gucci p.h. in 2019 deserves another reputation. considering the modern offering, this scent smells now more complex, interesting and very masculine. it opens with a fresh cypress and maybe vetiver, then a pleasant tobacco became the leader of the drydown, mixed with other woody notes. it is a very nice fragrance for a dinner in a restaurant with your gf, it is very romantic and smooth. i like the manly character inside this juice, nothing like the freshy-teeny-sweety fragrances of today. the performance is the main downside of this scent, the projection and longevity are slightly below average. it is the same category of ch men prive, very valentino or lanvin avant garde(maybe theese have a better performance, not so much..). so i recommend this scent for close enviroments and nightout, but also for work because it is inoffensive. for fall and spring, for 25 and up.
a friend of mine says it is discontinued, i dont know if it is true but is still easy available in stores. i found a tester for a super-cheap price. i have the renamed bottle and personally dont find big differences with the orignal gucci by gucci.
in the overall, this fragrances is not the masterpiece for the ages but is too underrated and deserves more attention. in the current market we need edt like this. un profumo che forse non rivoluziona le vostre vite ma è decisamente piacevole, molto maschile e più complesso rispetto a tanta roba banale in giro attualmente.

scent-8,5
long-6
sillage-5
versatility-8
uniqueness-8
bottle-7,5
compliment factor-7
rebuy?no

my vote-8

in one word- overlooked

alternative- d g the one edt

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
this perfume is no longer available on the Gucci website, but is still on sale on the various online platforms and in stores !!!!
Someone knows if it's Discontinue or not .. ??

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is one of my favorite scents ever, it would be my signature cologne if it lasted longer. Wish I know of a better performing equivalent because this juice smells amazing.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Great scent, great bottle, poor longevity. 7/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I instantly fell in love with this fragrance, It has an amazing, dark, seductive opening. Buuuuuut, the performance is AWFUL. After 2 hours, the scent is completely gone

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: a very gentlemen elegant fragrance... good longevity/performance! you need to try it!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I can only join in with the choir. Fantastic smell with an awful performance. If this had Sauvage performance it would be would be way up there on my list

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I was dating a girl back in 2010 and she gifted me this bottle. I sprayed it a few times and didn’t think anything special about it. Fast forward to today spiting 2019 and I decided to pull ot out from the back of my collection. I was surprised I didn’t use all of this up around the time I got it. This scent is great. To me, it’s a leathery, citrus, tobacco type smell. I haven’t fully checked the pyramid, but I don’t need to, I already know that the leather is dominant in here. It’s not leathery like John Varvatos, but it seems to go about the leather in a different way here. I think what turned me off from this scent when I originally got it was the longevity is horrible. I get that it could be a body chemistry thing, but I’m not buying that. I lent this bottle out to 3 different friends and only one of them got 2 hours out of it, while me and my other friends only got 1 hour. Why on earth would a designer attach their name to a fragrance that only lasts an hour is beyond me. Buy this is you want to smell great for an hour while driving to work or going on a road trip lol. 6/10.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Absolutely fantastic smell. I can say the smell itself one of the greatest of our time, but it doesnt matter if it disappears in an hour. Otherwise it would be a success in my opinion.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: It's too bad the performance of this fragrance is so below average, as the smell of the fragrance itself is one of my absolute favourites. If this lasted longer I would still have it in my rotation, but as I work in the busy world of retail, having to reapply throughout the day isn't really an option for me. I first discovered Gucci Pour Homme when I was 15 and I fell in love with it and wore it all the time, but now it leaves much more to be desired. Amazing smell though.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I bought this fragrance wich appeartly was reformulated and name changed from gucci by gucci , to just; Gucci pour Homme.

First Spray impression: Dried Tobacco smell. this accord smells a little synthetic but in a very nice way.

3 to 5 minutes after application the tobbaco start to settle and start to smell sweet and musky without smelling wet. wich I like.

After 1 hour this fragrance starts to fall down on projection and sillage. wich I found a little dissapointed. but the longevity is very good. you will smell it on you as skin scent.

but for some reason I enjoy this fragrance so much. because i know only I will be enjoying this. This fragrance is for real Alpha Males. guys that dont rely on having a bomb fragrance to be noticed. instead. He invites you to get closer and closer.

Score: 85/100

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
With a better performance this could be my favorite scent ever and a all time classic for sure.it fit my personality and what i'm looking for in a fragrance.unfortunately it's smell great 30 mns and pfff it's gone.
scent:10 for me
longevity and sillage:5 for me

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Boooooring!
I used to own so many Gucci’s fragrances simply because they were unusual, big and so well made.
Nowadays Gucci produces flat and just ordinary scents with no charisma.
This one is no exception. It actually makes me sad they have discontinued the unique products and replaced them with such rubbish.
Not worth the money asked for it.
Buy some 007 aftershave and you’ll get at least the value for money.
I understand the world is changing but it’s a shame that Gucci is loosing its identity and legacy being just an overpriced producent of mediocrity for millennials who know no better.
A shocking 4/10 + 1 for a nice bottle=
5/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I wear this in my interview, presentaion, other office meetings, etc.

This is very uplifting and sophisticating scent that you can rock in your office. Average and sillage are soft perfect for office.

I don't think if I will wear it on any other occasion.

It;s good but I will not buy it again.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I own the gucci by gucci pour homme in the edt travel spray version. The fragrance is pleasant, intense, strong and masculine. The tobacco is felt with arrogance but only for a few tens of minutes. Afterwards the cypress and violet take over. Here the cards on the table change because, in my opinion, the latter removes from the fragrance the sense of initial virility. With leather and amber we try to recover the great masculinity lost in the central phase but the scent is repeatedly knocked down by a presentful jasmine. Finally, then, that note of bergamot could save it.
It remains a great gucci but not among the best.
Analysis: 7/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Salve. Ho acquistato on-line recentemente il " GUCCI BY GUCCI POUR HOMME " come da foto qui in fragrantica ma ricevo un " GUCCI POUR HOMME ". Il packaging è lo stesso... la bottiglia scura identica alla foto qui pubblicata ... in pratica cambia solo il nome... La piramide olfattiva è uguale per entrambi. Se la memoria e il naso non mi ingannano credo di notare una differenza fra le due versioni ( avevo testato il Gucci by Gucci che mi ricordo più buono di quello che ho ricevuto ). Deduco sia stato riformulato anche nel nome ma non ho trovato nessuna conferma.
Rimane una fragranza molto buona ma sono un poco deluso sulla durata e sulla scia. Sulla mia pelle non superano le 3 o 4 ore. Inoltre il tabacco che dovrebbe essere la base è appena percettibile e solo per poco tempo. Rimane un buon profumo per via del cipresso che a me piace tantissimo.
Per tutte le ragioni sopra elencate se acquistate online assicuratevi di ricevere il GUCCI BY GUCCI POUR HOMME

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Just a nice bottle but the contents are nothing, not worth $ 1

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: if it's performance was 6/10 it could be bestseller.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Reminds me of something between YSL L'Homme Ultime and Coach for Men. Longevity is like 3 hours and immediately becomes a skin scent :\

Scent 9/10
Performance 2.5/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Got this for 40 bucks from a closing down sale .when I tested it I sure liked the masculinity in the scent so I purchased it and didn’t have time to test performance. MY OH MY , the performance is a HUGE letdown. God awful performance holy sh** this juice is like 90% water. Major disappointment

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Thisw as between 2008-2015, a wonderful smokey patchouli fresh yet spicy tobacco scent. I remember buying the deodorant in 2008 as a student and just swooning. The current formulation is severely watered down, avoid!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
What a wonderfully gentle tobacco scent! The tobacco note is instantly recognizable from the first spray, but instead of an old-school tobacco note, this one is distinctively modern. The cypress and violet notes add a beautiful green overtone, both sharp and mellow at the same time - it is difficult to describe - but there is great depth and sophistication in how they interplay without dominating each other. The result is an oakmoss-y depth that avoids being barbershop-ish.

I don't get a powdery note, nor do I detect the jasmine. The sharpness of the perfume seems to come from the bergamot, which opens up and becomes distinct after a few minutes, yet it doesn't overtake the complex nuance of tobacco and green notes.

It is a beautiful perfume that isn't for everyone. It is distinctively masculine. The way that the tobacco note makes it seem dark while being clean can't be emphasized enough. I can see this perfume as a good introduction to tobacco-dominated perfumes for those who are just starting out.

Cheers!

Scent: 8/10
Sillage: 6/10
Longevity: 6/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Had a bottle in 2009 or 2010. I absolutely loved it. I could smell it the next morning. My favourite from Gucci (Rush is a close second).

Bought a bottle a few years later, and was horrified.
Not even 10% the original formulation. Watered down to almost nothing. Still trying to find a replacement for this. All suggestions I've tried seem nothing like it to me.

Not tried the original pour homme, but I'm guessing it's in the same style as Rochas Lui, which I like a lot, but Gucci by Gucci will always be my favourite, or it was until Gucci butchered it.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I bought this cologne after smelling it once. It to me has a juicy/water fresh tropical kiwi vibe with a peppery, tobacco middle. It seems to dry down after 15 minutes to a masculine but fruity tobacco sweetness. The dude I smelled it on must have put on 8-10 sprays. I try not to put on too much. I have sprayed 1 to 5 sprays and gone to work several times. I don't want to be that guy that overdoes it. I am not sure you can overspray this cologne because its sillage is so poor. I absolutely love the scent. I am not sure how it smells to others and I have not received any compliments with this one.

This would be a scent I never want to be without but it is a cologne for me. I would love to try an edp or intense version.

UPDATE: I LOVE this cologne and I discovered that it lasts all day as a close up scent if I spray it a few times on my clothes.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Initial impression - kind of peppery, small, non-offensive, but sharp fragrance. One hour later - I experienced a beautiful intoxicating vapourous classy smelling citrus and lavender perfume coming off my arm which was in the hot sun while sitting outside at the cafe - beautiful. I also had some Mont Blanc Legend tester on my foream, so that was working in tandem I think.
Purchased!

UPDATE: Very nice fragrance, but basically only slightly better than a skin scent in terms of strength and sillage. I would much prefer and recommend Aramis Tuscany - so much better in this regard, it’s a proper fragrance when compared with this.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
You just can’t deny that it smells so bloody nice.
Woody slight sweet.
Not very interesting but man it is so manly and likeable.
Performance could be better.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I really like the smell of this, very cool, very classy.

Unfortunately the performance is absolutely abysmal on my skin, there isn't much projection to begin with (which isn't necessarily a bad thing), but it becomes a skin scent in 1-1,5 hours, and it's totally gone in 2-2,5.
I haven't experienced longevity this bad outside of 007 ocean royale, and at this price, that is simply not good enough.

Now, this might just be a case of my skin chemistry not jivin' with this juice at all, and as I said, it smells fantastic, so I'm not going to say 'don't try it' - but I am definitely saying 'don't blind buy it'.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Can't create any words to describe about this fragrance, simply stunning! This is a very classy fragrance
Get the 1st formula then you'll know...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I skipped this over for years. Then I shot a spray on one day and realized this is a great scent. Inoffensive tobacco and leather. This is my leather armchair smoking a sweet pipe tobacco scent. Great cooler weather office or casual fragrance. It lasts through a whole work day on me. It gives me a small inoffensive scent bubble. Don't buy this if you want a projection beast. This is a refined low-key fragrance.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
It's nice and safe scent, a bit too generic for my taste.

Smells the same as EDT "Denim Gold" by Denim (not listed in Fragrantica) which you can find for the lowest price of around 10 euros in shops, silage and longevity are similar, with only difference that bottle and package looks way cheaper.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Gucci (by Gucci) is a charming masculine aromatic. The opening contains a charming burst of vivid aromatics so arousing, it just leaves you breath-taken! Deep, passionate, and romantic. It's that kind of fire that makes you want to buy it as soon as you smell it.

The most prominent aromatic notes (violet and sweet tobacco) project with a bright and bold vivacity. Ambrosial probably would be the best way to explain the aroma. It's something like a cocktail of the most sensual dark-fruit pulp, accented with a hazy masculine grain provided by the subtle presence of pepper.

The fragrance is so well-blended, and projects with the full sense of hard work and detail so legendarily accustom to the art of luxury craftsmanship. The scent doesn't come off cheap in any way; or just thrown together; nor does it possess any type of quality to it that might make a man feel ashamed wearing it.

Gucci (by Gucci) is a fragrance that's very well-suited for a man to wear with dignity. Everything seems to come natural while wearing it: The sense of great style, the comfort of its arousing charm, and the feel of genuine luxury provided by the quality of the blend.

Ranks of nobility legendarily wore custom fragrances as the distinguishing attribute of their character, and Gucci (by Gucci) definitely projects as one of those kinds of scents, making it an instant favorite among men with a taste for the divine.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The scent itself is great and one of a kind. It doesn't last long however...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
so i picked the bottle from my closet after good 5-6 years and man did i miss it!!?
this juice is not for boys, it is for men! men who overrun testosterone. confident and macho is what this juice speaks.

i have a little story with this juice. i entered a night club wearing this with a group of friends and sported an acquaintance at the bar. the greeting turned rather wild and she did confess that it was the cologne which i was wearing which did the magic ;). she did mention that if she will ever smell this cologne again she would instantly recognize it.

fast forward few months and another group of friends came to pick me and she was with them. as i entered the car, wearing this very cologne, i see her in the car and the look she gave me was like.. i know you are wearing the same cologne!!

Update: i checked the latest available version and this has been reformulated beyond recognition. Now i can understand all the hate. Dissapointed!!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Just received a 90ml tester for free and I've gotta say, it's not bad. I spritzed it and immediately thought of Vick's VapoRub. It really reminds me of the holidays and colder months. Very pine-like, semi-sweet tobacco, masculine, and clean. I personally don't wear fragrances like this too often because they really aren't "me", but this one might grow on me.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Very very weird stuff… After the reviews and the scent pyarmid, I excepted a totally different smell. I would like to get a manly, classic winter time tobacco/cypress scent.. Actually I got it, but very weird. The opening is a pure citrus/bergamot mix without any violet or cypress, and after the first sniff I thoght this will be a summer fragrance. Few minutes later the bergamot fades away, and I smell a very light/airy tobacco/cypress combination with a special herbal/camphor vibe. I don’t know why, but it smells like a sports cream or a rheumatic cream…Interesting…Later joins some patchouli, amber and resins, but this camphoric vibe lasts very very long. Anyway, this is a clean, safe, masculine fagrance, but do not blind buy. The sillage and the longevity terrible, as most of the Gucci, so this is the reason why I dislike…

- spring/autumn/witnter, but maybe could work in summertime. Very versatile stuff.

- sillage and longevity are poor. longevity around 4 hours

- try before buy

Scent (open, top-mid): 6.5/10 (x2)
Scent (drydown, base): 7/10 (x2)
Sillage: 4/10
Longevity: 4/10
Uniqueness: 8.5/10
Versatility: 9/10

Total: 6.563 /10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: So very disappointed in this fragrance. I bought it wanting something expensive and long lasting. I may as well have bought something from a cheap shop.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I love the crisp clean woody smell of the cypress with hints of leather and tobacco. It's a very elegant smell that would be good for cooler weather. This scent lasts a good 5 hours on my skin and is very pleasant. My wife even likes it... and she hates most colognes.

I also use Versace Oud during the cooler months. Gucci by Gucci will be a nice lighter addition to the Fall and Winter months. I found a bottle at Nordstrom Rack for $44. I had to get it. I watched a lot of reviews of fall and winter colognes on Youtube and Gucci by Gucci was usually one of the top 3. I would have to concur with those reviews.

Two Thumbs Up for Gucci by Gucci!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Absolutely phenomenal. Nice subtle tobacco with a beautiful green overtone. If it would only project a little stronger on me. That aside, its defiantly one of my favorites.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Generic, good longevity, a bit decorative.

Not for the history books.

Not good enough for the really special occasion or the strange isolated moment.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: At first application, I get a smooth blend of tobacco and balsamic spice that do well in cooler seasons. I can't help but feel a little extra classy while wearing this one and to me, screams gentleman. I love the dry down as it mellows to a leather and woods base that rather than halts at being a stale and stagnant, smells sweet and refined. I can get roughly 4 hours of wear and it dries to its base fairly fast.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Quality: 4.5 out of 5 – It’s a beautiful, high quality scent. For me, it borders on a masterpiece. I LOVE it. The magic happens after it’s been on me for 3 hours.

Originality: 4 out of 5 – It’s very original yet triggers a scent memory in me of Jimmy Choo Man. I have both, yet prefer this.

Projection (Sillage): 3 out of 5 – moderate; Only people in your near vicinity can smell your scent, unless you’ve just sprayed it.

Longevity: 3 out of 5 – moderate; 5~6 hours

Versatility: 4 out of 5 – This scent is very versatile; it works well for day/night, autumn/winter, office-based work/formal occasions and for men over 25.

Value: 4 out of 5 – currently £49 for 90ml. It’s about the going rate for a fragrance of this quality. I love it enough to pay this but if it’s on sale, great!

Compliment Frequency: 2 out of 5 – Nobody moves away but I don’t get compliments on it either. To put some perspective on this, I’m wearing it now and haven’t had a single compliment on it over the whole day. A guy walks into my room wearing Creed Aventus and 2 people complimented his within 2 minutes! Yes, it’s a hugely different fragrance but what the hell?! :)

Packaging (Bottling): 4 out of 5 – Much thought seems to have gone into the packaging; it’s attractive and highly functional.

Overall Rating: 4.5 out of 5 – Great – This fragrance does just about everything you could ever want from a fragrance of its type (meaning it’s good enough for a lack of projection, longevity and compliment frequency to ignore). There aren’t any significant problems with the fragrance, I love it but not everyone’s nose/skin is the same so you may not be left in complete awe. Not ground-breaking but has the potential to become a classic and should be considered a staple for collectors.

Recommendation: Not everyone loves everyone’s taste so try before you buy but otherwise to me, it’s so good it’s worth blind buying!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Very gentle and unique. Formal Scent and it can be wear by young men.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This has the most stylish and refined masculine silky tobacco notes. I still have the 2012 bottle with some 10 ml remaining and it smells the same even today. Brings back memories of my first Eu trip(Swiss). Love this perfume very much. Sharp ,crisp and elegant. Thanks Gucci

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: يك رايحه دلپذير و جذاب.يادم است وقتي چند سال قبل که تازه تو بازار اومده بود اون رو تهیه کردم امکان نداشت جایی از اون استفاده کنم و حداقل چند نفر از مذكر و مونث بازخورد مثبت ندهند و نام اون رو نپرسند .از اون سال یکی از ادوکلن های ثابت من است.اما یک تفاوتی در کار ایجاد شده.رایحه تنباکویی و دودی اون نسبت به نسخه ای سال های قبل افت کرده و بدتر از همه پخش بوی اون در حد دقیقه شده است.اما با ز هم چون رایحه اش رو دوست دارم تا تمام میشه تهیه اش می کنمم

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is a very pleasant masculine scent. It strikes just the right balance between clean, fresh, invigorating and sharp(ish) notes. The citrus opening quickly gives way to the green woody core. The tobacco note is very mild and doesn't bother me. This is a safe blind buy for your man, and a great refreshing scent for warmer days.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Wow, so many performance 'issues'. Makes me wonder if people expect every frag to be "beast mode"? Classyness doesnt have to yell, and this stuff is classy. I dont find this to have any worse performance than most of my other frags. Great scent, projects and lasts more than people make it seem.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This fragrance. Just wow. Good job, Gucci. Good job letting an awesome fragrance go to waste because of hall of fame shitty sillage and longevity. At least try to make the longevity and sillage semi-bad, and not downright awful, so your customers will at least try to forgive how ridiculous the performance is. I last longer in bed than this fragrance. In fact, if I were to apply this fragrance before sex, the fragrance would vaporize before I was done. Maybe that should have been the slogan: "Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme. The fragrance that is gone before you come".

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is very dissapointing. Smells quite nice at first --then 15 minutes later almost nothing. Very very disappointing. I'll be ebaying my bottle after this review. It's also made by proctor and Gamble --another disappointing note. Expected far far more from Gucci.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
It smells good but I don't get very many compliments on it. Just smells like a generic cologone. Maybe slightly better. Deffintially worth keeping in the collection though!
Scent:8/10
Sillage:5/10
Longevity:10/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Revisited this one today and all I can say is wow! I used to just spray this on just before leaving the house in a t shirt and jeans not thinking about how I wanted to smell. I always thought That it smelled good and would do for the moment. Upon closer sniff, this fragrance has a bit of depth to it. The opening of this scent is almost minty, the cypress and violet really play nicely off of each other and the citrus is present, but restrained. The mid notes of tobacco and jasmine come through with subtlety, giving some warmth and sweetness after the minty opening.
