It's at the mid notes that you get a craving for more of what this scent has to bring, but it is also at this point that the scent just seems to restrain itself. We get a nice resinous, leathery finish framed by a bit of patchouli. Is it a bad scent? Not at all. Is it innovative? No. Will it go well with a field jacket, a clean tee, jeans, and some Stan Smiths on a date night? Yes!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Long time signature scent from long ago. I still love it in my collection. Perfect for work , very versatile. I give it a 6/10
Check out my blog, link in my profile.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
This has been my signature scent since it was first gifted to me in 2010. I still own a bottle from that period, which has always been stored in a humid environment with daily temperature fluctuations (my bathroom). To this day, there is no detectable change in the scent or its performance (the latter being meh to start with). It is unquestionably a sturdy fragrance.

The scent can be described in one word - suave. Wear this with a tux or dinner suit and you'll be shifting your 007 swag mode into overdrive. Seductive 'femmes fatales' will try to kill you, guaranteed. It's an all-season, semi-formal/formal, evening-only fragrance best suited for when you're playing baccarat at the big boys table.

I imagine most blind-buy purchasers do not regret their decision.

EDIT (Sept 13th): I bought a new bottle with the newer name. They watered it down. Oh well.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Overlooked and underrated. Ignore the haters, the fact that there are many women praising this one should clue you in. Sexy and intriguing while still being office safe. Recommended.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: if you wear a suit to work then you have just found the perfect work scent. with 6-8 hours of longevity and moderate silage this baby comes off as a pleasant and inoffensive scent. its mature and serious without being old manish or outdated. there is some sweetness and flowers in the background that balance the heavy cypress, tobacco and leather accord. Perfect balance between the dark and lighter notes. The final result is quiet sublime and extremely classy.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Ultimate men's fragerance!!! This is so sophisticated, warm, romantic, seductive, sexy and classy. Quite an underrated perfume but one of the best out there for men. Smells expensive. It is a modern yet a very classic scent. This will drive women crazy. I can see a young man with class and an edge wearing this. But also ideal for a maturer man also. Smells manly and clean. Plus love the masculine chic bottle.Love it xoxo
Sauve!!!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
My previous review was about this fragrance being fantastic, but lacking the performance. I sampled it 2 days ago and it lasted around 5 hours. It was quite ok but the sillage was still poor. I put a lot of thought on it and decided to buy it anyway. I passed this because of the performance, but the scent is so amazing that I can't resist it anymore. Many said it is generic, but to me, it is a refreshing winter scent. Maybe others won't notice this fragrance, but other don't notice The One EDP, GPH 2 or L'homme too. I enjoy them and I will enjoy this too.

Scent: 10/10
Longevity: 5/10
Sillage: 3/10

Even the performance is bad, just go on and buy this beauty. I changed my opinion and I hope you will too.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Very masculine. Nice tobacco scent and really spicy. I don't get the powdery notes people mention. Women seem to enjoy it so that is a plus obviously. Projection is ok for 2 or 3 hours. Longevity isn't great unfortunately. About 5 or 6 hours and it is pretty much gone.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Got a decant of this and tried it. No opinion of this whatsoever. Smells fine, not great, not bad. Longevity about 2-3 hours. Not impressed with performance. Nothing to get excited or disappointed about.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: What's that I smell? And where are my clothes?

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme a great manly smell!

Gucci smells really masculine and you get tobacco, patchouli, cypress and bergamot with some other notes mixed in. It's a manly scent, and signature worthy.

The downside is performance. I get about 2-3 hours with weak projection. It's a shame because this one smells awesome. With better performance, it would be a super star.

You will get some compliments with this one shortly after applying. But it fades so fast that nobody will be able to smell it after a while. But it does smell great and it is suitable for any time of year and nearly every occasion.

8 of 10.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
This perfume is amazing.Very clean sweet and so mouth watering.I can't explain it in words,i mean when i wear this it feels like i am not on earth i am in heaven.This is the most underrated frag i had ever encounter.Not only girls,but woman,man and even teenager enjoyed it on me.Alot of happiness captured inside a bottle.It is moderate scent and after few hours it just become skin scent.But you will not gonna stop smelling your shirt and palm again and again.This is just a pure perfection.
Scent 10/10
Projection 8/10
Longevity 8/10.....Peace....

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
This in my opinion is the last great
release from the house of Gucci, i
absolutely love this masculine powdery
tobbaco smelling masterpice, i would have
put this among my top 10 if it wasnt for the
poor longevity and sillage, still a great buy.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I don't like designer perfumes and at first I was really skeptical to this Gucci scent. They always try to maximize their profit and do not care much about quality. First when I sprayed this, It smelled very boring and mainstream but after an hour it smells really different. I love the dry down. The only question that needs to be answered is whether I should buy a bottle or not. I think I will try it at least 2 or 3 times more before taking any decision.

Scent: 5/10 the first hour, 8/10 for the dry down
Longevity: 6/10
Projection: 6/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: James Franco and this scent is really the same. Both aren't attractive enough. The outside is ok. It's even very sparkling. But the inside is very...nothing to talk about. It's fresh. It's soft. The opening is very...headache because of all the nothing new ingredients combining with eachother. Modern, young, fresh. Just so. The base notes are not something new or special.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: The scent is amazing but the performance is so poor that it will be a pass for me. I fell in love with the opening and it as beautiful. I wanted to give it a try to see the dry down but after a short time the scent disappeared. It wasn't there. No one will notice this fragrance unless they look so close that they can see your blood flow. This fragrance is same as Gucci Pour Homme 2 for me. It smells amazing but not worth buying due to performance.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This is a nice fragrance, easy to wear and a very comfortable smell, my only issue is the longevity... I emptied a full 1.5ml sample and after 1 hour is gone... WTF??? It was a bad sample or really has an awful longevity?

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
scent : 8/10
sillage : 5/10
longevity :3/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: first of all, i have to say very sorry for this perfume. very weak sillage and longevity. i put 10 spray but it still weak. fresh bright juice - nice scent but....again, weak projection. i bought it just for reference

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
scent : 8/10
sillage : 6/10
longevity :6/10
70% day / 30% night fragrance
reminds me a little bit of Burberry london (more green and peppery)
nice tobacco and earthy scent

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
very soft
smells awesome
But i want it to hold longer........
sillage is weak
Worth loving still..........

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: One of my to-go perfume since 2010. Smells so Sexy and manly. Cant go wrong with it. the only con is that sillage is poor. Top-5 for sure!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Now it's called simply Gucci Pour Homme. The box is not plain grey now but has 2 vertical stripes.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
despite all negative reviews, i like this perfume. it's really calming, well-balanced and classy fragrance that suits beautifully to gentlemen over 35.
thank you Gucci

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: It opens with a smooth, elegant tobacco. The woodsy cypress is also there. It's a great smelling, mature fragrance. The performance is terrible though, like others have said, after 30 minutes or so it becomes a skin scent. To smell it, I literally have to place my wrist to my nose, such a shame.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I wanted to add a ladies perspective to the reviews here, as I felt this one could be very wearable and unisex, and I wasn't wrong. It opens a bit more 'masculine' but that warms up very quickly into a sweet floral tobacco scent that features some very interesting notes. I love the elemi in this (I don't have many fragrances that feature that note, in fact). But on me, this is predominantly a tobacco/violet/amber fragrance and that's what makes it so wearable for either gender. I've only had it on a couple of hours and the only other thing I can say is, it's not a powerhouse. It's quite softer than I expected, but still smells lovely. Definitely pleased with this purchase.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Not bad as commercial perfume goes, and good for a season, but not something I could develop a life long love for

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Love the bergamot opening and the drydown is very pleasant with wood notes. Trying to identify the tobacco in there, maybe it's part of the greenish fresh scent that I enjoy. However, as other reviewers have stated, in not much time it becomes a very light scent, but that's where it's solidly understated, when so many other colognes become cloying or tiring. really wish it was stronger though. As G. Georgiev stated, I'll look for an intense/extreme version, unless I can find a good price because I do really like this one.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Soft sexy scent, does project overly well but I think for a scent like this it's perfect. It's intimate anyone in your personal space can smell it and it draws them in, great for a night out or a date.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: It was reformulated and redesigned the box , And on the bottle now the name is just gucci pour homme

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
با سلام
بوی بسیار شیک و جذابی دارد
با احترام

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
i wore this n wat i wanna says....

its boring.. im sorry. doesnt impress me at all, n the longevity poor, silage poor. its generic over all.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
Great scent. This is an office scent, a scent for a well-dressed and elegant man. The bottle design is very good. Longevity is moderate and sillage is non-existent. I read in previous comments that 6 years ago it was with decent longevity and sillage. Such a shame for watering down this scent. It could be my favourite if it was stronger.

Great scent but it's too weak. It doesn't worth its money. Waiting for very intense or EDP version or the old version. I will skip it till then.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
3 sprays on my neck and I am good for all day.
The projection is moderate for the first 6 hours, then it gets close to your skin, but in a good way.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
If this lasted on my skin I'd buy 10 more bottles. But it's too weak - how bad.
Love it anyway

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: @sly_92 no way , hatem is much older then gucci

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Prety good scent، maybe more for mature men. Hatem by Rasasi is a much cheaper well-done replica, give it a try if u like the Gucci.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
I've enjoyed reading how much this fragrance has split opinion. It's been slated for being generic, whilst others have referred to it as a masterpiece. In terms of availabel High Street fare, this IS different. My first spritz on a test strip in Boots this morning and I was like 'urgh, this is some dank musty rubbish - what is this smell?!'. Tobacco. Lovely moist, smokey tobacco seeping through the cypress and bergamot. Sure, berganot is found in most frags. However, the tobacco note sets this aside the deluge of citrus / fresh spicy scents out there at the moment (Sept 2015). I can smell the amber and patchouli on dry-down, and it adds depth, which combines to make a great masculine accord. The downside is the longevity, which has been noted by numerous folk before me - its not great. The answer? Top it up with a discrete travel dispenser! This is far from generic. Its a good, solid, interesting day / night, all ocassion scent.

Have a great day!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content:
My initial review of this was very negative, but I decided to give the dusty bottle a second try recently. I imagine I must have first tried this in the summer when I was overwhelmed with some sweetness that I never liked. On a cold, winter day (or is it that my appreciation for cologne has changed?), this is in fact very likable. Very smooth tobacco with a nice sweet (but not the repulsive synthetic Chanel-like sweetness) leathery vibe to it, this is very easy to overdo (spray VERY gently!). Extremely strong projection, lasts very long and stays on clothes. I bought this a few years back, so I have no idea whether it's been reformulated as some folks say.
Conclusion: A frag with a lot of character that you should try in the winter, at night. Definitely not a summer scent and I don't imagine using this for the office.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: This seems like another good, safe fragrance on the market. It smells familiar if that makes sense. It is certainly nothing groundbreaking. Not to mention, the performance just isn't great. This may be officially dropped from my wish list.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: I think they should launch edp version

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Pour Homme Gucci
review_content: Nice but not a masterpiece

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Category: Soft spicy, pink floral, powdery

Notes: Sprays on a vibrant citrus and gently leathery osmanthus, soon joined by peony, an almost liquoricey pink pepper and a smooth, ever so slightly powdery sandalwood. With time the rose and rosy nuances of the pink pepper become more apparent. The overall scent impression is a soft, slightly spicy and rosy, pink floral.

Vibe: Red licorice. Velvet. Cabriolet. Rose flavored marshmallows. Leather couch. Plaid pencil skirt and blazer. Black rimmed glasses. Massage therapy. Morning green tea. Laptop. Inner city parking. Portfolio. Saleswoman. Friday.

Sillage: 6.5/10. Pretty impressive sillage for an EdT I must admit. Doesn't project a ton, but I wouldn't classify it as intimate either. It does lose strength with time and within a few hours it is however pretty much a skin scent.

Longevity: 4/10. Longevity is less impressive, lasted me about 3-4 hours before it was so soft it was barely detectable.

Wear: Day or evening, personally I'm leaning evening. I think this is a little too heavy for summer wear so I'd say probably best suited as a spring or fall perfume. A traditionally feminine scent most suited for age ranges 30-55. Office wear approved as it is very toned down and inoffensive.

Overall rating: 6/10. So completely not my kind of frag, but I can't deny it is a very pleasant wear. I'd say this is the smoother, softer sister of Burberry’s The Beat - they share the same sort of powdery, soft and yet mature scent profile. Where The Beat is a bit overwhelming and problematic for people prone to get scent induced headaches, nausea or asthma, Flora by Gucci EdT is a lot more well-blended, subdued with a quiet poise. I think for those expecting a traditional peony fragrance, there's a risk of disappointment as I don't find this to represent what I know the fragrance note to be. What it does however carry with it from the peony is the maturity, making it feel a lot more adult and refined. To me the citrus, pink pepper and rose are what carry this scent, although I wouldn’t call it a rose scent either. Probably best described as a mildly powdery, soft and spicy pink floral.

Who would wear it?: Casey Novak in Law & Order: SVU.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
My name is Flora so I had to get myself a bottle of this! It’s a lovely, graceful sunshine fragrance, far more interesting than the recent Gucci Flora line. Wear this in the spring and summer and it’s like you’re walking through an English country garden, full of lush flowers, with a hint of nearby grasses and woodland blowing on the breeze.
ps. sometimes on my skin this smells like mint choc chip icecream - which can only be a good thing...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I fell in love with Gucci Flora EDT when it was first released, and I still adore it, even though they’ve changed it quite a bit over the years. It smells like a garden full of big, luscious peonies and other delicate flowers right after a summer rainfall…fresh, dewy, and softly floral.

There’s something so beautiful about it, like a gentle breeze carrying the scent of blooming petals. It’s delicate yet radiant, never overwhelming, just the perfect balance of airy florals and light sweetness. A delicate, feminine fragrance that still holds a special place in my heart.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This is my go-to everyday scent! It's fresh and floral without being overpowering. The citrus notes make it bright and uplifting, while the rose adds a touch of sweetness. Perfect for spring and summer!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Another fragrance I can’t believe they discontinued. Years later I still have a couple of bottles but will miss this fragrance when I run out.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Love this fragrance! Reminds me of my teenage party years as I wore it religiously , it lasts a very long time, on skin and clothes. I’ll have a shower and can still smell this on me. Its projection for a toilette is amazing! It’s a really nice fruity floral, defiantly smell the orange in this I can’t smell rose in particular , maybe more peony florals but it’s just so lovely. I would get this for a teen, but as an adult I would still wear this aswell if I want something that people are going to smell. 100% a compliment getter too. I thought all these years I had a parfum but only now I’ve looked at the bottle it’s a toilette and I’m pleasantly surprised !

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A scent that falls into the category of “generic perfumey” but in a likeable way, similar in feel to Burberry’s Weekend. Peony/rose and patchouli would belie any attempt to pass this off as one’s natural aroma, but the osmanthus and sandalwood soften and blur the edges so it’s hard to say exactly where skin stops and this begins. It’s missing something texturally for me, but provides a pleasant fruity floral base for layering.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Fresh, clean and feminine. The soft floral scent is no doubt great for spring and summer wear.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I'm not a fan of patchouli at all, although there are fragrances that I love that contain patchouli when blended correctly such as Love Story by Chloe. This is a beautiful floral fragrance and it's blended beautifully. I'd say that this is probably the most detectable patchouli that I can stand and still love the fragrance. In this instant it works so well,just as it does with Gorgeous Gardenia and Gorgeous Jasmine. I love them all.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Is it out of production or just cannot find it in my city?

Gorgeous floral scent, light, fresh, it is the BASE for all the other Gucci floral scents you see on the market today. The DNA is very traceable and distinct, but I still do not like any of the new variations as much as the classic Gucci Flora. It is feminine, for an elegant lady, yet nothing over the top. Was my signature in my twenties. Definitely a compliment getter. Would like to purchase it again, but some people who managed to put their hands on this scent recently say it has changed. Not sure what to make of it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I received it as a gift from a very close friend and after smelling it I was quite surprised she picked this one for me.
There is something irritating in this perfume and I can not put my finger on it.
Been trying for almost a year to fall for it but I just can't.
It's probably more masculine than I'm comfortable with.
I wouldn't blind buy it myself.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Another fruity floral ruined by patchouli.

Review of official carded spray sample that came free with purchase.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I thought I’m gonna wear it like light flower fragrance like modern Gucci Gardenia in green bottle, but day later it smells like Zielinski Rozen - Orange, Jasmine and Vanilla! Good to wear in the evening.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This is my top 3 fragrances. Floral sweet sophisticated fresh tender fresh clean, not basic or monotone at all. It's perfect for humid and hot weather. It's my signature scent in summer of all time !!!

Please keep it continued. I watched in a video from Soki London that it will be discontinued this year, which is soooo sad. Please please please keep it continued !!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I tested both the Parfum and the toilette form of this perfume yesterday on my smell trip and as I am consulting my notes I made yesterday this morning I liked the parfum much better. It was deeper and richer, the toilette is a bit watered down. Gucci Flora is a pretty orange and citrus scent w/ a nice osmanthus heart. The parfum had a nice soft spicy scent as well, the pink pepper wasnt' overdone. I got zero peony w/ this yesterday, which is fine w/ me since I'm not a huge peony fan. If you like osmanthus and would like to have an osmanthus scent that is a bit more casual than a Burberry Society this is a good one to get before they are all gone since it is being discontinued.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This has been reformulated and the look is different too, it is a green juice now. It used to be very nice, I really enjoyed the old formulation. Now it’s just a shadow of what it once was. There is something missing, that made the fragrance for me. It’s just a meh fragrances now which is a shame.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: What is happening with quality?

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I first purchased the EDT about two months ago and thought the EDP was worth purchasing too. While very similar in composition their performances are surprisingly different.. Gucci Flora EDP is a deeper, richer concentration but it is more intimate. The EDT on the other hand is a tamer concentration but it amps the volume in sillage and projection. The opening is an explosion of garden flowers and osmanthus notes. It is almost like spraying your own garden bubble out of a bottle!
It will be fun to test these in the upcoming warm months!
My opinion, the edt is the better purchase. The edp's competing edge is slightly better longevity.
Another moment of honesty, I found the scent off putting in colder weather so wait until warmer months for its beauty.
Still keeping both. I will be layering edp under edt!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I was expecting this to be really boring, which it is, but it is also far lovelier than I assumed it would be. It makes itself a little more interesting with the "osmanthus" note which is not really osmanthus but is that nice apricot-y fruity-floral that I tend to gravitate towards. It's light, simple, non-offensive.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This is one of my favorite perfumes.
It's definitely unique in my opinion and I have yet to smell something similar to it.
The top notes I smell is peony and citrus. Very fresh, girly and clean.
However, once it starts to dry down its creamy, a little powdery and definitely a lot of osmanthus.
I personally don't get any of the bottom notes, however it does last long on the skin and it probably has a lot to do with the pink pepper.
I would recommend this fragrance because it's definitely hard to dislike, therefore I think its a safe blind buy if you like soapy yet sweet, clean scents.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: If you want fresh cut florals this is not it. It smells like the dumpster behind a florist shop, wilted flowers fermenting under the humid sun. Accented by some musty musky smell

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
How does this smell like fresh floral, creamy, slight spicy rain? It does and I love it. Especially for rainy, cold days it fits the aroma so well while having a sophisticated feel to it.

The opening is a bit sharp, I was afraid I wouldn't love it, but after an hour or two it's a creamy fresh floral I adore. This with the osmanthus that give it a citrusy peach vibe that's fizzy, uplifting and highly youthful.

The sillage/scent trail is gorgeous and lasts about 4-5 hours on my skin while being a skin scent for 7.

Usually I have a dislike for patchouli but I really like it in this as it is complemented by the pink pepper and sandalwood that makes it everso earthy, creamy with the slightest fresh pink pepper spice. Smells natural but not dirty.

Might become my signature

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Gucci Flora EDT is not for my particular taste. My senses are hit with a clash between the citrus and pink pepper. Also, the dry down is just too acidic and bitter for me. I've been layering this fragrance with sweeter scents in order to enjoy the high quality juice. For instance, Jo Malone or Aerin scents can be acceptable layers to Gucci Flora EDT. Finally, I plan on unloading this beautiful bottle. It belongs to someone who loves the scent!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
You know how it seems like some high school drama productions are only held together by the cheapest can of hairspray, 5-Hour Energy (orange flavor), and an animalistic need for attention?

Well, now you do.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A straight up hippie scent. It has a boho vibe, always makes me think of Florence Welch. It smells really nice, but not beautiful imo. It just takes a right woman for this one I think. I think somebody whos into taxidermy and who enjoys vibing in dusty attics and old books and such. Everytime I wear it I feel so weird tbh. Most Guccis in my opinion lack in the department of magic and so does this one, but either way try before you buy.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Have you ever smelled a tweenager's meth lab?

No?

Neither had I, Gucci Flora. Neither had I.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
When my perfume collection was <10 bottles, this was the most grown-up perfume I had. It was the first foray into florals stronger than just backing up a fruity composition, and was intoxicating to my boyfriend at the time. I think his appreciation for it deepened my liking for it. Revisiting it years later, it is pleasant, it is unique, but I don't think I like it as much as I did back then. (And neither does he - he doesn't recognize it!) The bottle is hefty and super pretty on top of a vanity, though.

The scent pyramid is pretty accurate. Smelled from the cap, it's a very blended mishmash of peony, citrus fruits (but not in a really fresh/uplifting way, just in a non-jammy way), and osmanthus. Once sprayed, the drydown has a muskier and sweet osmanthus shining through, with the citrus long gone. It lasts about 6 hours on skin, and at least the day on clothes.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
To me, this smells like a rainy day. You're inside with the windows cracked open to let in the fresh air, the smell of a calm, peaceful, yet slightly humid scene. This is truly comforting. This is a clean floral without being sharp or screechy or soapy. It's bright, beautiful, and cozy. I've never smelled anything like it before.
If I could bottle happiness, this is what I'd bottle. This is a life-er for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Obviously, this is a very floral fragrance. I don’t own too many florals, but the ones I do have, I think very highly of them.
It is very floral on the skin, but I like that little touch of musk (that’s what I tend to smell anyway, anyone agree?) that links with the floral notes, making it even nicer in my opinion, more natural and airy. More a day scent than a night scent for me. I’d love to wear this while having a stroll in the park, maybe having a coffee with a friend outside in the park or the beach... (I tend to imagine the perfect thing to be doing whilst wearing a particular perfume, and that’s what came to mind when I was thinking and smelling Gucci flora)

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Flora EDT is a citrusy floral fragrance with some spice and woodsy notes in the base. The osmanthus is actually very beautiful in this composition. It’s a fruity-floral note in its own right, so it interplays well with the mandarin and other citruses. The rose helps to balance it by deepening the floral profile. This is a bright, Spring-ish fragrance that reminds me of a morning stroll on a warm day. It’s very traditional, but still well done. I could easily wear this to work or out for errands. A good everyday, pick-me-up type of scent.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
My God, this scent is gorgeous.

I think this was the first and only time I have asked a girl which fragrance was she wearing. We were close friends during the university years. This scent on hers was beautiful, and she was too - literally an amazing combination!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Good scent but forgetable.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Someone gave me a sample of Flora EDT with a swap, otherwise I wouldn't have tried it because it sounds a little boring to me. Well, what can I say, it's sure not the most original scent on earth but I actually enjoy it.
Osmanthus is clearly the most important note here with it's apricot-like floral scent. I also smell the light and airy peony and something creamy and musky. There is no musk listed, so maybe this supposed to be the sandalwood, even though it doesn't smell like sandalwood to me. What I like about Flora EDT is that it's rather warm for such a light, clean scent. The citrus notes don't overpower everything else. This smells a little synthetic and like it could be some everyday body care product, but think of a nice hair mask rather than a shampoo. Nothing I would buy for myself, but not bad.
I have never tried the EDP so I can't compare.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Flora, a bottled bouquet of Asian osmanthus flowers. I have smelled actual osmanthus which is so prominent in Good Girl Gone Bad By Kilian. It smells like a flat with all its windows closed, on a hot summer day, a flat filled with flowers and nothing else. With peonies and osmanthus. It is very very dense smell, floral and somewhat pollen like. In Gucci Flora, osmanthus is comined with citruses to provide it that open window freshness, to speak in a metaphor. As it dries down, Flora becomes clearly more and more floral. The base of patchouli doesn't really come through a lot but the pink pepper in the base does, yet again providing some freshness. Flora isn't exactly modern, but not vintage either I find it a little undefined.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Out of all the Gucci Floras I've tried so far this is my favorite to date. Opens with a creamy citrus, in particular Mandarin which I love, followed by peony, a light rose, and a fruity osmanthus. I love the apricot vanilla scent of Osmanthus. It is such a mellow floral that is so pretty giving this scent a luscious sweetness. There is a softness to this scent that is really nice despite the pink pepper which is barely detectable. Very smooth and gentle, nothing overwhelming or sharp. Longevity is a little disappointing lasting only a few hours but silage is nice, if a little on the soft side. This will be a nice go-to during the warmer days of the spring and summer. I'm curious to try the eau de parfum of this scent and wonder how much of a difference there is in scent, silage, and longevity. I'm willing to bet it is just as pretty as this is.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This is a lovely floral. It’s sweeter than the edp, but it is not cloying. It’s fresh and a bit powdery. It’s feminine and uplifting, but is not as special as the edp. It’s still good though. It’s soft and elegant and romantic. This is for a joyful and dreamy young lady.
Good choice for spring and summer.
Final note: 8/10

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
You must wear Gucci Flora on skin! I know that paper does not do justice to any perfume, but it is especially the case with Flora!
On skin it is absolutely gorgeous, citrusy but not sharp, floral but not overly, with some muskiness underneath. I cannot detect much patchouli or pepper. It is peonies, citrus notes, a huge huge dose of osmanthus, very very pretty osmanthus and some light muskiness.
I am surprised how much I love it because from the notes it does not look special. Flora has some kind of note of elegance. It is so, so wildly elegant!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This is a lovely fresh floral. I find it quite sweet and pretty linear on the whole, at drydown it’s just a softer version of the first spray. I thought I’d gone off this but I was determined to finish the last 1ml in the bottle so have been wearing it over the weekend and can remember now why it used to be a favourite, when I had simple tastes in the days before I became a fragrance junkie with no loyalty to anything! It’s pretty inoffensive, office safe and mostly suited to spring or summer. There’s so many now I only feel able to wear in winter so this definitely wouldn’t make the mark in colder weather for me. The sillage is average, longevity could be better I think, about 4-5 hours on me. I probably won’t repurchase, there are stacks I like more than this now, but I’d be happy to receive it as a gift and it would a safe blind buy.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Flora smells of yesteryear.
Innocent pepper disguised as a beautiful well-balanced peony and osmanthus, elixir of sophisticated vibe.
Occasionally I wear drops of some vials I have for a long time, so it's like Flora has always belonged to me.

Now the packaging has been renewed and is spectacular to the eye, a tasteful packaging that perfectly reflects the precious content.
To me Flora's got the perfect score.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
While far from "a sensual, young girl", I happen to enjoy this EDT quite a bit! I am a fan of osmanthus in perfumes. I like the floral, fruity sweetness it brings to most compositions and it really holds this fragrance together so that it reads a bit more fruity floral than strictly floral. Fruity florals do tend to be marketed more to the youthful audience, and as a grown woman, I'm not particularly interested in smelling like a strawberry, but I do like a peach/apricot note, which osmanthus imparts. It works well with the peony, creating a light, somewhat sweet fragrance perfect for spring days and after a shower. I also own Generous Violet from the same collection, which I am also fond of, but I enjoy this one a little bit more. Has decent longevity and sillage for an EDT. I will reach for this quite a bit throughout this spring!

EDIT - Just sprayed a bit of this on the back of my hand and still really like it. I read through many of the reviews and I sense a paradox - so many people refer to this as "generic", and yet if you read the reviews, both positive and negative, I began to see that what makes this work or not work for people really varies, so maybe this isn't quite the simple little perfume most seem to assume it is. I found it interesting that so many experienced a metallic note. If I smelled that, I would scrub it off immediately, as that quality would send me running for the hills! So either it is skin chemistry, or Gucci has a serious quality control issue going on. I'm glad it works for me!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This Gucci is very good! Floral, sweet and fruity to my nose. Enchanting, delicate and feminine. Beautiful osmanthus and a very modest rose. Citruses well measured by the Peony. Dry-down with Patchouli and Pepe. Really well done. Fresh, beautiful.CHEERFUL PERFUME!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Attractive sweet floral and citrus notes with an overbearing woody patchouli base. Smells good going on for a bit, quickly becomes bothersome, while still kind of pleasant at the same time. Somehow I like sampling it but want it off of my skin, cause there are no less than 20 scents I might rather smell like than this, lol. Young,obnoxious, but has some sophistication. Cute bottle, but the smell is a reminder that I never have to settle for that which doesn't become me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I used three bottles of Flora in 2010-2011. That's a lot for me. I was deeply in love with Flora but I think I seriously overdosed so I can't imagine wearing it in any near future.

Anyway, the scent is amazing. Gorgeous florals and spicy fruit. It's probably the underlying pink pepper that gives the perfume this lovely, spicy edge that is not too sharp though. That interesting edgy note reminds me of raspberry mixed with salty liquorice. Very nice!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: i'm a floral girl through and through. so i blind bought this one thinking i'm surely going to love it based on the reviews here. But on my skin this is really strong(1 spray) and cloying. it was overwhelming at first. once it dried down, it was pleasant enough and stayed on me the entire day. will keep the bottle but will only wear it for night outs.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: An instant scrubber. I have a bottle of CK One that's 12 years old and some of the notes have long gone sour- Gucci flora reminded me in part of that bottle. Add with it sucking on a penny. Somewhere in there are pleasant flower notes but the sourness was so off-putting I can't appreciate them. Pass.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I somehow ended up with two big bottles of this. I guess one is going to have to be a gift. I have to say, this is not my favorite. Every Gucci perfume that I have ever tried has been too mild and my nose can barely smell any of them, this one included. It is just SO faint to me. I know a lot of people just love this, and I wish I could really smell it. This is not necessarily bad but not great either. Can take it or leave it. For reference my signature scent is Chloe EDT and EDP. I also love Kenzo World Intense. I guess I am used to VERY strong perfume. This does not cut it for me. I guess I can just wear it around the house...kind of disappointed. I keep buying Gucci hoping I will finally buy one that is strong enough to project but so far not so good.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: hm i tried the EDT sample and fell in love with it so much, lots of people complimented it, too so i guess the EDP could be even better - at least in sillage, i got the EDP version and it turns to be so powdery floral which i dislike. EDT is much softer and light, lovely feminine and heavenly floral. well at least i could save some bucks purchasing the EDT. what a shame. two versions are definitely different.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Light floral, pleasant and not offensive, smells different then EDP.
Great for warm weather, average longevity.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
A scent of femininity.

Flora is a scent of pleasant springtime, cruising between crisp floral and feminine freshness. Relate-able, non-offensive but without a wow factor - just like a PG rated innocent romance. Fragile and demure.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: The tester I tried must have been gone off - it is meant to be a gorgeous perfume, but it had an acrid and sour undertone on me which went through a phase of `okay, but smells like Lanvin Rumeur and SJP Lovely` and then..it turned into the smell of the cold cream my grandma used in the 80s on her hands and cracked heels..Didn`t impress me at all, and then I saw the price tag! I must try again elsewhere, as I refuse to believe that this particular tester wasn`t gone off..The bottle is truly lovely, and that is a fact.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Stronger than the sister scent gorgeous gardenia to me but nevertheless a nice, floral musky smell. I wear it on sunny, cooler days but it doesn’t last as long on me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Fruity resinous. It does have some metallic note as others mentioned in reviews. For some reason this 'metallic' reminds me swimsuit, therefor for me it is more as summer perfume. EDT is more fruity, but EDP more floral and airy. It is feminine, elegant, lovely and dreamy. There is something that makes it classy. Sugary, but not too sweet. Pepper and citrus note in background. I wish I could like it more, but alas too synthetic resinous for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I don't know what it is about this scent that does it, but this is the only perfume that's ever made me feel sick. Even one sniff of this knocks me. Nope.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I'm not a big fan of this or the EDP. They both smell sour, medicinal, and metallic.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: All i get from this is a floral metallic smell, pretty one dimensional as well.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Overpowering and just plain headache inducing. One little spray makes me nauseous.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I made the mistake of buying a 2.5 oz bottle without smelling a sample first. It really is just a dry and dusty smell of flowers that LINGERS.

Though I must say I'm impressed with the longevity this eau de toilette has. You'll smell this for days afterwards.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: All Gucci perfumes have that offputting metallic base very headache inducing so I'll pass...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I adore this fragrance! Got it as a gift from my mother without ever having even tried it before, and it was love at first sniff. I don't find it boring at all, I think it's quite elegant yet very wearable. One of my favourites!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I wanted to love it so much!

Look at the bottle if nothing else, it's so pretty! The notes seemed promising. Rose, osmanthus, sandalwood - I expected so much from it. Rose is my favorite, osmanthus is in my signature, sandalwood keeps intriguing me. The promise was there - Flora could have been stunning.

Didn't happen though.

It smells like... for the lack of a better comparison... dusty water. Edp, edt... doesn't matter. It's boring. A pretty shell with the most unmemorable scent stored in it. It's as disappointing as a broken promise.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I absolutely love this fragrance. It smells so good. I love they floral that's in where. I'm not great with notes. But this smells amazing from first sprints to the dry down. This quickly became one of my favorites.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Flora was very sweet and boring to me. No depth to this scent and gives me a slight headache.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Gucci flora seems to have safe notes for me so I didn't expect to dislike it
I received a free decant sample of it with my other purchases and I don't know whether it's edt or edp.I just know that I dislike it with all my heart just because there's something in it that ruins it for me.I can detect peony and mandarin orange as dominant notes,it could be a pleasant floral-citrus combo if there was not this wierd note in it.there's something that smells like oxidated metal.like a piece of old metal that is wet and oxidation process has ruined most parts of it.as time passes this metal thing becomes even more prominant.horrible smell of metal can easily shadow flower and citrus as it does in this perfume.it must be something about my body chemistry because I'm sure a perfume can't be made to smell like this.almost always I try to give time to perfumes so I usually don't wash after applying perfumes even if I don't like them.but I couldn't Tolerate this metal smell so I had to scrub it.it even gave me a toothache,like biting a piece of metal
I guess it must be something about pink pepper.I disliked it so much that I feel I can't try any new perfume at least for a week
❤
باتوجه به اینکه گوچی فلورا عطر معروف و محبوبی هست یا با شیمی بدن من سازگار نیست و یا سمپل که ازش تست کردم خراب بوده..رایحه غالب این عطر به مشامم ترکیبی از گل صدتومانی، پرتقال شیرین و یه نت وحشتناک مثل آهن زنگ زده هست که هرچی بیشتر زمان میگذره شدیدتر میشه..اگه این بوی آهن زنگ زده نبود می تونست یه عطر معتدل و گلی،مرکباتیه سیف باشه اما متاسفانه هست و باعث شد حتی من که اصلاً عادت ندارم به پاک کردن عطر،مجبور شم اپل با صابون و بعد با پنبه الکلی بیفتم به جون پوستم..حس میکنم این بوی زنگ آهن زیر سر فلفل صورتی هست بهرصورت تجربه خیلی بدی بود.این بو حتی باعث میشه دندونم تیر بکشه دقیقاً مثل اینکه یه تیکه آهن گاز زده باشم
درباره موندگاری و پخش نمیتونم چیزی بگم چون بعد یه ساعت نتونستم طاقت بیارم و پاکش کردم
❤

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: There's a note which gives me headache and I think it is the rose. Dislike this.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Lovely bright fresh floral, then 10 minutes later - soap. Dishsoap, specifically. Nothing else, just quietly soapy wrists. Glad it's just a test vial.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
A lovely girl at work gifted this half bottle to me today, I really love it, it was not exciting at first spray but the dry down mellows out beautifully on me. Just that gorgeous hint of a scent.
My fav at the moment is the new YSL Mon Paris....

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Soft, comforting, feminine and pleasant. This is appropriate for the office and is great for all seasons. There is nothing sharp about this fragrance, it's very mellow and has descent longevity and sillage.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This is fresh and bright. Like a sparkling juice. It's crisp, youthful and the notes dance on skin like Springtime. I cannot tell where the floral ends and the crisp citrus begins. It never fails or falls flat. It never bothers me from start to end. It continues to shine on for hours.

Flora possesses the elegance of freedom. The freedom to be romantic head to toe without any shame.
The bottle is beautiful, simple elegance, warm without being tacky.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: The EDT is a soft floral scent with a mysterious herbal osmanthus. It's color is green. It smells mature but sweet, and there's something fruity about it, probably the citrus. It's easy to wear and very subtle so it's great for wearing to the work place. It's a simple fragrance and smells the same from start to finish. It's a combination light citrus, osmanthus, and patchouli. It's a lovely little garden smell. It reminded me of Quelques Fleurs if it were a light body mist.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I like, I use. it's my everyday floral for now. Notice I am not excited? That's because it's just nice. Like your favorite pair of jeans, not like your favorite sexy dress. The citrus combined with peony and rose work well, but there is no punch, no murkiness, no scandal. the drydown is simple, it just fades, just like those jeans. Still, I use it on a regular basis and am glad it's there, because if it weren't... what would I wear?

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I have just read on the magazines that there is a 'new' Flora EDT, namely Gucci Flora Anniversary Edition. The difference should be the introduction of pear and leather notes - really looking forward to testing it because I am addicted to Flora. Especially now, during the spring.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: My all time favourite (well, top 5 actually). Simple, innocent & very pretty scent. I never get bored or tired to smell Flora. It's a must have in my collection if my bottle was about half way to go. I really love the adds & the commercial. Very captured the feeling of the scent itself. It's floral but been blended tons of citrus fruits. Unfortunately i didn't get too much roses in Flora because i really love rose. It's my favourite flower. I do get the smell of sharp peony & leathery osmanthus to it, along with fresh citrus creamy mandarin, until Flora fades away on me. But in the dried down Flora smells a bit musky (patchouli pink pepper combo) but still buttery creamy floral fruity feel to it. I still remember a year after it released, my best friend bought a gift set and she showed me that and i'm like "OMG are you serious???" And we opened up, tried the whole things in the set..... Oohhhhh my Gucci..... Very pretty Flora.... It's lasts 8 to 10 hours on me with a moderate sillage. Not overpowering. Easy to wear, casual. Quite versatile imo. The bottle are nice too but quite frustrated to get out the pretty juice inside when it's about to finish hahahaaa....

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Gorgeous floral. I really love peony and the pink pepper is for once not nauseating to my nose. Still not special enough to warrant a full bottle in my mind. A few more wearings warranted.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Hmm... I don't know why this one is called 'Flora'. Its not floral enough to have that name.

The floral notes are there, but the citruses dominate the scent from beginning to end, leaving the floral (and sandalwood) notes in the background.

Its a very nice and safe fragrance, nothing special.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This smells like women over 50 shopping at Santana Row in California.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Update Feb. 2016 - made the decision. Returned it today. Just could not be pleased with it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Jan. 2016. I've owned my bottle for years!! Never excites me. I smell more of the bottom notes. Want to smell more of the fresh floral notes. Want to like it, but..., not yet.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Judging by all the positive reviews on this it would be fair to assume that my skin chemistry and this scent just are not a winning combination. On me this just smells super soapy, sour, with cucumber, an underlying touch of some foul animalic, and expired milk. Unfortunately in my case this one is a "scrubber". It just turns my stomach. Forgive me dear fans of this fragrance and anyone reading though the reviews that might be considering this product. This is just my own personal experience. Maybe I would have better luck with it during the warmer months.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
FLORA

Green Floral Gucci

This has got to be the most subdued, delicious patchouli in perfume I have ever had the pleasure of smelling. When I smell a perfume on myself or others, or on blotters, my nose immediately picks up on the foundatin of base notes. The notes listed here as base notes include patchouli and sandalwood. I did not pick up on either. Faint patchouli, like it was in the distant background. I got green notes but it could be the green leaves of patchouli combined with the green leaves of the osmanthus which is found in the heart/middle notes. I didn't get any rose or citrus orange notes. I was able to smell the peony. To me this is a green patchouli-osmanthus with a fragrant peony. It can initially disappoint you as it does sort of smell like a generic you've smelt it before at Macy's or Nordstrom's fragrance. But it's really subtle and complex, despite the simple linear arrangement of notes. It's very mysterious and dark, but still very sweet, like a pretty young girl hiding behind flowers bushes. But she is not innocent nor a child. She is a young lady beckoning a man to join her behind the bushes, for you know what. This is really nice! Bravo Gucci. I would not mind buying another bottle.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This is a beautiful, sweet fragrance.

I first bought this and loved the scent and then returned it because it just felt too light for my past taste.

a year past and I still couldn't get this scent out of my head. I would always smell it when in Ulta or Sephora and love it every time.

I eventually found a bottle at Nordstrom rack on sale ! I have since used the entire bottle and plan on purchasing more.

The sillage on this is not heavy at all. But if you are looking for a feminine, floral and sweet scent that is understated. This is the perfume for you.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Pleasing is how I would describe this. Mildly fruity, with lactonic peach notes, mildly floral (faint jasmine is there), lightly sweet, with a warm bade including vanilla. The middle smells like warm apricot jam scented with vanilla, and is somewhar soapy at times. A your-skin-but-better kind of scent. The drydown is musky and milky, and a hazy fruity - floral aspect is still there.
I agree this scent is suitable for all ages, all seasons and any occasion.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This smells exactly like what I picture Elizabeth Taylor wearing in the original Father of the Bride with Spencer Tracy. Wonderful.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I like this one. Don't love it, but like it. To me this smells really generic. I feel like I keep seeing frags that are recent releases that smell generic. I don't know if I would spend my money on it, but I wouldn't turn it down as a gift, either :-)

This one is pretty linear on me. It smells the same when I first spray it vs many hours later albeit the flowers aren't there so strongly anymore. The citrus and flowers mesh nicely to create a fresh, uplifting feel. There is no sweetness to my nose. The patchouli is what makes me like this a lot. I love patchouli and something about my chemistry really plays it up. The patch here is nice, toned down and gives a woody feel to the florals. Flora reminds me of a bright, sunny early spring day with a nip in the air.

This is an all around nice, very inoffensive fragrence. Good for daytime and would be perfect for the office.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I'm a big fan of osmanthus and peony so this one was a no brainer for me. It's non complex, easy to wear, and lasts a good while. Just a pretty fragrance, simple as that. No more, no less. Great for spring just as others say. It is ironically strong for being made with such "soft smelling" flowers so spray with caution.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Non-offensive floral which is perhaps a bit too generic. I expected to be hit with a floral bouquet a la Beautiful or Dior J'adore but it is woodsy and balmy. A bit hard to distinguish when you are wearing it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I love this. Sex in a bottle. Definitely an evening scent but I wear it during the day just because...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This has been sitting on my mother's vanity for awhile. I read reviews and the notes and knew I wouldn't like it but I tried it anyway.

This smells like too tart and too sweet lemon lime soda pop.

Something about it smells masculine on me. And I have no clue what that is. I do enjoy peony so that a saving grace for me but other than that, I can't tolerate it. I get no pepper or anything remotely spicy.

I think the non descript citrus notes annoy me. There needs to be some balance. Too much!

I'll pass and stay with my Lola by Marc Jacobs that has the peony and rose that I like.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: To me this perfume just smells like spring. It's a floral but very light and not overpowering so great to wear every day. The bottle is quite heavy and definitely has a luxury feel about it. One of my favourites that I go back to again and again

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: There are floral notes here that I get a whiff of and I love them, but they are overpowered by the patchouli or some other non floral and that ruins it for me. The bottle just sits on my shelf and never gets used. I've had it for a few years. I go to it every once in awhile hoping something will change. The floral notes lure me in and I have hope and then I spritz it and remember why I don't wear it. I'd suggest it be reformulated and minimize the patchouli or use a different warmer fragrance for the base.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I'm of two minds about this perfume, but neither of them is love. More like like/hate.
Sometimes when I sniff the bottle I get warm/powdery/rich smells, kind of like Tresor. But I can't wear Tresor either, lol.
Sometimes I smell it and it's just heavy syrupy stale-air-in-boudoir and kind of nauseating.
I've tried it on my skin twice, and it was intriguing, but I wanted a break from it.
This is sad, because it's such a beautiful bottle. (I only have an almost-empty bottle, and it didn't have a bow so I put one of my own on it. It looks so pretty... reminds me of the song "Lemon Tree" LOL)

(I bet many are too young to remember the words, so here is the refrain:

Lemon tree, very pretty, and the lemon flower is sweet
But the fruit of the poor lemon is impossible to eat." )

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Thete are very few perfumes that i truly cant tolerate but this is one of them . I dont know what it is that i am smelling, but it smells like pee on me. Straight up urinal. I actually thought i got a bad sample and went to sephora for a fresh one. Same result. Revolting. And i have not smelled that note in any other fragrance. Can anyone help me identify it......for future reference.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
AHHHHH I'm so sad about this perfume. T_T

I absolutely love the osmanthus flower, their scent is sweet and up lifting, very bright and a little fruity. Real osmanthus is such a joy to smell and during their blooming season you can smell a tree full of osmanthus flowers from miles away!

HOWEVER, the osmanthus in the Gucci Flora is NOTHING like the real flower. I can tell that the main note is suppose to be the osmanthus but it's just a mucky, dirty, and soapy osmanthus. The dry down is a powdery, sweet, but again, murky osmanthus. I thought of the color GREY when I smelled this on my wrist. I was so so sad.

The citrus and other florals are pretty much non-existent on my skin. I don't think there should have had any spice notes in this perfume, it kind of ruin the osmanthus. Or maybe they just didn't get the osmanthus extract right.

It's so hard to find perfumes with osmanthus notes, and I had high hope for this one, being from Gucci, but I was so disappointed.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This looked, sounded and smelled beautiful (in the bottle). I sprayed it on my arm and it was lovely for a couple of minutes, then started to get all heavy/musky (the patchouli?) and continued to sit there being heavy/musky like my grandmother's mahogany coffee table (with the sweets on it) for a long time.
I washed it off, and then, strangely, it started to smell pretty. If there is a rollerball version of this, I would be very interested to try it!

P.S. I think it may have been the osmanthus. I just read a little more about that flower. (?) Edit: The info about the flower included that it can smell leathery... so I thought maybe the heavy/musky vibe came from that?

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I'm getting annoyed with this flower scent. It stays linear on the skin from the beginning of the application till the end. It was very pleasant scent in the beginning. But it becomes rather annoying and a little bit cloying. Sweet osmantus flowers mixed with patchouli make me feel sick.
I won't repurchase it the second time even if I get compliments on this perfume.
Amazing lasting power (more than 12h) and projection by the way.
Just not for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Uplifting, refreshing and beautiful!!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: My husband bought me this at duty free returning from Spain last year. To me, its beautiful. Anything with orange blossom or white flowers uplifts my spirits and i find this scent refreshing and energising without being too sweet or cloying. A real winner for me. I love it and hope my big bottle will last forever. ❤️

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I sense it as sweet, aqautic and fruity fragrance. I don't consider it so floral, actually.
Also, I have noticed that many Gucci's fragrances have some kind of sweet sythetic-smelling note to them. (except Guilty)
So this one also has this note. I don't like it because of it.
I can't say much about notes, because I only can think of sythetic watery sweetness.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: To me smells like happiness :)it is nothing exotic, nor complex or any unexpected dry downs. It is simple, easy and beautiful, and it just makes me happy every time I wear it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This perfume hypnotizes! Was so-so at the beginning, but, the more I sniffed my wrist, the more I liked it! The middle and base notes are very sophisticated. Somehow, I feel like this is most suitable for mature ladies (let's say around 30+).

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Powdery-floral scents that smells too light. Nothing special

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This turned into a decaying vase of flowers for me after 15 minutes.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Hahaha at the Flora margarine comments, I agree, however I was able to get past the name and I quite enjoy the fragrance, after a while it smells like jellybeans on me, which is quite less floral than expected..

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Unfortunately "Flora" in Australia is the name of a brand of margarine! I have tried it a couple of times but just can't get past the name. Guess there are enough similar fragrances so won't be purchasing it. Smells nice enough but don't "have" to have it!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: What I like about Flora is how it gives me a different experience every time I wear it - especially the top notes. Most of the time it's an overpowering scent of peony on me but just now I'm smelling lime. The heart of this fragrance is just fabulous - very elegant. My body loves perfumes so the base notes can stay with me for 8 to 10 hours - sillage is rather moderate for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
After a while not wearing this (since february - summer in Argentina) I picked it up after I saw the silver bands of the box shimmering in my wardrobe, I remember that I wasn't very fond of it because while it was nice it was not love. Today I had this ephiphany, if this was more chemically sweet and fake this would smell like Armani Si. Why do I like this more? I like florals that are florals, and after all this is a floral, a particular one. Starting off by the blast of Pink pepper and citrus, peony and osmanthus it seems gaggy and awful. Then the osmanthus shines revealing a leathery quality, not the kind of cologne-bitter-leather you find everywhere. You can tell it's a flower that smells like the faintest of leathers. Patchouli rarely comes across, gives this fragrance a base, slightly woody and herbal. I already reviewed this, hated it and then liked it again. Flora you never cease to reveal new faces. It May seem bland and generic, but When you find the right amount to use, the right temperature and the right mood, this is joyous.
Amazing longevity, with close sillage, a breath of fresh air among Girls wearing LVEB in 32°c.
Ps: I don't know a single person Who owns or wears this. And yes It smells medicinal like a doctor's Office.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This is my go to perfume for now. I layer it with VS body mist - Amber romance and stays for a long time. I encountered this perfume on coincidence; I swapped it with another perfume lover and before doing so I reviewed the notes, which were exactly what I was looking for in a perfume. :)

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I have seen multiple reviews in which Flora is described as "girly". I will go one beyond that - this smells exactly like a perfume that might be included in a "big girl's makeup box", maybe something Mattel made in the 80's for little girls who loved playing with Barbie. This smells like a 6 year old's idea of what grown up ladies might smell like when they go on dates or shopping or whatever imaginative fancy 6 year olds come up with.
I cannot even really pick out specific notes - just a cloying, strangely apricot-ish scent with something fresh/vaguely ozonic floating underneath. I don't necessarily like to write reviews about scents that I do not like, and so I won't say I hate this. I think this would probably be nice for high school girls, but anyone older than that might feel silly wearing it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Every time I smell this, it always make me want to gag. I don't know what note I'm smelling but its kind of hot and syrupy and smells like some sort of a bitter fruit (if that makes sense). Gives me a headache and I keep smelling it throughout the day. It's nauseating for me. It's supposed to be a fragrance for younger women but this just screams old lady to me. My mom likes it so it's better off with her.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
disclaimer: i am only trying this because i got it as an extra from someone, full well knowing it is the opposite of what i generally like. i like to try new things though, so there it is.

this is one of those fresh florals that is very strong and what i think of as "aquatic" like, strong, sweet florals with strong chemical notes. plus peony and pink pepper mostly don't work with my skin chemistry. it seems to amp it up really strongly, i wish it was softer.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A strong, rich and sweet floral. Not terribly unique, but the composition is really nice. Has the same heavy floral fruity elements of Oscar's Volupte but without the incense. Buttery and heavy, it def smells better on the skin than from the bottle. Nothing subtle or cheap about this one; its seductive, powerful and expensive smelling. Thumbs up.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Got my first bottle today & love it! All of this because of this site. Thanks for introducing this to me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: The sandalwood in this is really good. I find it makes for a more interesting fragrance than had Gucci used a musky base.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I don't often seriously miss judge perfumes I think I'l like, this however was an exception.
Maybe its the Osmanthus in the middle as I know (am pretty darn sure) I like all of the other notes listed.
I really didn't like this one!! :(
I guess it just doesn't work with my chemistry.

Good Longevity though I s'pose ...It survived me trying to wash it off!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Beautiful, sweet , fresh and I really love it!! Not too heavy, I can always count on this scent smelling nice on hot days in FL. Its one of my most used perfumes and its my mans favorite on me

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Pretty, clean, fresh floral scent, this perfume reminds me of Emotion Rasasi for women but softer version

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This perfume is really gorgeous. I bought it recently and I literally own over 70 bottles of perfume but this is quickly climbing to the top of my list. The problem with most rose fragrances is they end up smelling very old lady-ish when I wear them but that's not the case with this perfume. It is just the right amount of floral and sweet so that it doesn't become to sweet or to mature it's the perfect balance. They say that this is aimed at the younger market but I think anyone in there 20s or older can wear this perfume and it's so lovely that I think it could be worn as a day or evening scent. All in all if you are looking for a floral with just the right amount without smelling like a bouquet this ones for you.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I finally found a floral based Gucci fragrance that I like. I'm sorry, but the Garden Collection was horrible...especially the Magnolia and Tuberose ones which were very chemical-like and smelled nothing like the flowers they claimed to emulate (I would know, I grew up with said flowers in my garden). Well, now that I've lost any potential for gaining upvote balloons....on with the Flora review.
I should've purchased this one first. Flora is a beauty. It's a soft, sweet citrus floral. It's beautiful in all its simplistic, innocent beauty. I picture myself walking in a Victorian or Chinese garden while wearing a long, flowy dress when I wear Flora. I was also pleasantly surprised to see osmanthus make an appearance. It's a lovely, unique exotic flower that I haven't smelled in many perfumes. I also find Flora to be very sweet, which I personally like. It smells like sugared exotic flowers and mandarin. This is a happy fragrance that temporarily makes me feel like all is ok with the world.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: So glad I bought this, cause I thought I wouldn't like it. Smells so pretty and elegant. The patchouli: non-existent. The citrus: barely detectable. I wish the florals were a bit more lush but understandably, this is an innocent perfume. But not really. the sandalwood gives this a slight headiness. I just want to take a shower and drown myself in a cloud of this.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Not my kind of taste, but i love it!!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Pure, a classic feminine fragrance. Yes, it's simple, but that's where its strength, the key to its popularity is. Sometimes you just don't want anything complex, unique, over the top, so this could be it. But I don't think it's boring!
I think it's a safe, versatile and just beautiful perfume. It has no limits -no age limits, no wearing time limits, no season limits.
Just like a warm breeze coming over the fields of gold in the evening when the sun is about to set, when everything stays still to celebrate the arrival of a quiet, warm summer night.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I like it very much! It is delightful floral scent, like a strong blooming bouquet. Not too strong, but it definitely makes a statement.
For a bold floral scents' lover, I would say.

Update: It smells very similar to Fraiche version.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Smells very feminine, but doesn't last long. I wish it lasted longer. I love the way the citrus and floral scents compliment each other. They blend perfectly in this fragrance.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Und wieder mal die Körperchemie,wo nicht mitmacht! Kann leider nicht tragen.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A lovely fresh floral scent, with citrus sweetness. A very pretty fragrance. Who cares if it is not "unique" enough, why can't a perfume simply be beautiful? This is a beautiful feminine fragrance, and I am enjoying it because of it's simplicity.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I just got this yesterday and I love it. Is it possible for floral to be yummy? I dont know but Gucci have managed it in this perfume. I almost feel like it has some vanilla mixed into the flowers. Just beautiful not a boring scent at all

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
The bottle of this perfume is gorgeous i think that i find my favorite perfume..this!!!
When i wear it,i feel the smell of autumn...great!!!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Tried today ,the dry down is nice , but the first hour all I got was the smell of hairspray , be it lovely hairspray but wouldnt buy ...anyone else get that fresh out of a salon vibe with this?

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Oh, this is the gem I wore on my wedding day.. I truly love it...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: un classico accordo agrumato che sposa un accordo legnoso, è particolarizzato dall' osmanto. sicuramente perfetto per una personalità apparentemente fragile e distante, un lungo abito di organza e via...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Flora, to my nose, is almost an osmanthus soliflore. Save a bit of peony and pink pepper.
It's soft and feminine. The apricot tones of osmanthus give it a lush, fruity quality. Flora is slightly fleshy, but very fresh.
I can't say it's particularly special, but it is very wearable and easy to like.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I received a tester vial of this and it smells like a cheap Avon perfume, no offence to Avon perfume fans.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I've always love this perfume. It literally smells like clean skin...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I had preconceived ideas of Flora being an over the top sickening floral scent. However, when I was given a bottle as a gift I was quite pleasently suprized, I get more of a citrus-floral vibe from this. Initally, I get a burst of mandarin orange with the peony, with a small amount of the citrus aswell. The other floral notes in this perfume do not come into play until at least 30 minutes on the skin. Then, after that, I can smell rose and a slight hint of patchouli. The mandarin orange does a good job at balancing the floral notes, and stopping Flora from becoming an over the top floral scent. I applied this about 9 hours ago and can still smell it on my wrist, so no problems with the longevity.

Overall, I like it. Will I re-purchase? Probably not, but I'll enjoy using this bottle up nevertheless. A worthy buy if you're looking for a well balanced floral scent with good longevity.

7/10.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Nice flowery perfume, but unfortunately do not last long. :(

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: On me this is a wonderful soft floral and I really like the scent. The only thing is that for me it seems like a spring/summer scent. I bought a small bottle and wear it twice a week but I am still looking for a fall/winter scent. Any suggestions? I don't think it last very long compared to my other perfumes but I still love it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Flora is one of those EDT that didn't agree with me. It smells very strong on my skin with huge and suffocating hit of sweet florals. It actually made me move away from rloral scents all together for a while. I am slowly re-introducing myself to florals, wearing predominantly white and mild rose.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
