review_content: I thought I had reviewed this already. OMG, I am still so in love 2 years later.It doesn't smell just like TF Noir de Noir ( A HG for me) BUT,, IF you like that, you will like this. I feel like it gives the same vibe. Beautiful!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Beautiful scent!

Opening is blast of berry with hint of Cypress.

Dry down reminds me of slightly sweeter version of those pine/Cypress scent rod that you hang on Christmas tree. They sell those in home Depot.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I will admit I am not a huge rose fan but it's growing on me more and more. This scent has a lot of rose coming though on my skin but it's tangled with the cypress. I was expecting it to be a lot sweeter but I am happy that it's not because I have too many fruity scents as is. This was a blind buy for me but my intention was to blend it with my Gucci Guilty which has become too common as everybody seems to wear it. I will test them layered and see what the result will be.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Very masculine: dark and wicked; rose, patchouli, an almost oudlike quality with pink pepper, blackberry and an herbal quality

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
This Gucci Guilty Absolute is gorgeous. The initial blast of sweet, juicy, deep blackberry is so delicious. It is deceptive because I did not expect that this fruity perfume would have such a niche, chypre drydown.

The drydown of GGA is most definitely green with predominantly cypress (Christmas tree) and some woods. The blackberry tint is still there but this drydown is not child's play. It is gorgeous and intriguing.

The longevity is great for me. I am wearing this in fall and intend to wear it all year. Back up bottle worthy IMO.

If you like Amethyst Exquise EDP, you might also like this one.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I love Gucci Guilty and the Intense version and thought I would love this too. I tested it the other day at Ulta, and it is very, very sugary sweet blackberry; like blackberry jam or juice concentrate that hadn't been reconstituted with water yet. I'm not the biggest fan of blackberry unless it disappears fast, but this doesn't. Dries down to a rose, and piney, spicy (peppery), patchouli scent on me. Okay, but not my style. I'm not a fan of that sweet patchouli combination. Reminds me of too many other scents on the market right now. Glad I only tested this and didn't blind buy a bottle based on my love of the others from this line.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: This fragrance smelled like actual mold on me. I sprayed it on my hand in ulta because I heard good things and I immediately regretted it. I scrubbed my hand with makeup remover when I got home and still couldn’t get it off. Even after I showered I still smell it😂 oh well, not every fragrance works for everyone.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I think it's something between La panthere Cartier and Meliora Parfums de Marly.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I'm personally a HUGE fan of this fragrance, except for one issue - It doesn't last or smell particularly on me.

I can smell it; however, it seems nobody else can.
My husband can smell it immediately after I spray, but can't 10 minutes later.

I was assured by the retailer that this perfumes *constantly* gets compliments - but I have yet to hear *any* comment. I'll take the negative as well as positive, as long as I know if there's *something*.

But yes - personally - Heck yeah, I fall in deep, lush *love* with this Bulgarian rose and berry scent. It's so deep, sexy, beautiful, and intoxicating!

I didn't realise this is a unisex perfume? Don't care. It's gorgeous...as long as you can smell it.

***

Kitty rating: 9/10.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
A nice take on a berries and rose fragrance, not just to be contrary to some previous reviews but I find this one definitely leans more feminine but hey it's all subjective. I like this scent but don't think I'll be wearing it myself (that could change though, who knows...). Some guys might like to wear it though as it's not as sweet as other fruity feminine marketed scents.

I'm a big fan of these recent Gucci releases, I own and love the men's Guilty Absolute which is just brilliant and pretty daring for a designer fragrance, a fresh take on a leather scent.

This 'women's' version like the men's one also uses cypress & vetiver to give some green and woody freshness to the berries and rose (rather than the leather in the men's scent) and it works (!), another hit to chalk up for Mr Morillas.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
This right here is a prime example of why people should embrace the unisex marketing of most niche brands and let the "Pour Homme" and "Pour Femme" labels become parts of the history books.

As terrible of a scent as the new Gucci Memoire d'une odeur was, it took a step in the right direction by introducing the general fragrance consumer to unsiex marketing.

I worked at several big retailers myself and I saw so many cases where a man would come to the store, see the "Pour Femme" label and move on to the mens section to find something for himself, unaware of some real gems that he might love.

I would even argue that this smelled BETTER on my skin than on my female coworkers.

On me this opens with a really juicy and citrusy mix of blackberries and bergamot. I would've loved to get some pink peppers as listed here too but unfortunately couldn't.

Then it slowly morphs into a velvety, smooth, and cold mix of patchouli, vetiver, and some lingering blackberry. With some pillowy soft rose giving it that velvety texture that I love.

When my female coworkers sprayed it on, it just smelled like rose, rose, and even more rose.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
J’adore ce parfum, froid, boisé et juteux! Il est tellement agréable, il fait très femme fatale selon moi!
On sent très fort la mûre qui le rend juteux / fruité et puis ensuite arrive le cyprès qui vient contre balancer le côté fruité pour le rendre profond intense et non enfantin! Dans l’assèchement on peut sentir une Rose rouge croquante.
Oui il sent la magie de Noël, parfum d’automne hiver délicieux! Il est enveloppant et très durable, le sillage est modéré mais très perceptible!
Si vous aimez Trésor Midnight rose, Parisienne, testez celui ci!
Love

product_name: Gucci Guilty Absolute Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: This is a cold fragrance, but in the best of ways. No vanilla, amber, tonka or anything of that kind to soften or warm up. It’s a cold, crisp bush of fresh blackberries on a chilly autumn morning. In the forest, surrounded by the woods of conifers, cypress and pine. A crisp rose mingles with an earthy patchouli, but they stay in the back and never steps up front stage. This scent is freshness all the way, crispness defined, but still not sharp or scratchy. Fruit and berry lovers be warned! This berry doesn’t show up alone to the party, she comes accompanied by the earthly date of the forest and is not banal, jammy nor candy like. The crispness of the cypress is almost verging on something minty or eucalyptus like. Reviving to the senses. Sophistication in a bottle.

The peach is lovely and it reminds me of a favourite childhood Fa deodorant (called Ice Tea). As some other commenters said, the osmanthus and tea notes with time gradually melt into sandalwood. Very nice.

BUT: +300 euros for something that can be found for less than 3 euro?
No.

At first I'm noseblind to it. It smells like water. Then I get musk, and the barest hint of osmanthus. It's weird to me. It's like a skin scent from the beginning. If someone hugged me wearing this, I would be aware they were wearing a scent but I would have no idea what the notes were
sweet sweet apricots and osmanthus flower. smells like a mix between sweet tea from osmanthus and an apricot compote. with some spices. reminds me of my childhood a bit
sprayed this before getting on a plane. i would like to apologise to everyone else on that plane

Sweet and aromatic. Wasn’t expecting to like it this much but I just do 🤩 it’s beautiful and very different than any other scent out there and definitely different than the scents I usually go for. But this is a winner in my book 😍

This is a beautiful scent, with a hefty price tag.

I usually don’t like sweet or peachy fragrances, and make no mistake, this is A SWEET PEACHY fragrance first and foremost.
Which means it’s leaning more feminine.

But the cardamom, tea and osmanthus combo kept it interesting.
Gave it a multi faceted warmth.

I kept on smelling myself for hours while trying to convince myself it’s not worth buying.
But I bought it!
No Regrets.
Not a safe blind buy.
good projection upon spraying.
Lasts all day on clothes.

Smells alot like frangiapani to me. Also smells chemically, medicinal and very masculine. Put it on three hours ago and it still going...
But yuck.
I enjoyed this on a test strip in store. I will revisit to sample on my skin properly.

At the Gucci boutique I sprayed Osmanthus Nectar on one wrist and the new Bloom parfum on the other. The opening of ON is wow, amazing, but doesn’t last long until the balsamic base became amplified on my skin. Interesting to me that balsamic base of Bloom parfum is similar to my nose. The perfumes are not similar other than that. Overall, I would have trouble choosing between them if I had to, but wow, the opening of this perfume is fantastic.

I got a sample of this after smelling it in store and couldn’t stop thinking about it. Sadly, after wearing it a couple of times, it’s just not a wow. It’s lovely; apricot in a fuzzy soft sort of way, osmanthus bringing a floral edge that blends with the apricot, a warmth from the cedar wood somewhere in the background. But when you aren’t searching for the notes, it’s just a sweet apricot scent. It feels (dare I say) a bit cheap, I don’t think someone would think you’re wearing a £265 perfume. I do find it to last a long time on my clothes, but it doesn’t project much so I do become a bit nose blind to it. Glad I didn’t buy a whole bottle on the grounds that I loved it in store.
My search for an osmanthus and tea scent continues.

For me, this fragrance is pure sensory delight!
It’s divinely soft, cozy, and enveloping, like an invisible silk scarf wrapped around you.
Delicate apricot with a hint of sweetness unfolds beautifully, complemented by a refreshing tea note that adds a light, breezy touch.
A gentle woody base and creamy lactonic nuance (thanks to the sandalwood, I believe) make the composition especially warm and harmonious.
This is the kind of scent you want to wrap yourself in and never take off- made for comfort and pleasure.

The longevity is truly impressive! I applied it to the back of my neck in the evening, and the scent was still with me the next morning 💪🏻

Genuinely one of the most beautiful perfumes I have ever laid my nose on. It’s realistic peach and apricot pulp with slightly spicy, aromatic tea. Sweet, woody, and velvety smooth. Perfectly unisex and appropriate for any occasion. I couldn’t stop thinking about it and went back to the department store multiple times to smell it. It would 100% be my signature scent if it wasn’t so expensive. But I couldn’t resist and had to buy a bottle anyway. Projection and sillage is moderate (which I actually prefer for this scent profile) and longevity is great on my skin. I have truly never smelt anything like this and it will FOREVER be in my collection. I’ve owned it for 2 days and it’s already in my top 5. Thank you Gucci.

Best osmanthus scent I’ve tried yet. Has a peach tea vibe, very smooth. Sad part is the performance is abysmal. It’s a skin scent within 15 mins on me but it opens quite loudly and projects heavily for those first 15 mins then just goes ghost.
Beautiful peachy scent
Love this! It is a sweeter more sophisticated version of Penhaligon’s Vra Vra Vroom, though it is like double the price!

This is a sweet osmanthus smell, very feminine. The dry down is slightly woody, but it has the peachy quality from the osmanthus that just doesn't add up with something woody and mysterious, it's more earthy than that.
If you want a perfume that smells incredibly similar to this for a fraction of the price, and that lasts much longer, get Artemis by Soki London. In my opinion it's better: Greener, multifaceted and lasts much longer than this one.

It's still a very nice perfume, but I do love osmanthus...

Very beautiful peach/osmanthus scent with a balsamic undertone and a woody base. It projects very well, it remains fruity and dense for a long time. The amyris note can be a little too much at times but it makes it more special. There is tiny citrus note that also stays a long time. I see this scent can be cloying if overapplied, but it is truly beautiful if used correctly.

Gucci’s Osmanthus Nectar is more a conversation between textures than a straightforward scent. It opens with a sharp, almost metallic pepperiness, sort of like the static crackle when you dry leaves rub together. A soft sweetness does start to unfurl gradually, not quite the syrupy sort, but a translucent honeyed peach juice, rippling through the rough edges. The sandalwood appears too, starting oh so jagged, like an unpolished surface, before time smooths it into something quieter, more worn-in. Floral notes weave through, not lush and blooming, but fragmented—spicy petals caught in the wind rather than whole blossoms. It’s an interesting scent, but its beauty appears more as fleeting moments of appeal, within a structure that never fully resolves. Wearable, but not anything particularly great.

Osmanthus Nectar by Gucci smells like osmanthus tea, green tea, peach pulp, smooth and fluffy sandalwood.

I fell in love with this perfume instantly. I love tea scents, tea is one of my favorite notes.
It smells perfectly balanced. Earthy tea, juicy sweet peach pulp, fresh tea leaves. It smells exactly like it's name: osmanthus and sweet peach nectar.
Usually photorealistic tea fragrances are not very intense, but this one doesn’t have that problem.

Love at first smell, later I will do a detailed review of this magnificent creation by Nathalie Lorson and it is automatically in my top 3 of this line, its performance above all has surprised me because the line suffers from having a "timid" performance for the most part, I haven't tried it in depth on my skin yet, but my husband put it on today and it lasted more than 8 hours and the hanging clothes still smelled almost like they had just been applied, a wonderful and fruity osmanthus with a peach aura, sophisticated and playful at the same time, that Tom Ford's Bitter Peach would like to have.
Of the three new releases of this line, it is my favorite followed by Fiori di Neroli and Vanilla Firenze third, the latter I thought would be my favorite because I am a vanilla lover but there is a note like leather or something 'dirt' that does not allow me to enjoy it at 100%.
Bravo for the new creative direction in the Gucci perfumery department, the two Gucci Guilty Love Edition 2024 are also great, let's hope the house continues on the right track.

I was not fan of the initial opening. It smells as though there's ginger in here to add a warm spicy factor, but I don't see ginger listed in the note breakdown. I'm guessing its the sandalwood that's adding the spice quality. It smells smooth but I just wasn't expecting that to initially take over. The drydown is beautiful though. The osmanthus shines through during the drydown and lasts for hours on my skin.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Socks a punch to your nose with a girly, floral, peppy smell! Good god! It smells like the personification of pink!! I don't know how else to describe it. This is a positive review - it's such an intense smell, but really packs a absolute headthrobber.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: It's very fresh...? I don't know how to describe perfumes since my nose isn't that accurate compared to everyone here but this is a very nice and clean scent. It reminds of nearly the end of highschool where girls are beginning to pay more attention to themselves and their scents. when I smelled this, it reminds me of a older female classmate that I admired who's very proper...if that make any sense. Just a very clean and simple scent, perfect for anyone who's just starting to get into perfumes.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Category: Fruity, sweet, floral

Notes: Sprays on insanely alcoholic and sour. As it settles the pear becomes super apparent, fresh and a little fruity, but what appears the most is the sweetness of the sugar note. I would not call this brown sugar though, as brown sugar has a depth and caramel-y tones to it, this is rather plain and syrupy in contrast. Simply put, on me this smells like a sickly sweet pear. Cannot detect any gardenia.

Vibe: Cherry blossoms. Baby bunnies. Bamboo. Green and Pink color combo. Watermelon soda. Pomegranates. Brown leather bag. White flowy skirt. Frog on a lily pad. Female friendship. Koi pond. Green tea. Sheer curtains. Wooden bedframe.

Sillage: 6/10. Fairly decent sillage, not loud but also not a skin scent. You do have to come in close to catch whiffs of it but when you do you won't be able to miss it.

Longevity: 4/10. Lasts about 4-5 hours on me, on skin, but lasted less than an hour on my mom who has the type of skin that eats fragrances. So if you have the same issue I would not recommend this perfume. Even then 4 hours is pathetic performance in terms of longevity.

Wear: Daytime. Strictly spring and summer due to it's light, airy and sweet nature.

Overall rating: 5/10. I would describe this as the stronger, much sweeter version of Katy Perry’s Meow. Prominent notes of pear, vague indefinable florals and corn syrup. While fresh and clean, this is truly sickeningly sweet to the point where I find it unbearable, so fair warning if you're also sensitive to overly sweet fragrances. It's very linear and not particularly ground-breaking, but quintessentially feminine, or rather - girly. Definitely more suitable for teenagers and women under 30. For a perfume named Gorgeous Gardenia you would think there'd be some distinct gardenia in there but I can't say I'm picking up any gardenia whatsoever. Safe and likely a crowd-pleaser, this was just a little too sweet and a little to uninteresting for my personal taste.

Who would wear it?: Jackie Burke in That 70s Show.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This was a special scent to me as it was a gift my aunt when I turned nineteen. Someone compared this to Viva La Juicy's older sister, and that resonates so well because I made the same transition. It's a shame that the original formula is difficult to find now.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
ahh i miss pre-reformulation gorgeous gardenia so much :( i've been wearing this since i was a teenager (15 i think?) and it was my signature scent, floral but sweet and a bit fruity. the pear and berry notes really stood out on the old version.

i have purchased the newer version in the pink bottle several times, but when i went back home and smelled my old bottle of this i realized how different they are. they're similar enough that you can tell they're supposed to be the same fragrance, but the newer version is much less fruity and fresh... it feels a bit more mature to me, which is maybe fitting bc i'm 23 now lol, but it's still a bit disappointing

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: A very generic floral scent. The 'fruity' aspect is almost negligible, although I did sense a very slight hint of pear. It sits a bit heavy on my nose and I have noticed I get mild headaches on the days when I wear it. I would prefer smelling it on other people than on myself. Lasts pretty long on clothes but not on my skin.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: pretty floral perfume but smells a bit generic and synthetic and is so overpriced for the longevity. it disappears after like an hour or two on me but maybe 3 hours on clothes? really disappointed with longevity but really like this scent for spring and summer. sweet but not cloying. gives me a headache sometimes when i overspray but if i dont overspray then it barely shows up on my skin.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I usually like pear scents, but I don't smell the pear, and this is way too sweet for me. I wore it quite often in 2018 and then got very sick of it. The scent is unique, but it's a hard pass for me now. A funny story, though - I was going to a Weezer concert at Riverbend in Cincinnati and had it in my purse. Security turned me away because "no glass is allowed inside" - so to avoid walking 2 miles back to the car, we went into the field near the woods by the venue and buried it in the ground!! After the concert, we found the hiding place -- and it was still there. :-)

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: So now we know where Juicy Couture got the inspiration for Viva Le Bubbly....

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Fresh, subtle sweet, young, and gorgeous. It has tropical vibe in the background thanks to frangipani. One compliment I take note from a friend smelling me wearing this: you smell so calm. I think I get it

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Light and fresh, positively unoriginal. Bf was not a fan

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I bought a decant sample of this fragrance because it was described as a fruity floral accord. Yes, I saw the patchouli note in the base... but according to voters, the patchouli should have been the least identifiable note. Nope... not for me. Patchouli is becoming a note that ruins it for me, and that's what happened here. I need patchouli to be way in the background, far far back. I'll have to pass on this one. So glad I tried the sample instead of spending on a blind buy.
🦋🧡🦋

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: It's sweet and fresh in a very appealing way upon first spraying it. But to wear it would make me sick and tired. A bit boring for a fragrance according to my taste.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This smells exactly like Good & Plenty candy to me. It's sweet but there is a strong licorice note. The smell is quite juvenile and just not what I'm looking for. Unfortunately I ended up with a full bottle when I tried to buy the regular Gucci Flora but accidentally grabbed this instead. I couldn't return so after trying this many times it ended up in the declutter bin.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I love this scent! It is very similar to Viva La Juicy just less sweeter. I've sprayed both of them on my coat and this one has dissapeared wile VLJ is still prominent. This is more floral and fruity but almost the same DNA probably because it's made by the same perfumer? I'm not complaning, Honorine Blanc is a talented perfumer. I would rather buy VLJ for the price and longevity.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: To me I smell the red berries & white floral then once it dries down I get the patchouli. It does not last long ...during the day I would have to re apply. It's an okay scent, not a like or love for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
It's simple ingredients
i smell only ( fruits with white floral )
i think girls can use this fragrance for school
it's powdery and fruity freshness

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
This smells like a generic floral perfume. I am not really getting gardenia which is a shame because I love gardenia. This is very floral and sweet and it feels a bit cloying. It needs something in the base notes to off set the florals and sweetness. The patchouli is not enough. This smells like a very basic perfume. Probably a good introductory perfume for someone young who wants to smell like flowers. This is something I would expect from bath and body works not Gucci. No shade to bath and body works. I think they have great scents and were part of my introduction to fragrances. In fact I know bath and body works has better gardenia perfumes then this one. I just expected more from a luxury brand charging as much as it is for a bottle.

If you want a better gardenia scent, then I would recommend Banana Republic’s Cardamon and Gardenia. If you want something way more complicated, then I recommend Velvet Gardenia by Tom Ford.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I have absolutely no idea why, but this, on first spray, reminded me immediately of Colors de Benetton (original formulation). I'm not seeing much in common, note-wise. It settles down to something similar but not quite similar enough to say it smells the same. It is sweet, with just the slightest tinge of the green gardenia "bite" lurking underneath. Overall, it's not really a creamy OR green gardenia, though. The pear and berries are very present, leaving a fresh, light, and fruity floral. Not my normal kind of floral, but it's pretty and I do like it. Doesn't seem to last very long, though (even when I spray it directly on my clothing).

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Oh wow this is truly gorgeous. Perfect name for it. It's soft, fresh and feminine, but also a bit spicy and sweet. Great combination!!
I blind bought this based on reviews and am so glad I did - I cannot get enough of this scent. It opens so delicate and fresh with an undertone of spice - I almost get anise, and the drydown is a delicious, slighly spicy, almost blackberry-like musk. I really love this.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I consider this one of my top 10. It is an absolutely gorgeous, ultra-feminine, gentle perfume. In my opinion, anyone not liking this should stay away from perfumes, period, I mean, what is not to like? Sweet, floral, fresh, all at the same time, absolutely stunning. I was not a big fan of the original Flora, because of the weird dry down after a few hours, but I was wearing it religiously because my husband gifted it to me. However, GGG is a stunner. It stays on me for about 10 hours, good projection as well, I think Gucci fumes in general love my skin, or my skin loves Gucci, whichever way it may actually work.
And, whoever is voting that this smells like Viva La Juicy, you have problems. VLJ is so cloying and thick that it is almost unwearable for anyone over 20, not to mention that they do not smell anything alike. People are weird.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I remember being so exited the day this came out. I love gardenias, the look of them, the smell of them, everything about them. My all time favourite flower in general. Gardenias were also the main flower used in my wedding bouquet!) Being a scent called gorgeous gardenia I was expecting to be overwhelmed with a gardenia scent straight up, but when I smelt it, I don’t remember the gardenia being particularly specific and it being quite faint a smell. Although smelling it now, a few years later, it seems a lot nicer than I remembered (maybe the gardenia is more noticeable in summer?) I’ll be noting this because wearing it now in summertime I remember the gardenia smell standing out a lot more, although it still has quite low lasting power and sillage. I feel like the name gorgeous gardenia (while I take the term ‘huge overstatement’ back) is is still a bit of an overstatement.

But it doesn’t mean it’s not one of my favourite summer scents for those days you are opting for a light scent. Still a beautiful spring and summer option.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Aroma brown sugar and pollen of a thousand flowers which are stays for all day long. Voluminous, but scent may call "a close to the skin". Here : so, that i breath it and i like breath it. Reminding about gardenia from time to time.

It's when i want to smells Gucci.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Pretty! I believe many people would like this perfume. It's feminine, soft and there's a cool hint of patchouli. A girly hippie could wear it!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: To me, this is a very basic perfume. I did end up using the whole bottle, but It just isn't special. It's a classic fruity and floral scent and is not offensive in any way. The sillage and longevity is decent, nothing impressive. Works if you want something feminine and floral, and not to strong.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This is one of the few perfumes that I can detect wafting around me all day. I will keep noticing it, I don't have to sniff my wrists. I presume therefore it has sillage.. The pear top note takes ages to die away though n gets on my nerves after a a while but I love the dry down. I find this one almost identical to the Limited Edition version in the darker pink floral box without the black border edging.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: It smells like your in a milkbath with flowers all over you n some honey in your bath just a bit for some sweetness and then you dropped a tiny bit of patchouli essential oils in your bath . So comforting and kinda yummy ! The pear Is super dominant aswell I love any pear dominant perfume . very pretty

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I’ve never been a fan of Gucci perfumes but I really thought I’d like this one. Based on reviews it seemed to be a fruity floral which is right up my ally. But when I tried this, the first thing I thought was it smelled cheap. It has the same plasticy synthetic dry down that the Juicy Couture fragrances have. I tried to get past that but could not. It also only lasted about 20 minutes so for those reasons I had to sell it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Smells kind of nice but pretty boring. Disappears within 30mins even if I douse myself in it. I’ve had better performance from VS body splashes. I got the 50ml on sale for ~25$ and it still felt like a waste.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I am at a point in my life where I expect perfumes to be unique, I want to be surprised and dragged into a journey of senses, when using a perfume. Well, this is not the one: It’s flat, average, and very common scent. Where is the gardenia? It doesn’t smell any different than any other flowery woman perfume, I would have expected a more intriguing scent from the maison of Gucci.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This is indeed a lot like Viva La Juicy. Maybe a bit more upscale, less synthetic. It has similar performance, just present for a few hours. Nice, young, flirty, but many similar scents around. I prefer the regular Flora, but this is nice, too. Not worth retail price imo because of the performance.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
The quintessential shampoo-y fruity-floral. Young and maybe a little cheap smelling, but I think my association is being influenced by other, cheaper alternatives that were obviously heavily inspired by GG but didn’t quite nail the vibe as well as GG.

On the wishlist for a future spring/summer purchase!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
So sorry...but the first thing that comes to mind after spraying is......."MEH".
Instant skin scent on me....everything is way too "light"....???
Gardenia....???.....really...???
At best, this is a "body mist" .........sadly.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This smells a lot like Viva la juicy, but I would say fruitier and more juicy... ironically! I like them both, and I probably even prefer this one, but it's needlessly expensive in my opinion (you cannot tell me this was expensive to make, this doesn't have precious oils or anything in it) so I am happy with my Viva la Juicy for now.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
The opening smells like canned pears. Specifically, the Dole brand in the plastic cups. I smell zero gardenia. Just canned pears. Gives me a headache, very cloying. Silly of me to hope for a "gorgeous gardenia" from this I guess.

The dry down is a bit more pleasant, but then it's just a tamer canned pear with a floral edge to it. Still zero clear gardenia.

Blind buy fail. Glad I only got a decant of this. Smelling like a dole pear fruit cup just isn't what I'm going for ever.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: As a lover of gardenia I was hoping to love this, but was a little hesitant because I find other "floral" offerings from Gucci to be nauseating *cough* Gucci Bloom *cough*. Also, patchouli scares me, not going to lie. Luckily, Flora Gorgeous Gardenia works for me! I was surprised by how juicy and succulent the pear and red berries notes were. I did get a blast of the gardenia, but after 15 minutes I could really appreciate the fruity notes. I don't really notice the patchouli much, so I would say overall this fragrance is well-blended and very pleasant smelling. I could see myself falling in love with this fragrance the more I wear the sample I have. Definitely a pleasant surprise from Gucci.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
To many odd reviews of this perfume here, I don’t recognize the descriptions in my fragrance! I just post my review about the special edition 2020 purple bottle here as the perfume is the same (only bottles differ):
I can just say that the more perfumes I collect, the more enamored I feel with this particular one 🥰 It is so so so uplifting with the beautiful gardenia, just enough of juicy sweetness (never ever cloying), more from a juicy pear than red berries to my nose, and great staying power! It doesn’t loose it’s freshness! It is spring in a bottle 🌸🍐🌸🍐🌸and it is forever etched in my olfactory memory (despite having 30+ other great perfumes at the moment).

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I ordered this after trying a sample in store. It smelled great on the paper but on me, I don't like it. There is definitely a feeling of cloying. I only sprayed two times and I actually can taste the the perfume. It rubs me the wrong way. It smells nice but gives me a headache.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I really can't distinguish Gorgeous Gardenia from Viva La Juicy. It's a very nice scent but gives me high school flashbacks because it smells exactly the same to my nose... I wish the gardenia was more prominent to make this scent distinct.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Without reading any reviews before trying Gorgeous Gardenia, I recognized the similarity to Viva La Juicy right away. In the dry down, GG starts to leans more floral while VLJ is more sweet/gourmand with the caramel note shining through. I like them both, but they’re definitely similar enough that I would not own both. If I had to choose one, I would pick VLJ. It lasts much longer on me and is a fraction of the price of GG. I much prefer the GG bottle and the color of the juice, but the poor performance (lasts maybe 15-20 before I can’t smell anything) and the high price makes it a solid no for me. If you’re looking for a light, generic-smelling fruity floral and do not mind reapplying several times throughout the day, you might like Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
For me, a now 22 year old woman, it's very funny that I bought this in Florence/ Italy age 15 because I can't even imagine a teenager wearing this. A very MATURE and expensive-smelling perfume.

The bottle is super pretty, but that's about it with interest or hype for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I’m waiting to see how I feel. I poured this on from a sample. Used the whole vial. Lots of pear at first. This is one of those fragrances that may be perfect for me as I don’t smell it on myself....or it just evaporates into nothingness. Give me an hour...I’ll update

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: So surpriced 🤯 thought I would be “Been there, done that” But there is something else besidde the Gardenia and the sweet frutitynes 🤨 I Can’t identify but I ILove it 😍

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
This is for me absolutely a daytime, office scent. So it's been perfect when I wore it during fall 2020, as we weren't allowed to go anywhere anyway except to the office.

It is indeed pretty, pleasant and very, very polite. Downside of all very, very polite things: it's not really exciting. A Kate Middleton scent I would say.

I also agree with the review below, it is romantic.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Love it. Romantic.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This is a nice light sweet floral fragrance. It’s really basic to me, nothing exciting about it. It’s nice. Also I am not a fan of patchouli and to me it’s prominent in the fragrance. This is a safe blind buy if you are looking for a not to sweet fruity floral.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: The lightest Gucci perfume I have tried. Floral-fruity spring, ringing and flying scent. Not as suffocating and heavy as Gucci bloom perfumes, transparent and complex. Still, you can feel a little heavy and smothering notes inherent in all Gucci fragrances, too monotonous for me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Smells exactly like Viva La Juicy but lasts longer

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: A mans review. I went sniffing for mom and grandmothers new perfume at Sephora today and out of 11 perfumes it came down to this one and Jo Malone Poppy Intense. I bought these two. The Gucci smells very fine, smooth and sophisticated, I kept coming back to it. Well crafted blend suitable all year around. The store associate 2 isles over helping some one else even said what ever that is in the air buy it, its smells wonderful lol. I personally like Oriental Florals for women and Gucci Flora Gardenia was very close, an instant buy, no hesitation. Its not that unique but its just one thats sexy and hooks you. Both Fragrances are fine wine. I recommend to try or buy.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Cute ! This is the word to qualifie this fragrance . It’s cute and pretty , it does smells quite innocent and fragile . It is definitely not man-eater fragrance or anything but more to be the quite reserved wife . I really like it tho , on some moods this fragrance is working really well !

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
The opening smells very much like Viva La Juicy (and the Gucci saleslady was not happy when I said this!) since they both have berries & gardenia, but the drydown sets it apart.
Smelling them from the sprayer, the Gucci is slightly more floral while the Viva La Juicy is sweeter with caramel. But if you sprayed it and wasn't intimately familiar, they would be easily confused in the opening.
After an hour or so it has developed more of a floral character, though it is a sweet and fresh floral. I get almost no patchouli, and wouldn't be able to pick out the frangipani either.

You probably need one or the other. This one is much more expensive though, and I find the longevity average. Would be a lovely and classy gift though.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I really like this and I’m not a huge fan of Gucci fragrances but this one has some personality. I was a little nervous due to it being named gardenia. I love real gardenia but most scents come off as screechy. This has a pleasant opening, although I can’t really decipher it’s opening notes. It’s dry down is what I really like. The patchouli gives it a nice base, if not slightly masculine, with a deep floral. On me, this is a strong fragrance that sits on the skin, if that makes sense. I would consider this office safe, as it doesn’t have much siallage but I wouldn’t consider it a safe blind buy, especially if you’re expecting a strong gardenia smell.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This smells exactly like Environscent Honeysuckle Cloud - an air freshener I used to get from the grocery store before the scent got discontinued. I used to keep it in my car and it reminds me of that time in my life. Looking forward to getting a full bottle of this even though the longevity is poor, I still enjoy the scent. Sweet, juicy and floral but light and airy - reminds me of Ex Nihilo’s Fleur Narcotique, but I prefer this one as I find musk and woody notes to be cloying after a while.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I get a very clean, fresh bodywash type scent from this. It actually reminds me of men’s soaps that lean toward a fresher scent. Not my style, but maybe I would like smelling it more if it was on a man, come to think of it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I can see the similarities to Juicy Couture, but Gorgeous Garndenia is much fresher, less sweet, and the notes can be distinguished from each other.

It smells 90% like sweetened lingonberry from a trail mix.

Then add in some cooling white florals, and you have this perfume.

It is actually lovely!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
If i don't find the emerald gardenia limited edition one anymore then i will go for this one, even if it has more of a sweetner undertone, which is not overpowering luckily but it is maybe too sweet for a summer scent of even spring. i would love to wear this in evenings maybe even day time when i have something special. but because it has a stronger sweeter tones i would not want to have this as my go to every day fragnance because it comes off as too girly

longevity is great, on me for 5-6 hours and that for a edt is in my opinion decent. also you can always reapply but as i said i would not wear this daily, but for sepcial occasions. for the price point i have nothing against it really, seems okay for a 50 ml.i think...? if it were a cologne and with shitty wear then i woul definitely not pay the price for a 50ml (80 sth euros)

tbh this kinda reminds me of a girly person, i think it is more youtful not teenager girly... a mature woman can be youthful right, so i think it is more in that perspective.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I received this in a monthly subscription service and when I first sprayed it I thought they had made a mistake. I thought they had filled this bottle with a Viva La Juicy fragrance or VS Tease. Thats exactly what this smelled like for about 20 minutes and then the Gardenia came out but it was light and synthetic smelling on my skin. After 30 minutes its nothing more than skin scent on me and the end result of the dry down is a light sweet gardenia scent. The scent was completely gone after about and hour and a half. Definitely not worth a full bottle purchase

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Gorgeous scent, love it. Sweet, warm succulent juicy berries and pear. After juicy Noir this is my second fav scent. Only downside is it doesn’t last! I need a stronger version of this

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Behind the sweet, fruity top notes reveals a minimalist composition of gardenia and frangipani; which, all disappears in under two hours and leaves you with a very subtle, powdery, soft patchouli base. Top notes gone too quickly but delightful while they last.

The formulation is perfect for when you're seeking something light, feminine and modest yet still alluring.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I like this perfume, I get more of floral than fruity note, But the negative side is it doesn’t last , 2 hours after spraying and it’s gone

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This smells like a dollar store viva la juicy knockoff, only that smells better! It just has that same strange drydown.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I don't have any Viva La Juicy fragrances, so I don't know if it is similar or not. For me this is a friendly, warm, beautiful scent that I use when I just want to smell nice. Yes, it is not super unique or complex, but it makes me feel happy and beautiful when I wear it. It is not a fragrance I would wear when I want to stand out, but I would wear it when I'm in a friendly kind of mood and open to the world.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I feel something cinnamony in this, I like it a lot

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
First off I want to start off by saying that I don't get the VLJ comparison at all. With that being said, this has probably been on my want list since I started my perfume collection almost 2 years ago now. It was so hard for me to find a good spring/summer perfume that wasn't powdery or loaded with grapefruit or yuzu (not a big citrus fan) and this was my saving grace. I never knew if this was worth it so I would go to sephora, make my self a tester, finish the tester, debate if it was worth it, forget about it, and repeat. I like it, but with the extremely poor longevity, I finally decided it's not a bottle I would purchase. But I would swap for it. This is finally coming off my want list. For the same price point, I would go with sky di gioia. Not the same but hits the spring/summer fruity floral decently priced check mark. Not sure if my rant will help anyone but I hope it does!

Edit: Someone mentioned that it smelled a bit masculine. I never noticed that until right now. It definitely has a cologney vibe.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: WHATEVER YOU DO, don’t buy this. Please spend your hard earned money on something else! It’s not that it doesn’t smell good, cause it smells heavenly the maximum of 20 MINUTES IT LASTS. It’s just not staying on the skin and just fades away quickly. Not even on clothes. And for that pricetag is not acceptable, this is my biggest mistanke of blind buy ever. Never got an compliment with this one, I believe cause no one can smell it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Well this is what I get for buying bottles online and not trying first! This is just like viva la juicy but just a tad lighter. In fact, if you have viva la juicy I wouldn't bother with this one unless you like having frags that smell almost identical. It smells good, dont get me wrong. But I already have a huge bottle of viva la juicy so I dont need this one! Too similar.

PS: Also very similar to victoria's secret noir tease (which I also have!)

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I just sampled this - and if I had been blindfolded - I would 100 percent have guessed this was a Viva La Juicy flanker. It is totally gorgeous. I do like most of the VLJ flankers so it’s no surprise I would like this. I wonder if the sillage and staying power is better with this one... This might be FB worthy for me !

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
It's crazy, I just don't get the Viva la Juicy similarity. I don't like the Viva la Juicy fragrance at all, not on a sample card, not on my skin not even from the bottle. This one I really like, It's a refreshing girly scent. I am almost on my 40's but I still enjoy wearing this. The only downfall is that I don't think it lasts too long on my skin, maybe 3 or 4 hours? I have no issue in reapplying but just saying that it could last longer.

I am not a big fan of Gucci Flora, all of them are headache inducing to me. This one is different so I recommend that you give it a try if you don't like the other floras you may like it. If you are looking for something a little more long lasting try Emerald Gardenia, I personally loved that one, it's like Gorgeous Gardenia's older sister and it lasts longer.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: A sweet pear and berry sorbet. This is nicki Minaj pink friday twin sister.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Iam really spruced I like this one, this perfume was a gift.
A once I smelt it from the bottle I thought I wasn’t going to like it.
I am not the flora, flowery type at all
But once I got it on my skin. I loved it! I think it has a powdery touch to it.
French and feminine. A bit girly, but not too girly.
I am more into seductive perfumes, I can not say this is seductive. But still like it.
Perfect to were with your flowery dress on a hot summer day

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I always avoided this due to the Viva La Juicy comparisons but I was pleasantly surprised smelling this today. It's definitely very similar but not as gourmand or tart fruit smelling. The gardenia is squeaky clean and makes this perfume a little soapy. I also wouldn't describe this as a gourmand perfume at all unlike VLJ which is a very warm, cozy gourmand. I can see this working in spring and summer because it's not as warm and heavy like VLJ.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
i love love love love this fragrance for bed time. Oh my god, soft silage, beautiful scent, calming, put me to sleep fast!

I tried this for day time, nope, i prefer a stronger, longer lasting fragrance for my day time. but for bed time, perfect!!!

I always always always reach for this one. I wish its a little cheaper. I plan to find a cheaper alternative for this.

I saw people comparing this with viva la juicy. To me this one is way better, it does not have an annoying dry down of viva la juicy...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I’m not sure whether there is any gardenia in this, but I’m pleasantly surprised. In the opening there is a nondescript floral accord mixed with a chemical musky pear note, which is similar to the sugary musk used in Mon Guerlain EDP. After approximately 30 minutes this becomes a less sweet Mon Guerlain without the lavender. A few hours later a sweet synthetic floral note reminiscent of chamomile appears, giving a gentle touch to the musky pear. After 7 hours it’s completely gone.
Overall this perfume is very feminine, gentle, suitable for all seasons. I have used hair products that smelled like this before and wished I had a similarly smelling fragrance - my wish has come true. It should be cheaper for what it has to offer, as there is nothing remotely groundbreaking in this cocktail of synthetic notes, but I do enjoy wearing it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
This is a perfect day fragrance. People mostly seem to wear it for spring and summer but I have also used it during winter. This is a beautiful floral scent. There are some scents that when you put them on, calm you down. but this perfume just gives me that boost of confidence when i put it on in the morning when getting ready. this is a perfect scent for when you need that extra bit of confidence touch after putting your make up and outfit on.
the bottle is finished now but there is still some fragrance scent left that gives me so much memories related to this beautiful scent.
Definitely a scent for young girls. its not too sickly sweet or citrus. just perfect sweet floral scent.
it is worth a buy for trying out or even collecting.
i am very likely to buy it again just so i have this with me for whenever i miss this scent.
i still have the bottle and the box with the design.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I certainly have a love-hate relationship with this fragrance. Being a lover of creamy white florals, I can't say that I pick up the gardenia at all. Either the blending is superbly done, or gardenia is perhaps used in a lower ratio. I smell juicy pear, some sweet berries on a bed of patchouli. For me personally more of a winter scent, to remind me of fruity lollipops and cocktail hour to come when spring arrives.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This is a just a pretty floral scent that I feel like I’ve smelled on a lot of others. I’ve received a few compliments but I’m not sure I’m in love with this. I prefer other scents but this is perfect if you like florals but don’t want to smell “old lady-ish”

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I was so surprised that I like this one compared to EDP, the one that hit. It is fresh and very feminine and not too strong.
Of all Gucci flora scent, this attracts me the most.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: i got a free sample, so here we go. i smell pear and chemicals, that's pretty much it. no gardenia or patchouli, just fruity and chemically. it reminds me of a fruity shampoo from 20 years ago.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
scent : 8/10
sillage : 7/10
longevity :7/10
100% day fragrance
nice fresh feminine scent

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I avoided the whole Flora series because I have a pathological dislike of anything with white florals in it. But a very friendly staff member at a Gucci counter I visited convinced me to try this on my skin. And its sweetness and freshness just melted me. I mostly have unisex perfumes in my collection so I decided to buy it just to add diversity. This one brings me joy.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I posted a review quite a while ago., just wanted to update review.

I still really like this perfume. I can't say I know what gardenia smells like but there's a floral element to this perfume, it's softly sweet. This isn't candy sweet like Britney Spears' Fantasy range, this is a natural sweetness. I definitely smell frangipani, juicy sweet pear and a tiny hint of patchouli. I don't get any berry notes at all.

I still stand by in saying this perfume is elegant & classy. It doesn't shout, scream or yell, but rather softly whispers or hugs. Perfect all year round, in any situation: work, night in/out, date day/night or just in general chilling at home ect. I don't think this will offend anyone.

Will I repurchase once my bottles used up?... absolutely without hesitation, this really is a classy beautiful perfume.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Mysterious floral,
Very sexy although the longevity and projection are not woow. It's relaxing soft to smell.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: The first time I sprayed Gorgeous Gardenia was like being caught in a fine mist shower of berries, pink petals and pear. Sweet and easy, like sitting outside after everyone has gone in for the night after a long, hot day. This scent is essentially a garden of summer nights in a bottle.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Not a gardenia scent. It smells like apple soap?

Red and green apples + musk, something similar to the fragrance of Allegheny spurge (Pachysandra procumbens)

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I was surprised by how sweet it was (and it lasted quite a while on my skin as well). The pear is definitely dominant, not so much the gardenia. This has a similar vibe to Anais Anais Premier Delice by Cacharel, a pear dominant perfume as well. Except that Gorgeous Gardenia is more floral to my nose.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
My favorite summer scent!
It is perfect for the day and best for the beach. On my skin it changes when I go into the water and smells even better.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Insanely delicious, the first couple of months generally went crazy. For me, the scent is dominated by a pear, I do not say that I like it very much, but in this fragrance it's just a bomb. In the winter they are not very, in my opinion, but in the rest of the year are stunned.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Oh well, I start thinking the different batches smell different, because I can't smell Viva La Juicy either. Just few weeks ago I have tested it and I was a bit shocked. It gave me everything that isn't listed in the notes, I could swear I am wearing Angel flanker, Mon Guerlain or even La Petite Robe Noir. On my skin only berries and patchouli, even in the horizon I can't see any flowers, I wish to find flower in the garden smelling like this :) Also I wish Viva La Juicy to smell so luxurious. In my mind they are not alike even in slightest.
Thanks Kendelem1999 for review, you are so right.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: When skimming the reviews of this, 3 out of 5 reviewers say something along the lines of “exactly like Juicy Couture” EXCEPT a or EXCEPT B or even EXCEPT A & b. Well then it IS NOT exactly like Juicy. I find that irritating and it takes a lot to irritate me. Is it in the same sweet, youthful category? Of course! Are they both, for the most part safe and in offensive and easy to wear? Absolutely! But don’t let the word “exactly” being throw around make you write this off for testing. To me and on me it smells nothing like any of the juicy offerings other than what I have already stated earlier. I love this! Got a sample from Sephora and it stood out in a good way among the other samples I got and am currently waiting for my full bottle to arrive so I can spray away! Bottom line just because scents share similarities with one another does not make them “exactly” the same :)

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This was a great find as I could have easily missed it with all the other Gucci Flora's as I felt to be honest a bit tired of the line as they all seemed the same and a bit too safe to grab my interest. I have had Gucci Flora in the past (the original one) but found that while it is lovely and nice it just was a bit generic (in a good way!). So a sales lady showed me Gorgeous Gardinia and it struck me as having that lovely Flora vibe but added that missing element that made it more interesting to me. Something to note is that it is not too strong on the gardenia so don't let that put you off. It is really nice, the pear, frangipani and berry accords really make this something special. It is definitely my favorite of the line. Recommended.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Smells like a bouquet of flowers. :^D

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I like this more than the the Gucci Flora. A little sweeter and lighter. I just wish it lasted longer on myself. Packaging is cute and price is reasonable. Perfect for daytime wear or on a date.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I'd like to chime in that I do NOT smell gardenia, either. I can detect pears and another lighter flower (maybe sweet jasmine) and I get some berries, and it kind of has a gummy bear quality to it. Other than that, it is lovely, but there are other more accurate gardenias if you're a fan of the flower.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
DON'T BLIND BUY THIS !
________________________________________________________

@Gemini12 is right... Gorgeous Gardenia is a gorgeous sweet fragrance, but not a gardenia fragrance.

I can sense the pear & red berries combination and the sweet dry-down of franginapi & patchouli in this fragrance, but I can't sense any gardenia.

Longevity: - 4/10
Sillage: - 3/10

All in all: 1 out of 10 points -> because there is no gardenia.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Nice frag with the pear screaming in your face but the patch grounds it some. Similar to tender romance by RL. I think I like this one better though. The pear gets outa hand in both.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
This is an amazing perfume! I thought I would leave a review, as most of them here have been a bit average and meh. I have been looking for an almondy/frangipani pear scent with woody or leathery undertones for a while now and I may have found it.
This is a sparkling fresh deliciously flowery scent in the summer and a sultry, lingering, even leathery (if not listed) frangipani wonder in the colder months. In the summer, spray it in your hair after a shower and let it waft around you with every move. In the winter, try spraying it onto the lapel or sleeve of your leather jacket or ladies handbag. It will hit you with feelgood vibes throughout the day and make you feel like a star!
Every single person that gets a sniff of this asks me what that wondrous fragrance is, even from some distance away, so the projection must be great. I never even get this when wearing Dior... Everyone compares it to Juicy Couture, but I think this one does more than shrill and fruity and it has a serious, deep side too.
So, it is worth saving up to get this beauty if you are into lush woody florals, you won't regret it. The box, especially the first colourful edition is gloriously drawn, I have nothing like it on my perfume shelf. Even as a blind buy it is worth it, quite a crowdpleaser. Yet, it is not childish or simplistic, it has plenty of layers to keep you happy throughout the day.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: This is an okay scent. Easy to forget. I gave away my full bottle to my sister.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I don't feel any gardenia here. Disappointment(((

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
First when I smelled Gucci gorgeous gardenia while I through the mall I thought this is the same scent as Viva la juicy that I have and I didn't buy it because I have no reason to afford for the same scent. But one day I got a sample, sprayed it on my skin and found that they are different.

I think Viva la juicy is more bright and sweet but Gucci gorgeous is more flora, relaxed and have a hints of elegant.

Finally I bought Gucci gorgeous and fell in love with. I always wear it when I want to feel comforted.

Happy scent for me. ❤

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
I just bought this for my mom, and this is a day nice fruity scent for young girl or any age. perfect for the summer or spring.

this smell really natural, perfect for casual day time. the only problem is that is too light.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia is not the best white floral I've ever smelt, but it is very pleasant on the skin. It's missing that creamy aspect that most gardenia scents have. I find it to be a mostly clean and fruity interpretation.

This fragrance is essentially a floral scent for those women that have an aversion to white florals. Gorgeous Gardenia is a young fragrance with a sweet fruitiness which is sure to appeal to the young female consumers.

It's interesting to note that Gorgeous Gardenia was the only Flora Garden flanker to be discontinued and re-released in different packaging. Perhaps this decision from Gucci was due to the fact that this was one of their best sellers. I can almost understand the appeal, however I find Gucci Premiere a much nicer white floral scent if I had to pick a floral fragrance from this house.

Sadly I find Gorgeous Gardenia a little bland when compared to the many other floral fragrances that currently line the department store shelves. The original Flora by Gucci is still my personal choice, followed by the very pretty Gucci Premiere.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: No gardenia in sight, at least not to me. Just pear and a bit of patchouli. As others have noted it really does ring of Juicy Couture. Smells hideously cloying from start to finish on me but actually is quite nice on my lower-20's friend. Maybe because it really is her type. I can't do pear and I should have known better than to even try.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Silly me, I thought a perfume called "Gorgeous Gardenia" would smell like gardenias...or at least gardenia would have a prominent presence, which it doesn't. Don't get me wrong, I do smell a bit of gardenia but it only lasts about a half an hour and after that it's all sweet fruitiness that bears more than a passing resemblance to several Juicy Couture perfumes. It's a nice enough perfume, but if you're looking for gardenia, look elsewhere.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Fresh, smooth and mildly sweet and fruity but the pear is quite chemical and obvious on me. I prefer it when it has dried down considerably and then I love it but I wish it smelled like the dry down from start to finish or the pear could be toned down somehow.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I thought this would have been classified as a floral-fruity-gourmand with more sweet notes listed! Wow, this is delicious. I'm detecting marshmallow similar to the one in "Ari" by Ariana Grande (sweet but not a toothache). I'm reviewing the EDT, it's very light, bright and sweet with mild-to-moderate sillage and longevity. I think this would be a safe choice for someone who would like to get into gardenia scents but doesn't want anything headache-inducing or offensive. Honestly I wouldn't have even guessed that "Gardenia" would be in the name of the fragrance. I'm personally all for a loud white floral but I'd wear this any day! Sweet and delectable, would be good for spring, summer, day or night, any age.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: The Garden Collection by Gucci features five different garden scents and Gorgeous Gardenia is the only one I currently own. With notes of berries, white gardenia, and a touch of brown sugar this perfume is sparkly and sultry. Though an EDT, this perfume has great lasting power on me. Perfect for spring and summer. This fragrance is attractive and charming. Very very flirty and playful, it is perfect for date night where you don't want something strong, but also a fragrance he will compliment. For cocktails with the girls, or when you need that extra boost of sensuality. I definitely recommend! :). x

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Expensive "soap" similarly as other ones in this series. When I first sniffed bottle I imagined pretty feminine woman in nice dress and in her 20s. I tried it and first 15 minutes it was soapy candy with sunny floral in background. In next minutes it became more and more soap with synthetic touch. At this moment because so synthetic it started to slightly remind grandma perfumes. It lasted maybe 30 minutes, after that I need to put my nose close to my skin. After a hour there was almost nothing left. Can't feel there any specific flowers, all soap are somewhat same for me.

This is a good one if you are in to young, romantic, light, sweet, medium warm, soap perfumes. Would be nice for summer and if not used too much then wont bother much anyone around. I don't see this perfume as compliment gatherer. I like and dislike this perfume. I like where this perfume is going I just wish for less soap in it, more realistic floral and that it lasted longer.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: One of my favourites. Smell like a lovely day in the garden, makes me smile and happy all the time. My happy fragrance.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
It is funny how we made some associations based on the colour of the juice. For me, rose represents something sweet or floral or girlish, so I tried Flora by Gucci with green and blue juice, skipping this one. Anyway I gave it a try and acctually I like it a lot. Not too sweet nor floral and fruity. Just about everything and quite classy. It doesn not have a wow effect, but for me is a keeper.
For me the winner among the Flora line (because it is more fruity than floral and sweet just about).

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: It opens up with a syrupy sweet (note: specifically cough syrup), almost smoky floral. The dry down is a bright and clear frangipani (the cough syrup is still there). If you put it on your arm, every movement you'll feel like Abbey Lee in the advertisement directed by Chris Cunningham (one of my favorite directors) for the original Flora. It's intense.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: It is very easy to get confused with all the gardenias as it is 6 of them , often they sell samples gift boxes as a 4 of them only . I bought my first one which i think was the pink liquid and i loved it and it smelled form me like a watermelon but now i discovered it is a red berry. I think u need to have all of them to smell the difference .

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Oh Liz, you're a sucker for nostalgia *face palm* !

This , like a few other in my collection, is a fragrance I wore in Europe. I can't really say much about the scent itself (it's lovely, sweet and intriguing) but the emotion that is triggered upon smelling this is worth its price !

Finally found some of this in Australia !! Buying a bottle, for feelings sake <3

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Someone once described this as 'beautiful sexy cake,' and I think that description is accurate. It smells like dessert to me. Usually I hate smelling like dessert, but this is really gorgeous.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I got this for sample last year.. But last week I decide to buy it. Its funny how the smell reminds me of cupcakes and fresh pancakes with butter. Indulging them in a garden full of flowers. It might sound silly but its quite pleasing to smell it.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: First of I'm a guy. I have a female friend in which this is her signature scent, after taking a wiff at it, it became more than clear as to why. as a man, I love a woman who smells soft, sweet and flowery, that's huge turn on. some women go over the line with the candy smelling fragrances (smelling like a jolly rancher's ass)...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Nothing like actual gardenia in any way...
But a really lovely fragrance overall. A sweet, inoffensive, melony floral with a good amount of sillage.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Wonderful scent..
Charming...
Beautiful...
Hipnotis...

So Lovely ^_^

Not similar with Viva La Juicy,at all...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Pro's :1. It's a crowd-pleaser. It smells good, really really good, nothing chemical or cheap-smelling about it. If you ask 10 people, 9 of them will surely like it very much. I did this experiment 2. It's indeed a nice, feminine, delicate composition. More fruity, than floral, despite its name- you can't go wrong with this scent in almost any situation. Cons: 1. Those accustumed to more complex, niche compositions may find it somewhat boring and generic. 2. It lasts a couple of hours on your skin, which is a shame for its price. Sillage is also moderate to low. All in all, Gorgeous Gardenia is a very pretty scent but rather weak & pale compared to ...ummm...more sophisticated fragrances on the market. I enjoy wearing my 30 ml of this baby but I won't repurchase it

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Smells like viva la juicy to me.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
The combination in this is beautiful! On my skin this fragrance stays sweet the whole time, but doesn't get sticky or cloying. There is a certain maturity about it's sweetness - and that makes it stand out.
The aroma stays mostly the same from beginning to drydown and doesn't cahnge much.
I do however feel that this is not quite a perfume for young girls - it is more for a grown up woman and someone who wants to be taken more seriously.
Sillage is good on me and longevity also, but you have to be careful not to overspray.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Such a lovely smell, created with gardenia and pear notes. It's so gentle, dreamy, feminine - gorgeous. Too bad the sillage is so soft and it doesn't last too long.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Flora Gorgeous Gardenia on me lasts long (7 hours plus) with moderate sillage for 3 hours, an uplifting gardenia/frangipani/red berries combo, sweet but not annoyingly sweet, refreshing, dreamy, makes me think of dew on gardenias, jasmines bushes in a garden with fruit trees nearby. Lovely, can be used in summer and in cool temps also,

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Ugh. I didn't know this had pear.

I swore to the moon and back that I didn't like Pear in fragrances, but this is my faaaavvvvvvorite perfume ever. EVER.

The longevity and sillage is soft, not the best. 2 hours max. But this smell makes my eyes sparkle. When I look into my eyes in the mirror having just put this on, my eyes seem to be the windows to my soul! (corny but true!) It's like this smell defines everything I want emphasized about myself.

Just a cheerful, beautiful smell. Elegant, bright, like the hope in cold winter, the light summer breeze. It's everything to me lol.

It is a heavenly white floral with that inital blast of berries.

I also compared this to Viva La Juicy. I still like this better.

And nah, I wouldn't say this is the truest representation of a gardenia. It's embellished with all the other goodness. The way it makes me feel is unexplainable to an extent. But gosh. I just love this. Loooove.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I have a gardenia plant flowering at home right now and I have to say gardenia smells differently, this is rather the smell of a flower bouquet. Very similar to Lagerfeld for her.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Juicy red fruits and gentle gardenia, this is a girly and cheerful scent. It makes me happy everytime.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: One of my favourite scent...

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: very pleasant scent, gardenia 100 percent! girly and cute flowery scent

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I think Gorgeous Gardenia is completely heaven in a bottle. Such lovely gardenia! Superb.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
Oh what a gorgeous fresh strong gardenia! It's so beautiful! I love it so much. It's completely stunning! It's totally heavenly! The gardenia is so strong and pure! Elevating! So fresh! So alive! It's truly a great perfume! So few notes, and yet SO powerful! The blend is perfect - everything works together to make it a masterpiece!!! GORGEOUS!!! I would love to DROWN in it! I can't get enough of it, it's so tantalising! So delicious!
Lasts for absolutely ages too; and great sillage!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: GORGEOUS GORGEOUS GARDENIA!!! Perfectly named perfume. It IS gorgeous! It's SO gorgeous! Gardenia became my favourite flower as soon as I smelled this! Oh I LOVE it! It's heaven! Beautiful! So......gardeniary! What a beautiful scent you have, you gorgeous flower! It was beautifully strong on me all day; lasted till the next morning -that's a good 24hours! Fantastic. THE most heavenly scent!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: Gardenia? I can't detect any real gardenia in this. Very sweet scent.

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
This is a such a beautiful sent! It’s floral, fruity sweet but fresh. It opens up with sharp flower. The sharpness smell might come from a laundry sent, like freshly washed cotton but it’s probably the red berries. This is what makes it special and not a normal fruity, floral sent. Then under that you smell the fruit, a sweet fruit. The sweetness isn’t overwhelming, but it’s there. It calms down in a sweet, warm sent but it still has that fresh berries somewhere.

If this were a woman I would see a fashionable one with a minimalistic but girly style, she doesn’t scream for attention but everyone recognise her sweetness and she’s impossible to not like. Something about her is like almost magnetic, it’s something that you can’t find anywhere and is impossible to let go of.

This is indeed a special sent, the red berries is so enchanting and reacts beautiful with the fruity florals. My 2 go 2 and all time favourite. Easy wear and not heavy. But still last 6-8 hours. Recommend this to everyone!

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content: I just spent a gorgeous weekend in Miami - warm sea breeze, tropical turquoise water, enchanting orchids, plumeria and jasmine growing on every block, but what struck me most was the scent hanging in the air and projecting from the beautiful ladies on the beach. It was sweet yet fresh with a slight crispness. At the airport DutyFree, I looked for a fragrance that would remind me of my Miami holiday, and this is the one I found. All of the scents of the beach, the sea, and the city seem to meld together into this harmony of a fragrance. You can smell the flowers growing on the sidewalk, the beautiful people walking by, the crispness of the sea breeze, and the warmth of the Miami air. Beautiful beautiful fragrance

product_name: Flora by Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia Gucci
review_content:
What can I say? I couldn't believe in my nose! I am not a huge fan of Gucci perfumes although I found them great for the youth and not good enough due to their lasting power.
