review_content: I dont know how but all i smell leather and milk in it. im not complaining what i smell but a bit masculine for my taste.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Sometimes the flanker just gets it "right", or is better on with my chemistry than the original. Intense was cloying, Black is delicious and great for fall. It lasts several hours for me and I get compliments. Smell it for yourself and see how it goes.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
to the reviewer that complained about the bottle's 'vampirish' looks - nothing wrong with that! i actually prefer my 'sexy' scents to look sexy and dangerous, and my 'classy' scents to look... well, classic. love this bottle. period.

on to the scent: dark cherries, lilac, patchouli is what i smell. I LOVE IT. i have both the original and this. its a mouth-watering scent, with that hint of 'danger' to it.

i give it 4/5 stars and would most likely repurchase (unless something even better comes out, cause i like to change it up).

you go, gucci!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Well, not worth buying, it stays on my skin for about 30 minutes, then gone. Nice scent, a bit sweet, a bit fruity, a bit flowery. Like many others - but this one is last in line - it doesn't smell anything after 30 minuter.. Bad work Gucci.

Hm, inte värd pengarna, den känns på huden i ca 30 minuter, sen är den borta. Trevlig doft, lite söt, lite fruktig, lite blommig, som så många andra men denna är sist i ledet. Den doftar inget alls efter en halvtimme. Dåligt Gucci.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: If only there was an EDP.....

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I LOVE this frag. It's sweet, but there are some spicy undertones ;) Maybe it's not exactly sexy, but seems like a good scent to wear when going out on a date when you're in your late teens-early 20s. Works great with my body chemistry, but since my skin is extremely dry (like, "bleeding when I stretch my hand too much" dry) the longevity isn't the greatest, but it manages to go on for 4-5h, which is pretty much a miracle on me!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: smells like cherries covered in chocolate mmm yummy!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I like the original Gucci Guilty.. The intense version has more depth and longivity though. That is why when I got Guilty Black, I thought it was going to be the ultimate buy for me. To my disappointment, it smelled very heady and masculine.. It is a very nice and well crafted perfume, but definitely not for women. Or at least women who prefer to exentuate their tender and feminine side. Sorry Gucci.. This one's not for me. Unless I grow a moustach.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Very simple kind of fruit jam. One thing is for sure - it's a true fruity, no florals to be found in this simplistic juice. Berries, peach and a bit of vanilla (not lily). It just strickes me how naive (not young! young can be all sorts of things - smart, preppy, cute, charming, innocent, lovely, pretty to say the least) this fragrance is; especially compared to the price and promo (ad, design, buzz, "story"). Pass.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I blind buy this bottle simply because I just LOVE the design of the bottle, it is the most beautiful and classic bottle I ever seen.
To my surprice,this smells awsome and have moderate sillage and longevity!!!!
The bottle looks much better in real life!!!!!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Trying out my sample...very juicy and warm. It's a winner in the sexy snuggly category..I will add this to my collection


edit: yes the bottle is very ugly...very vampirish...why Gucci??? this may keep me from purchasing...I would never want to display this monstrosity()

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
just bought it because il was massively discounted.
sprayed it on my wrist...and now, well I am not sure I did the right choice, even if it was a bargain.
poor lasting power, cheap synthetic berry scent, I shouldn't have been blinded by the price; pretty sure I won't wear it :-(
I hope base notes will be sexier. so far it just smells like some cheap celeb frag.

edit 24 hours later: on sale on eBay......

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Wow, it smells like a cross between my beloved Armani Sensi and Armani Diamonds. The initial blast is Armani Diamonds; fruits and spices, slightly metallic and screechy. Then, almost immediately, there is the drydown: Armani Sensi. Mmmm...heaven. I would call this a love, except it lasts no more then an hour on my skin. If only the lasting power were better. I'll be putting it on my want list anyways and hoping for at least an average lasting power.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I have to say even though I understand the superhero idea for this campaign I don't believe the smell matches the theme. I do like the black bottle simply from a practical point of view. I have the gold bottle and it always has fingerprints over it even though I wipe it and try to look after it there is a lot of mirror like material and it is hard to maintain if you like to keep the bottles the black one to me is a little more practical.

Gucci have claimed this line of perfumes are seductive to todays customers but I don't honestly find them seductive just pleasant and inoffensive. I think of some of my older style perfumes and to me they are seductive but these not at all just personally. Obviously the current consumers have changed their opinion of what is seductive these days and obviously it usually involves berries and patchouli and I am the odd one out here but Patchouli seems to be relied upon a lot these days to attempt to make a perfume deeper and more sultry but rarely works in my humble opinion because you wind up smelling only patchouli and not much else. I cannot follow that trend I am afraid, I refer to my oldies for that purpose when I want to but that is just my experience with this line from Gucci so far.

I prefer the original as it didn't try to be sweet and innocent and sultry all at the same time which to me has resulted in missing the boat completely. At least Gucci's previous perfumes were strong and following some type of originality but this new edition is nice it is not a horrible perfume just for me it is nothing to get excited about and as usual the ones I liked are discontinued as the majority of their customer base found them too strong and these ones that I think are not so earth shattering are expanded upon with never ending flankers!!:)

Maybe in todays world strong just isn't what people want anymore but I do!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I don't get those bad rewievs.
This is not that bad. I actually like it... a lot!
More heat and deeper than the original Guilty, a great favorite of mine.
The greatest difference is in the dry down part. There is something vanilla-like scent, patchuli..?
As i've always hated vanillatic scents, this is improvement for me. Dior Hypnotic Poison is absolutely the worst vanilla-oriental scent on earth.
Gucci Guilty black is fresh, warm, sweet and at the end; vanilla.
An for the record; not a granny scent at all.
I love this one.
I won't buy Guilty Intence version, I'll get this instead!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
This is rather simular to the original but "deeper" if you will.
Its full of lilacs so if you don't care for the smell of lilacs, I suggest you steer clear of this. Personally, lilacs are my favorite flower of all time so I love the scent of it.
I don't even get a hint of red fruit-weird I know. Its all about lilacs on my skin-there is depth and sweetness on the drydown, no doubt from amber and patchouli. Patchoili normally lasts longer on me and this is no exception. I get about 3 hours out of it, although after first hour or so, its mostly skin scent but you can still smell it. So far I really like it-normally I like to smell like dessert but this is definately nice for a change.
I will say that I don't see this as "sexy" which is what all the ads seem to imply. With this name and ads, I would imagine this would be an oriental scent but its anything but(quite misleading). Also, fragrance itself is red which I find rather offputting. They could have just went with red glass bottle instead of making liquid red which can stain your clothes if you are not careful
However, I am thinking about buying this scent if I get a good deal on it. So on the scale from 1 to 5, I would give it a 4 because lasting power is not that great.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: It's nice, but so soft, just not so much existence and barely can be smelled. And, by the way, realized most of Gucci's fragrances are not very strong. Flora is one the exceptions.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I am shocked at the negative reveiws of this. I think it's because GUCCI is becoming so popular people must exploit it to make others look good....


This is very very unique. A smell of seduction and red lights.
It remind me of Las Vegas Nighife and heads turning in all directions kinda way.


Award Winner

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Gucci accenti , gucci by gucci,gucci rush ,gucci 2 these were the perfumes...the flankers that followed are just the same to me. I hardly recognize them . I ´ve tried gucci guilty and I find it another common scent that you can hardly recognize .And the most disappointing thing is that all the beatiful and unique perfumes I mentioned are or will be discontinued..I don't want to offend someone this is just my opinion. I believe that the latest flankers by gucci aren't as original as its first masterpieces.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Nice unique fruity scent for nighttime

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I actually really love this fragrance and dont wear it enough probably due to having so many others that i love wearing! But i do agree it is a very sexy fragrance.Well done Gucci

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I'm almost shocked by the amount of negative reviews this received.
It is indeed a very generic mainstream scent of which there are many similar to this in fragranceworld... Just because it isn't unique doesn't mean that it's bad.
I actually really appreciate scents like this. On me this is a very yummie gourmand scent. Very sweet, almost edible...
The only downside I would say is the low longevity/sillage.
Scentwise I wouldn't mind to add this to my collection.
Yummmmmm...

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Am still enjoying the little spritz I got from the sample I received today. I loved the Guilty Intense and this is a lot like it but different in that this is definitely not an oriental floral imo-it's a fruity sweet fragrance. I smell very strong fruit and it's pretty good, but not good enough for a purchase. Sorry Gucci-this smells like a hundred other fragrances out there. Wanted to love you!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Smells just ok...like a stronger version of Guilty intense. The bottle makes me think of a super villain, dunno why. If Marvel's Carniage wore cologne, this is what his bottle would look like. Pass..

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
omgooodness with the haters! Honestly, I really do like this fragrance. i own the original, and this smells very much like it, but fruitier, which (at least for me) rounds it out very well. smells scrumptious without being disgustingly fruity (ahem* anything marc jacobs has released after oh lola).


NOTE: lilac is very intensive in this. It is listed as one of the heart notes (correct me if im wrong) on the gucci website =]

its a perfume for a badass, no matter the age.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: too bad it smells nothing like the original but darker. it is a synthetic fruity scent just like any cheap celeb scent.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: This smells VERY synthetic, artificial, and fruit-candy-esque. It made me think of koolaid, fruit punch, or life savers. This is definitely a downgrade from the original Guilty, which had some darkness and mystery about it...it was sexy and sensual! This one is just a fruit punch.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I am kind of disappointed with this new scent from Gucci. Such a beautiful bottle and advertisment photo made me expect some mystical and shopisticated scent, unfortunately on my skin this does smell just artificial.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I tested this the other day on my wrist and I agree with other reviewers who say it smells too much like the original or of nothing much at all but I have been wearing the Intense version my husband brought a while ago and I have to say the mandarine orange persists on me and mixes with the patchouli and the iris and I like that mixture but sometimes the mandarine orange can come across a little citrusy and scratchy.

I feel with this version the cherry and the strawberry give it a sweetness but a smooth sweetness not a sharp note persisting like the mandarine orange. I felt this one settled nicely and lasted quite a while on my wrist. Due to the fact that I have really enjoyed the Guilt Intense once I have finished that I would consider trying this because I do like this style of perfume Gucci has released and I would like to see how I go wearing it over a long period of time and I do like flankers so there are several reasons for me that I would give it a try but if the mandarine orange didn't bother you in the first one then you could stick to that one this one is very similar.

If you are like me and liked the first one but would like to try the strawberry and cherry version then this is worth a try because these notes I think are noticeable in this flanker enough to bother with it.

I don't like the black bottle I think they should have done a rose gold colour to keep in the line of gold Guilty bottles and to reflect the sweetness this one has as it is more of a pink, gently smell certainly not evoking thoughts of a black and red bottle these colours to me are too harsh to represent this smell.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Very very very similar to Guilty intense but not so long lasting

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: With all this marketing hype this is the exact kind of stuff i wouldn't dream of testing in a shop. But since I got a free sample, curiosity won and I dabbed it on.... It opens with a blast of sweet and sour perfumy berryness that is ever so 110ties (that's 20 yrs after the nineties). After a little while I thought it was pleasantly bearable, like in the way of a Guerlain Petite robe Noire or a Black XS or Armani Black Carat. But hold on, this one is different and not in a good way. It's not even that there is anything specific or any note here that would put me off. This one is different. It puts me off by the absence of any edge or naturality, it smells very synthetic. Sorry I cannot like this but the good thing is it doesn't hurt very much either. Death by sameness and boredom, rather.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
From the beginning til almost the very end I smell nothing but a red berry juice. Reminds me of my childhood and the birthdays when homemade juice was offered as a drink - at first a bit sour, and second serving horribly sweet of all the added sugar. Exactly how Gucci Guilty Black develops. With the exception of detecting some velvety softness on top of everything somewhere in the dry down faze, just right before it turns into a "plum and black currant jam with vanilla" on my skin.
As for the floral side - none! Can't find any lilies (why is it mentioned as lilacs on the introduction text?) nor violets.
Seems like this production really is about the packaging, advertising and media buzz, just as the proportions of the introduction text indicates. Sadly.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I tried this on a paper strip & forgot how exactly it smells. All I remember that it smells really sweet & nothing much after that :(

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: OMG its soo delicious its so friut sweet good fragrance !!!perfect for any case any ocasion i love and kongratulation Gucci

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Well this not really black or intense, but this is very wearable, even it if it is light, it smells nice. It is more fruity and sweeter in the top notes than Intense which is more oriental, but on the dry down they become quite similar. Black is to Me nicer than Guilty Intense , more modern, younger, fresher
I decided to buy it, as I think I will enjoy wearing it, it is a Gucci , it is feminine,in a s oft musky way. It almost has a calming quality, which is a plus.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
This is a painfully boring, inept flower fruit soup. It smells sweet and tacky and that's it.
'...intense oriental floral in which RED-hot sensuality...'
Please... it's a meek mall scent, it's almost embarrassing.
*facepalm*

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: nice, but nothing special. it seems that i have already smelled it somwhere, reminds of many other soft perfumes.By the way i do not understand why it called black, i see no association between the smell and the black. To me word black in the names of perfumes means dark, sexy, deep, provocative and so on..i do not find any patchouli or amber here - only fruity floral. the smell somehow reminds of versace versace :)

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Usually I do not like sweet scents because of they similarity and weakness, but this is acceptable, sweet but longevity is good, so I can say that this scent is with some character.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
It's very sweet and joyful. Like a playful kitten in the flower bed without any worries. Girly, dreamy and light. Maybe a bit childish... Too sweet for me.
I smell peach, raspberry and violet. Lifts up the mood but lacks the deepness and character I like in my fragrances. Quite long lasting.
I don't understand why it's called Guilty Black, there's nothing black, except the bottle.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: the constant release of these generic flankers are just getting more and more offensive

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Trendy and juvenile fruity floral of no interest.

Rating: 3/10

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: best staying power from all of Guilty line ;)

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: it's very light on me! :-s kinda mweh...i expected more from this

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Tried this at Selfridges yesterday and loved it! Smells just like Intense but with a fruity top which is delicious. Don't find it synthetic at all. I was with my boyfriend and he said it smelt so good he could eat me! This well definitely be my next purchase when I get paid!


Edit: Yes it is sweeter than GI, but personally I prefer it. Although I must admit, sometimes the patchouli did begin to annoy me, but I own both and when spraying them together on separate wrists, black just has the juicier, more girly edge.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Boooooring....

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Smells like Guilty Intense plus red berries. Sadly the fruitness makes it generic. I think that Guilty Intense is more classy. Black is probably for younger women. The name Black is misleading, this is not a dense evening scent. Sweet and fruity, that's all.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: It smells almost identical to Guilty Intense, but a bit softer, sweeter and less intense. More fruity and less peppery, I think?

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Seriously? Well, Guilty was a miss for me. Premiere was... way more horrible, I hated it so much xD

Guilty Back is tolerable and wearable. It is pleasant, mild patchouli with berries and mild spiciness, well balanced, nice and really unnecessary. There is no point in this edition. At all. Except for making money. Why? It reminded me Givenchy perfumes. I think it's really similar to Play.

I put 5 sprays on my sleeve and it wasn't too intense at all, sillage is quite medium and for this amount of sprays I'd prefer it to be more loud. I've worked night shift this night and can fairly say that on skin it lasts maybe for 5 hours.

There is nothing special, no thrill, no sex and nothing interesting whatsoever. I'm sorry, but these generic flankers bore me. Well, it smells lovely, but that's it. It's like it's made for a day you want to put on something when you really don't care what.

Other point. After an hour or so I started to notice that it smells kind of like a cheap fragrance like... It does smell a bit cheap. Same was with previous one.

P.S. I love Gucci by Gucci, all Floras and other older fragrances. So, I'm just dissappointed by their recent releases :(((

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
Wow! This is one of those unique sexy fragrances that has no competitors. GUCCI has dominated the world of SEX!!!

No other luxury brand in the world has or ever will do what Gucci has with it's iconic sex symbols. Every other brand wants class or luxury....Gucci on the other hand has Class,luxury and pure sex.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content:
I finally got to try this new flanker and I must say (to my surprise actually) that it smell really lovely!
Think Gucci Guilty and add some lovely fruit, the result is a smooth and creamy scent that seems to last up to seven hours!
Violet gives this scent a vibrant side and makes it really enjoyable.
Sillage is pretty good and so is longevity considering it's an EDT, the bottle looks better in real life.

EDIT: just for the record this has come out in Italy already so that's how I got to try it

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: When you need to call Batman you can just use this bottle lol

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: bottle look soooo awfull and cheap....I love regular Guilty bottle, colour, design, but this one look really bad.

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: I disliked Gucci Guilty, really liked Gucci Guilty Intense and I hope to fall in love with Gucci Guilty Black! In my opinion, notes are amazing, I just love spiciness-freshness of top notes, calm sweetness in the middle and spicy warmness of the base notes. Definitely going to try it!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Gucci should stop with all these flankers and so should Burberry!!

product_name: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Femme Gucci
review_content: Gucci you will not stop doing this ?! edt first then Edp daaaah this become so boring now .. stop doing that :(

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Gucci by Gucci was my signature scent for years and I have found nothing that comes close, to the point that I didn't buy any other perfumes for years after it was discontinued. I have since turned into a fragrance enthusiast and wanted my first Fragrantica review to be for this fragrance! I think I discovered it when a salesperson at a department store offered it to me, it wasn't something I sought out. No one note stood out and it just settled into my skin so nicely. Sillage was small, but I didn't spray much and it could be noticed by those who were close to me. I had both the EDT and EDP over the years, but like others I preferred the EDT which had a soft, sweet richness.

I last bought a bottle in 2022, but it was definitely missing something and I have stopped trying to purchase it. It will remain as an old love, and I will continue my fragrance explorations.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: after testing this its soo similar to billionaire boyfriend from kate welsh, but obviously more expensive smelling . in the same family of the more earthy fruitchoulis

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I miss this perfume! Bring it back, Gucci!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I have a vintage bottle that I got at the flea market for $5.00 ! It's tall, ribbed . Black cap that has a gold band. Bottom of the bottle reads "Scannon S.A. " What does that mean ? Smells BEAUTIFUL !

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: The opening is a surprising and fresh green, and I'll be trying more guava perfumes thanks to this experience. The dry down is a basic, cologne-like patchouli musk with some lift from the florals. Moderate sillage. Office safe, meaning you can believably blame the smell if noticed on your lotion or deodorant.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Unlike any perfume I’ve been able to find, I’m so sad it’s discontinued, and I’ve resorted to buying from eBay. Eden perfumes do a similar scent called Bye Goochi, but it’s not quite the same (although the dry down is very very similar, so it will have to do when I can’t source it anymore!).
This is my signature, wear anywhere, any time scent. It matches any outfit, work, date, sleep, it’s sooo versatile. I love the EDP too, but the EDT beats if for me, as the dry down is slightly fresher, both are amazing though and I have back up bottles of both!
I’m not a fan of Gucci in gerneral, I quite like bamboo and once used a bottle of it after a blind buy on a plane, but gucci by Gucci is such a stunning scent, so well put together I don’t even have words to describe how it smells. For those saying it doesn’t last maybe it’s a bit of noseblindness? As although the sillage isn’t huge, this lasts so long on me, I can literally smell it the day after I’ve sprayed it. Love it.
Edit: The day after spraying on skin this has gone, but the EDPis still present as a skin scent. Both last days on clothes.

Edit. Just adding that I’ve bought this perfume regularly since it’s release. There has been no difference between my vintage bottles from the time of release or the newer ones I’ve bought or been gifted in 2018, 2019 and 2020. I’ve bought many, many bottles of this and the EDP, and due to keeping back up bottles I can directly compare different years. These are my signature scent, I would know. All my bottles are stored in the cool and dark.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Ive had this for a while now and I just never managed to fall in love with it. This seems to be the case with the majority of Gucci fragrances for me. They smell nice, sometimes really nice, but tend to fall flat in some aspect. They just come off as soulless and lacking in magic and atmosphere. Its a nice, non-offending scent, but nothing special imo
Btw. This was my dumb reach scent for a while, had a big bottle - I have NEVER received a compliment on this

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Well, Gucci lost it since they let this line go. This perfume is glamour in the bottle. I adore sweet patchouli, woody patchouli, citrusy patchouli, you get it, I adore patchouli. This one is something that smells radiant and fresh but sexy and rich. The most perfected and polite fruity patchouli that uplifts spirit and makes you feel different. You can't go to gym wearing this haha. It requires high heels and smokey eyes at least. I wore it once in freezing London night and it was perfect match. In my opinion Eau de Toilette version is more fragrant and intense than perfumed version.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I just bought this one blind because I love the EDP so much, intending to use this as a base to make my precious bottles of the now discontinued EDP go a bit further. But I discovered I do also enjoy this on its own. Like the EDP mixed with sweet nutty vanilla ice cream, this is lighter and less earthy and just beautiful. Becomes a bit of a skin scent quite quickly, but every now and then I still get a beautiful waft up to my nose as I move.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I've had this fragrance for about a year now, and I had to change my "like" to a "love." At first, the patch was a little difficult for me, but as I have grown in my understanding of perfume, I have learned to appreciate what a gorgeous scent this is! The patch is present throughout the life of the perfume (and it is a long life - longevity is 6-7 hours on my dry skin). The pear lightens and brightens the heavy patch, and gives it a shimmery quality that is feminine and fun. The honey note is sexy and sensual - not cloying or overpowering, but just enough to draw you in. I am heartbroken that this perfume is discontinued, but I will continue to enjoy every last drop of it until it is gone!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I adored this fragrance and was gutted when I heard that it had been discontinued. It's a fruitchouli done right that is meant for a woman. It's brash, sophisticated, and soft. The opening is loud and sweet but transforms into a lovely, memorable, seductive scent. The addition of neroli and lily of the valley make it a touch more romantic than the EDP, but I love them equally. Gucci has not given us anything I've remotely liked since this release. I'm savoring my last bottle.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A bright mature fruitchouli. If Coco Mademoiselle is getting too screechy or not too modern anymore..pick up this Gucci. It's a bit Fuller figured, classier and more refined for a fruitchouli. I'm not the biggest fan of the genre but this is well done. The honey keeps the patchouli from going too cold. A good buy for an all occasion wear.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I just went to buy this on fragrancenet.com and found that they offer an edp version as well as a concentrate spray version. Both of them under the Gucci by Gucci women link. There is NO information on the difference between the two. Does anyone know? Thanks!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I blind bought both the EDP and EDT for good prices, and for the first time, I think I prefer the EDT.

The EDP is a pear/guava-green patchouli moving into honey and musk before being boring and faint after 2 hours. I feel "meh" about it.

The EDT isn't much stronger, but it's brighter and sparkles a bit. The fruit is amped up, a bit juicy. And hot damn-- that honey is delicious. Mmmm.... I think I'm going to really like this... After the burst of juicy fruit, the honey is giving me this foodie-cookie-spicy-creamy vibe. Patchouli is just supporting other notes here.

But, it's been like 5 minutes and I'm losing most of the scent. F**K!

Well, I'll go spray-happy and won't re-purchase. Phoooey.

Seriously, 10 minutes later on tissue... a sweet musk.

With a proper wear, I found out... The whole scent goes thru it's stages in about 20-30 minutes. First blast of juicy fresh fruit, then sweet honey/foodie/creamy flowers, and then musk. Bam. Done.
Sure, the tissue test from yesterday is a faint musk- kinda patchy but musk.
I layered with Britney Believe, and I also think this would layer well with Elie Saabs. Basically, this would layer with almost anything because it's light and disappointing.
Oh well. I grabbed for a steal, bidding style on ebay, and it's authentic.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I had to change my like vote to love, because when I put this on I can't get enough of it. As the weather starts to get hot my other typically sweet perfumes feel too stuffy. This one is sweet but also refreshing in a way that I find addictive on a warm evening. The honeyed pear combined with a crisp white flower and refined patchouli, is modern and classy. I imagine it's something a rich, young, attractive lady would smell like. It's unfortunate that it's sooooo weak. It neither prjects well or lasts long and I find myself spraying like a perfume junkie needing a fix every hour. There are some perfumes where one spray is enough, this isn't one of them.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I risked a Blind Buy with this one and I am very happy. With notes of guava and pear in the top, and patchouli in its base, I guess Gucci by Gucci EDT qualifies as a fruitchouli. This is a very interesting take on the whole fruitchouli trend, and one that I find very classy - unkike, say, La Vié est Belle or Jimmy Choo (not that I don't like those -I actually have them both in my collection), but somehow this one feels more elegant in comparison. It is sweet without being girly and soft without being faint.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
very interesting scent nothing like fragrances out there . long lasting projects like a beast and could easily fill a room .very interesting and classy bottle.
it is somehow suitable for men ."at least for me"
it is discontinued and getting rare have a 30ml and a 75ml sealed and well preserved bottles for those who are interesting.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This is a pretty lighter, more floral sort of younger sister of the EDP version. I smell mostly the guava, pear and musk, with only a vague hint of the patchouli and honey. Still elegant and classy, but not in the big fragrance hit sort of a way. Good for a sunny spring day.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Whenever I wear this, I feel like a classy woman. Empowered, bold and ready to take on the world. Definitely great for night outs.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
It's feminine and distinctive on me. I can clearly feel the patch, also some pear and white flowers.
What i can honestly say, it make me feel like I'm in an old library, kind of has the old books smell on me, which I f***ing adore! Thinking of making this my signature scent just because I love books ;)
P.S.: On my sister smells classy but not with the old books vibe, so this must be my chemistry.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
There was a fragrance from Amway in the "ancient" times, called Ciel de Nuit. This one is soo similar! I had mixed feelings with it and so do I with Gucci EDT, both of them has that medicinal band-aid smell I can't stand. Except this they are bold'n'sweet, warm feminine scents, memorable and quite unique, though Gucci EDT fades too fast.
update: after a year of sniffing my sample and using it up at the end, I bought a small bottle of it and love it!
I consider it as a year-round fragrance as it fits to both warm summer nights and cold winter days. It's sweet but somewhat fresh and juicy at the same time, with just the right amount of patchouli to balance it out. Reminds me a bit of Signorina Eleganza plus the honey note, but this one has way more character. Longevity is also better than thought initially.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I actually prefer this to the EDP which I purchased on the false notion that it would smell the same, only with lasting power. The EDT was heady and beautiful -until six hours later when it disappeared ENTIRELY. The scent was altered also. The EDT is somewhat of a hybrid between the Gucci Flora EDT and the Gucci Gucci EDP. Often fragrance companies will slightly alter an EDT for marketing purposes and, yes, that has so happened here. Same scent but different.

I wish I'd bought the EDT and will pick one up to layer over the EDP in an attempt to try to retain the fragrance for longer!

On another note, I have tested all of the Gucci fragrances and will say I really like the way that they complement each other. There's somewhat of a continuum of scent between them which creates a lovely wardrobe of fragrances.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Tested it several times and everytime I couldn't figure the feminine aspect . It is really unique but it seems very masculine to me no offend to women who like it , only my nose gets that..UPDATE now after about 6 years I totally appreciate these kinds of perfumes that has some musculine vibe. They aren't boring such as very soft feminine perfumes .It is really strange how our taste change and grow, I kept looking at the review in astonishment that I hated this perfume one day. Now it is one of my favourites.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This is a very deep and rich scent. Honeyed patchouli, white flowers, darkly sweet fruits and musk. I get every note of this one.

It's not loud. It's a thick and hazy bubble of scent that sticks close to you, but projects enough so that anyone in your personal space will be able to smell you.

This is quite nice, but not as powerful as I was hoping for. I'll definitely use it up, but I think I may try on the edp and see if that has the personality I was hoping for.

All in all, this is a wonderful fragrance, makes me yearn for crisp fall air to pair it with.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I bought this by mistake, I thought it was the Gucci 2. I really am not a fan of it. I smell way to much patchouli and it lasts. It makes me a little sick and its a shame because I hoped I would like it.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Overwhemlming and defintely not for me, I cannot stand the scent, too much alcohol and not any of the patcholi or musk.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I fell in love with this perfume almost instantly; I received my full bottle yesterday. I was searching for a new fragrance to replace my old signature - Coco Mademoiselle - and while I love that one I wanted something still sophisticated but a little more "fun" I suppose.. This perfume is perfection. When you first spray it it is quite in-your-face patchouli (which I personally love) but then as it dries it settles down into this wonderful blend of sweetness and honey with the patchouli taking a back seat. The guava and pear are not tropical at all, just blending with the honey to make a sheer sweetness. It smells classy and elegant but also playful and feminine with the lily and neroli appearing as it starts to fade. It unfortunately only lasts for a couple of hours on my skin but I enjoy it so much that I don't mind having to re-spray.. It just means I get to smell the wonderful progression of this perfume over and over again throughout the day. It screams luxury but in a modern, youthful way. I feel confident and know I smell amazing when I wear this. Best blind buy I have ever made, and my new signature. <3

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This perfume has grown on me - it has more to it the its fruity, sweet, happy face displays.
Give it som time and it will blend into a delightfull fragrance.
Golden honey lingers trough all faces and guava gives it a special fruity kick.
Special enought to be someones signature.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I just recently purchased this as a blind buy and I regret it. It smells really pretty after the dry down but as soon as I sprayed it I instantly got a headache. I think it's the insane amount of patchouli at first spray. This will not be worn anywhere near my nose. I'll save it for the lower half of my body.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: It smells like men's perfume, I really don't feel comfortable wearing it at all. I use it as an air freshener instead of perfume, thank god it was a gift.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I have grown to love this one! Perfect combination of fruit & spiciness. If you are thinking of purchasing this or the EDP I would recommend giving this one a try first considering like I said I grew to like this one because that first spray was a little in your face, not a bad in your face like "old lady" just much stronger than I thought but I judged it wrong the dry down really softens up and leaves behind a beautiful sensual fragrance. I can't wait to wear this in winter I think it is a classic! I was getting into a cab not too long ago and the polite driver told me "you smell wonderful, its too bad not too many women wear perfume anymore" SO TRUE

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I hope this won't be discontinued or reformulated or whatever done on it. I see Gucci tends to be way too commercial last few years and takes out everything whats good but replaces with something average.
This is beautiful patchouli based perfume. Smells like rich woman :)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: The patchouli softens after just a few minutes and the fruit notes are very mellow and sophisticated. The honey stands out on my skin and I love it. The EDP was a little too dirty for me, this one is just perfect.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Gucci edt by Gucci is a modern chypre floral with notes of guava, pear, and patchouli taking the center stage.
The guava in it is elegant and cold, nothing tropical about it. The patchouli is light and refreshing and looses its bitterness when paired with pears and honey. I find that most perfumes by gucci share a sharp metallic note in the opening that doesn't agree with me. This one has it too, but it mellows down and softens once it has warmed up on my skin. Honeyed pear and florals gives it a clean, modern twist which smells luxurious. I can imagine rich spoiled women, wives of arabian oil tycoons spritzing themselves with this scent on their way to the mall for yet another shopping spree.  Reserved and snooty, this is how the rich smell like :)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: It goes slightly horrifying on my skin. This is a blind buy and a very wrong one. I thought that I would love it judging just by the notes, but helas! I made a mistake. At the beginning all I can smell is a slightly rotten fruit note and some fishy background. It is very powerful for about half an hour, then it tones down, luckily, to something lightly woody and pleasant, I guess the beeswax note is quite prominent in the end and it is actually the only thing I like. It is definitely not a fragrance for me, I don't have the guts to undergo the unpleasant notes you get at the beginning waiting for it to tone down and become nice. I'm afraid this is not a keeper...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I bought it few days ago on an online shop, without smelling the scents.Just by reading the review. First application was about overpowering, though the scent isnt too strong. But few hours later, it turns out to be a light and soft smell.. This reminds me a bit of burberry brits sheer..
Unfortunately, the longevity is too weak.. it only lasts for about 3hours. you have to spray it on and on to make it lasts...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I bought it few days ago on an online shop, without smelling the scents.Just by reading the review. First application was about overpowering, though the scent isnt too strong. But few hours later, it turns out to be a light and soft smell.. This reminds me a bit of burberry brits sheer..
Unfortunately, the longevity is too weak.. it only lasts for about 3hours. you have to spray it on and on to make it lasts...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: It's pretty and pretty elegant, inoffensive, clean, nicer than the EDP version (which I find a trifle simple) forgettable, especially with its abysmal staying power! Ridiculous - I can barely trace a hint of this fragrance after an hour. And it's basically patchouli with some fruity freshness - there are much better options in the same vein out there.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
It took me a while to work out what this reminded me of, since I knew it was too unique to be similar to any fragrance I know. Musk flavoured life savers! This is very nice. A shame it fades quite quickly. But I must note it does pop back out if u get sweaty, and I get joy from giving myself a fresh spray. But since it is not very cheap it's not something I want to have to do.

Fragrance - 7/10

Longevity - 3/10

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Sweet notes of White flowers.
Soft honey and hints of fruit.
After the drydown subtle notes of musk.
Silage is soft to moderate and longevity poor to weak.
In One Sentence - Sweet and Soft Flowerhoney.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I love to smell like this !
Since I am helplessly in love with the edP, i figure I would love this too and will be able to use it on a everyday bases. This is for sure a runner up for the edP, same fantastic pear, guava tiare ,patch honey and musc mix. The tiare is not as strong here as together with neroli and lily of the valley iis forming the middle note. .This will be great if you think of the edP , as too much for you.in summertime The edP is deeper creamier and a little more of a deep intense version.The stayingpower lacks some from the edP but it stays with you a long time.
I love this as well as the edP !

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Reminds me of falling leaves and leather. I just love it. Wish it lasted longer, though.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Perfect for a cruel Russian winter! Cozy and very warm, delicious like a pear jam!
A perfect duet with my skin.

However I don't think it's sexy one, it sounds just cozy on me, mainly pears + honey... yamy-yamy!

Before this winter I used to think that this very perfume will suit only women over 40...
But that's not true and I'm happy.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Maybe it´s the combination of patchouli and pear - i smell blueberry yoghurt in it.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Sexy, sensual, deep floral. I say 'deep' floral because the patchouli and musk are ever present. You have to love patchouli to enjoy this one.

There's something a bit mysterious about this fragrance, it smells rich and luxurious. Lovely stuff. Sillage is very good.

More beautiful and easier to wear than the EDP version.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: It's very sexy and powerful !! Indeed,it is my Favorited perfume of all i have. Most suitable for dinner and hang out with friends. But,make sure don't spray it too over. Just 2 spray is enough. I just love it!!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This fragrance smells lighter than the edp version of Gucci by Gucci, but the musk and pear notes are still the most noticeable. I prefer the edp version to it, because I usually like more intensive fragrances.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Was a present from my ex . Its so wonderful smelling so feminine and classy,its still lingers in my mind, totally I LOVE IT <3

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Soft, sensual, seductive and cozy at the same time, and very feminine. I love Gucci by Gucci! This fragrance can be worn in the day time as well as at night, and good for cold or hot weather.
One negative point though: it doesn't last more than 2-3 hours on me.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: it makes me want to sneeze every time i smell it.too pungent for me. however, i dont know why but i'm still attracted by this perfum.it's just..unique,luxurious,strong but also feminine, and a little bit..mysterious.i quite like it but it wont be my choice:d

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: The very moment the first note of it got to my nose i gave me a short-lasting headache, wich is A VERY GOOD SIGN, for me. You`ll think i`m crazy, but by this first-sniff headache i can already predict that i`ll like the perfume. I love intoxicating fragrances. This one is inteligent, young, joyfull, i made me instantly think of a sunny afternoon at the amusement park and of colorful balloons ! I kept having that image coming back again and again in my mind everytime i sniffed my arm. It reminds me of another fume i cant recall right now, or of someone who used it consistently during my teens, cause it`s very familiar to me... Oh, and I smelled clearly a strong chilly pepper right after spraying, did it happen to someone else?

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
O-M-G !!!! Just received it today… I am IN LOVE! Absolutely beautiful fragrance that lasts a very, very long time… Sweet, yet not too sweet, fresh, intoxicating, super sexy.
Cannot wait to wear it again tomorrow!!!!!!
Gucci by Gucci EDT is my new fave!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I got the original but EDT is lighter, very floral that make you feel elegant, dark and enchant. Really nice but for me EDP so perfect both of scent and vintage style bottle. Not purchase for this. Continue for EDP. Love at first spray.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: My Aunt wears this & it smells so nice! It's very fruity, sweet & sophisticated. It's uber light & chic. Perfect for the playful & stylish woman who wants a fresh yet alluring scent.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Many perfumes which have patchouli as the dominant note do not agree with me at all, but Gucci EDT certainly does. I prefer it to the EDP version, its definitely my favourite Gucci frag. I notice that some reviewers have complained about the lasting power but I find it very good, so far 7 hours and its only just beginning to fade.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
It's better than edp version, there are times I like it and there are times I don't. It has the Gucci note all perfums by Gucci have, something acid-like and irritating me. Notes I can sniff the most are guava, pear, patchouli.

Gucci brings a spohisticated, posh woman to my mind. Some of Gucci's fragrances create an imagination of a mean one, too. I can't help it... Gucci isn't a brand I particularly like, though I must admit Gucci by Gucci has something interesting in itself, just not trully suits me.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I find this scent very similar to Dolce and Gabbana classic (in flame-red case Velvet)
So strong, suffocating and overwhelming.
Women should be careful with this one, just a little bit is enough to tell the world that you're wearing it.
I don't like it but my sister does and I'm getting the idea that this winter she will use it a lot =(

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
I think this is more a chypre fruity/floral. I like it much better than the EDP, which I found too heavy and sweet. This is a little cleaner, still not what I would call light but it does wear off relatively quickly. Complex enough to have some character; a nice change from fruity florals if you want something a bit more sophisticated. I think I'll carry a small decant in my purse to reapply next time I wear this one.
Have to add that I think the bottle is absolutely adorable!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
it smells rich and sophisticated . This perfume reminds me a woman with high heels with very chic black dress and red lips and white pearls on her neck.
I agree that is the new Channel no.5 . I just looooveee it

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: clean , light fragrance .. i like it , but i'm not going to buy it because nothing is so special in this parfum

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Beautiful perfume I love to smell the simply gorgeous blend of musk, guava/pear and patchouli over and over, but it fades so quickly wish it had some lasting power on me.

Edit: I’ve noticed after some uses now that it doesn’t so much as fade away quickly, as it just becomes a close to the skin scent. I love it still.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: more fruity than floral,nice,sweet,feminine...weareble,is similar to Believe of britney spears...may be for the guava?

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
At the beginning it was very heavy for me, a bit oriental and even slightly masculine so I did not like it at all. After about 30 minutes it softened and the unbearable (at least for me) heaviness turned into a much lighter fruity sweetness which soon started to mix with gentle floral notes. Not so unpleasant any more but I must admit that for me this fragrance lacks the wow-factor. I do not think it is badly composed but for some reason it smells like something I know way too well. Maybe I just smell it on too many people on the street or there really is something very similar.
In general not a bad fragrance but it is too predictable for me and my nose is not very impressed.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Very, very shy and generic. At the opening I can feel fruits, mostly pear, there is some "flowery" feeling and I think I can detect some shy rose, even if it's not listed. Honeysuckle is there, but very shy and almost unnoticable, only giving some sweet honey-like accord. For me there is some masculine patchoulli, but as with other notes - barely there.
What can I say?
Well. It's a crowd pleaser, could be gifted to almost every bussiness woman who needs an office scent.

And what do I dislike? That it's generic, almost resembles every fruity floral, patchoulli just saves the day. And don't call it a "chypre", just because of patchoulli added.

Anyway - I'm not saying it's bad, it's just too...everyday.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This smells the same as the brown gucci to me but stays on even less time!! I have the brown one which to me is a deeper more complicated version of Rush. I have the edp and it just will not stay on. I have to spray a mist of it on my clothes then it stays for days. There seems to be a few perfumes out at the moment which smell similar to this. Sarah Jessica Parker Lovely, Elle YSL, Signature Story by Beckham, Stella in two. Elizabeth Arden Red Door Velvet. Not the same but similar sweet dark musky smell.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: i believe is the new chanel 5, i find it classy but in a new modern way. very feninine, chic, strong and attractive

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A rather run of the mill modern musky floral. I also get notes of hairspray, but that might just be me. It's not bad, but it's not different enough to draw my attention. A good middle-of-the-road scent, I'd say, but I don't wear my fragrance to be middle of the road so much as to evoke mood or atmosphere. This has neither.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: This fragrance really works for my skin chemistry. I love the sweet, fruity top notes and the orange flower in the heart. The patchouli in the base both sweetens and sharpens this scent. The style of the composition reminds me a bit of Miss Dior Cherie, although this fragrance feels more like it's made for a woman than a girl.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: I found it as very elegant fragrance.Strangely the lasting power on my skin is very good (saying strangely because most of the reviewers said that is really poor).Does smell fresh and floral but I do find some musky touch as well.So it really as described above.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: really like this fragerance although it doesnt last very long love the bottle with the bronzy pinkish lid and little charm :)

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Gucci needs to step their game up with this fragrance,I can barely smell it and then it wares off quickly. I do like the bottle and that is the reason I won't return it other than that I don't know about this scent. I got mine at Marshalls $22.00 for a 1.7 oz on discount. Good deal? If it lasted I guess!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Another love at first sniff! Gucci by Gucci EDT has a little of that wonderful something I had already found and loved in Prada Infusion D'Iris and Chanel Coco. I'm not sure what that is, but if it's in a scent, I almost always love it. Orange blossom, perhaps?

At any rate, the Gucci is a beautiful example of a modern chypre floral. In spite of those fruity top notes, the fragrance is not really fruity on my skin. I think those fruits just soften the flowers a little bit. There's a faint whisper of sweetness, but nothing too juicy. The EDT gets to the dry-down pretty quickly and stays there for hours. I found this fragrance to have decent longevity in this concentration, but it stayed very close to the skin all day. I may seek out the EDP for what I hope will be a little more "oomph."

The comparisons to Narciso Rodriguez are fair, but I think NR has more of a "head shop egyptian musk" vibe. Gucci has a bit more complexity to my nose. Ahh! One more for the wishlist!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A lot less musky and powerful than NR. Soft wood and a hint of toffee-like sweetness. Very easy to wear, a new favourite for every day use. Lasts almost from 9 to 5.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Well let that be a lesson to me never to trust an EDT again. Gucci smells so sophisticated, such a glorious change from rice pudding with chocolate or liquorice or ginger or whatever the latest gourmand fad is.

This Gucci scent holds fruit without syrup and flowers without chintz; I detect an element of honey, subdued and elegant, in the background. Within 10 minutes this had vanished without trace from my skin. Here's hoping the EDP keeps the pleasure longer, or I'm just going to have to walk on by...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
compare Chanel No.5 and Gucci By gucci for woman...
i will choose Gucci by gucci for my lovely mother...

the bottle look very class...it smell so outstanding...is awesome...

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
Gucci by Gucci edt truly expresses the famous and luxurious Gucci-feeling.
It is modern but still very conventional in a positive way which I really like about it.
I find this creation sublime and once again luxurious, none the less I am not a head-to-toe Gucci girl.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: My Mum wears this perfume and it smells excellent on her. However I don't think that it smells that good on me. I mean I don't dislike it it's a really sweet and delicious scent. But it dosen't really speak to me.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content:
This one goes right to the top of my wishlist! Light, fresh and so fruity it makes my mouth water, but still not too sweet. If they made Gucci by Gucci candy, I'd eat it!

ETA: IT'S MINE! I've worn it for the past two weeks or so, and I'm seriously considering marrying this scent and having its babies. Even on the crappiest of Monday mornings, it perks me up and makes me feel a lot less bleary. True love in a bottle!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: A truly unforgettable scent! On first application to my skin I was a little turned off as the opening notes were just a blur of strong and too strong but after about 5mins I couldnt believe what i was inhaling! It was warm yet light, sweet and yet slightly bitter. Fresh and fun. Awesome fragnance! Worth the money!! It lasts long too!

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: Lovely, really wearable as an every day scent. Seemed to be very short lasting, but I love it anyway, I just have to put it on more often throughout the day.

product_name: Gucci by Gucci Eau de Toilette Gucci
review_content: its better than the the eau the parfum, its feminine and interesting

Very early 2000s... sooo much peony. Someone gifted it to my sister's friend, who didn't like it and gave it to her, and eventually she passed it onto me. It's a very nostalgic scent. It smells great - fruity, juicy and floral. The only problem is I had to get rid of it because I couldn't stop sneezing from all the peony. Very sad! I wish I still had this/didn't seem to have some kind of weird allergy to it.
ابيههههه الذوق كان منحط ايام الثانوية

I FEEL LIKE I'M A 2000s GIRLY POP updating my blogs while having posters of Britney Spears and Kesha on my bedroom wall. So you might have already noticed that I'm trying to say this fragrance is old-fashioned and it's such a cliche one from those years. But do I like it? Sure. Would I recommend it for everyone? HELL NO.
This fragrance is not for everyone, but it's mostly for people who adore nostalgia and have a thing for it, so if you prefer modern and minimalist perfumes like Gucci Flora series this might not be yours. This perfume takes you on a journey of different fragrances; now some might love this, and others hate it. That's why I recommend you try a sample before buying a full bottle. In the end, the fragrance is fruity and so juicy with a delightful touch of floral scent, but IMO mostly fruity. It's not modest at all, and it's not going there either, especially first notes, so if you've got a sensitive nose, this one might give you a great headache. Even though it's a strong fragrance, yet it's suitable for both daily and occasional usage, and it's not bothering for people around you and it's a good one for almost every season.

I love this! Rose and peony/freesia with a bit of tea and musk. Smells like a fancy fabric softener. This reminds me very much of Adidas Adrenaline for women, and a Victoria Secret perfume called Bombshells in Bloom. And maybe even Clinique Happy in Bloom 2014.

Smells like a combo of hairspray,deodorant,lip gloss and body lotion.Very floral and powdery with a hint of sweetness.
I dont like it but its nostalgic.
Gosh I miss this and the original Gucci guilty women’s perfume! Why do they discontinue their best perfumes !

I remember loving this in the 00s. Today I got a whiff of Super Moon by Carner Barcelona and the scent was sooo familiar but I could not place it initially. However I suddenly recalled Envy Me and I am fairly certain that it was the reason for the familiarity. If you love Envy Me I highly recommend you to check out Super Moon!

Mousuf Daisy is the exact dupe of this!!!!!!! This is my highschool scent and I've been looking for it high and low.

Get Mousuf Daisy peeps im telling you!!! It's identical!!!
Mysterious and sexy. Does anyone have a sample they can sell? The full bottles are so expensive on ebay and I loved this perfume but discontinued.
I bought this bottle in my 20’s when it first released. I’m now 41 and I found it!! It’s 20 years old and it still smells absolutely stunning!!
They need to bring it back!

This is one of my Favorite fragrance EVER! Finding a replacement seems to be impossible! I’m so 💔 Please if anyone sees this and can recommend a dupe or something extremely close it would be immensely appreciated!! The fragrances listed above as similar for Gucci Envy Me in my opinion is not accurate at all. Thanks in advance 🤞🏼🙏🏼😊
Still crying everyday that this is gone *sniff*

I used to love this when I was a teen. Lovely, fresh, juicy, good-vibe, and youthful scent for the spring and summer. It's definitely a day aroma, but I could also imagine it on a nice summer evening, for example, for a walk on the beach. Imo it's more of a sweet light floral than fruity. I don't detect any tobacco or musk. The big surprise is how durable it is - solid 8+ hours on my skin and hair, and even more on clothes, which is very unusual for a floral fresh scent. It brings back memories, so I like it, but even if it were still available, I wouldn't wear it regularly - I'm turning 36 soon, and this perfume just feels inappropriate and unserious for a mature lady. Luckily, I have found a very cheap dupe (7 euros!) that is stunningly similar and just as durable as the original. It's a Turkish brand called Sansiro. This dupe, of course, I keep in my collection and use it whenever I am in a girly, nostalgic mood.

I used to love the original Gucci Envy. My mum brought me a bottle of Envy Me in error and I didn't really like it but i kept it anyway because it was from my mum. I wasnt even aware back then that Gucci was a designer scent. I'm so glad I kept hold of it as I recently re tried it and I love it! So weird how our tastes change over the years isnt it! I've had that 50ml bottle since around 2005 and it's still as good as the day I got it, although I try to use it sparingly as it's not available anymore.
Such a shame Gucci Envy and Envy Me got discontinued

Fruity teas and fresh cut floral bouquets. This scent definitely gives me nostalgia for the early 2000s. It's bright and fresh, but not super light, it's more heady, rich, syrupy fruits and punchy flowers. A happy go lucky, confident, and beautiful woman well dressed in hot pink is who I picture wearing this scent. It'd work as a flirty date scent, and I think it would work in the daytime or evening and year round.

So sad that it discontinued…
It had been my all time favorite since when I was early 20s.
Ran out the last bottle I had and had to find something new. Settled with YSL Mon Paris for some reason. It’s way sweeter but I kinda like it. But I really wish they bring it back someday.
And like the other review said, Divain 154 is very very similar like almost 95% I would say. Top to middle is exactly the same but it dries down on my skin a little differently. It doesn’t last that long like Envy Me did, but it was like $25, so overall I’m very happy with that and it was a great purchase!

It's one of my all-time favorite old-school vibe perfume. I so much love the rose-mixed floral vibe of this. I did a review about this for my Zest Girls YT channel. I highly recommend this for a sensual romantic date night.

It is fresh and clean, on me it lasts an hour, pleasant and easy reach, had to respray throughout the day. I’m not a fan of peony at all😐Unfortunately I couldn’t smell any of the drydown notes except a light musk. There are better freshies out there, just get Ocean di Gioia

Hey perfume lovers! I finally find a dupe for this beauty.. it was really hard :D divainparfums.com has got the No. 154 which is more than 90% similar to Envy me. I recieved it yesterday and since than i'm just floating on nostalgia's cloud. It was my early 20s favourite scent.... the performance is good about 4-5 hours maybe more but i think is enough :) i'm really grateful for the experience <3
I wish they will bring this back.. my 1st designer perfume. So many memories with this scent. It smells really good in summer. Nothing ever smells like this perfume.

Definitely not getting most of the notes, but it is a fresh (not green) smelling beauty. I don’t love the scent of roses, but in this one I really like it. Do not overspray because this might be too much. Soft, girly, fresh, flirty.
To me this is an early 2000's version of a designer equivalent to Delina perfume without the middle eastern notes.

Pleasant but not groundbreaking. I was actually surprised when I looked at the notes... I definitely don't detect the tobacco in this, nor would I expect it to be part of the composition of a fragrance like this.

Envy Me is a bright, buoyant, feminine fragrance for spring. It is a happy and uplifting scent that is uncomplicated and projects a youthful, carefree essence.

The opening is fresh, fruity and floral. "Juicy" is how I would describe it. On me, the drydown leans heavily into the rose notes. This is not a fragrance with much projection, unfortunately. If you really want to project that happy, carefree, girly energy throughout your day, you may need to keep spraying this!
honestly it smells like a mix of sky di gioia and versace bright crystal it has a strong peony note and is fresh, not my cup of tea but it is nice and clean fragrance

This perfume smells exactly like Lehcaresor Rose Papier Poudre (powdered blotting paper) that my grandma used. This is more floral than fruity. I can barely smell the other fruity notes which is quite disappointing. It gives a linear scent because the rose and base notes are prominent all throughout. No matter how many times I smell it on my skin, clothes or bottle, I am hit with a dried roses bouquet or potpourri smell. It is heavier on the floral and also has a sharp, citrus scent probably from the pineapple. If you're a fan of rose scents then you might enjoy this.

i got one many years ago for my wife when we happens to see this on a fragrance roadshow. it was quite a new fragrance then. being an asian, i find it familiar and different to other fragrance at the roadshow. recently i stumble on this webby and i realise why we choose this.
It’s a simple fragrance but beautiful and fresh. Not heavy. Just a perfect sunny days perfume. It dries down beautifully too.

This perfume smells like a classy lady who knows what she wants and how to get it.
I heard this one is discontinued and I happen to have an unopened bottle manufactured in 11/2018, I live in Thailand and is happy to do international shipping :)
Rose and Peony stuff, but in a green, fresh, full of light and energy way. One of my favorites.
This was definently top 5 in the gucci family to me. They always discontinue the great. This is nice fruity floral for any occasion.

I coveted this perfume as a teen and would always spray it when going into Ulta or Sephora. It's sexy and flirty without being gourmand or vanilla. Upbeat and coquettish. I mainly smell the pink pepper, lychee, and peony with some musk. I love it and think it adds to any collection, the only downside is it being hard to find. It's one of the only fruitier leaning perfumes I like.

I was searching for a woman perfume and i came across clone of this perfume, first sniff and i loved it. If you are in dubai search for spectra no. 228, it is eau de perfume and bottle also looks same. Spectra makes clone of famous perfumes and bottles. It's cheap and long lasting.

I first smelled this on someone else back in the day, didn't like it. She over-sprayed it, years later I tried it on me and i fell in love! Now been looking for it but sadly discontinued (i got stock up of 2 bottles and still searching for it)

For scent, to me it opens up sharp floral which i don't like that much but once it settles/dried down, my god i can't stop smelling myself! This perfume lasts on me quite nice at the end of the day i still can smell from my cloth but i gotta be close it to it though. Family and friends say at the end of the day they still can smell a very soft and light touch of it when i walk by.
It's a nice floral combination soft vibes with love

It makes me really happy when I can actually leave a helpful review.
This smells like new glossy beauty magazine pages and some peony. Nice and fresh scent.
You are welcome :D
P. S. In the very base after many hours of wear it starts to smell like Gucci Rush 2, which I don't like, but it's ok since it's at the very end.

I was really excited about this scent and I do like it, however, the first sniff was all sweet soap. That pink pepper is no joke, the opening is like a spicy peony slapped me. The dry down though, excellent. It becomes this delicious gently sweet almost skin scent that I love. The aggressive opening doesn't last long thank god or I would regret getting it. I would say, if you are looking for a nonspicy floral, don't get this one.

It's definitely a nice floral scent and I like it, but I don't love it. Unfortunately it's just a bit too much peony and the lychee doesn't help! This one makes me sneeze every time! Pretty scent, but irritates my nose and reminds me of hayfever season.

You'll definitely find similarities in Versace Bright Crystal Absolu. I received my bottle of Versace and couldn't quite put my finger on the perfume that I had definitely smelled before. This is it. The pepper in Envy Me is very noticeable on me and the fruit is more tame than other fruity florals. This scent has a confident, edgy yet feminine feel if you could describe perfumes as a personality.

Ok, OK...I understand why some reviewers write this off as a typical fruity-floral frag, BUT...my sensitive sniffer picks up a lot of nuance in this. The opening brings lots of fruity-ness, but its across the spectrum from aquatic-juicy (litchi) to tangy and tropical (peach, pineapple), and it's all zipped up with the zesty pink pepper. In the middle is probably where Envy Me loses some people, it is a very classic peony-rose scent there. As the drydown unfolds, however, I get so much WHITE TEA peeking through the flowers and fruits, ahhh it's GLORIOUS! I love tea notes in perfume, especially white tea. Here, it melds wonderfully with the pineapple, musk, and woods notes. I can't get enough of the drydown. I came back to this perfume after not having sniffed it in about 15 years. It is as refreshing and enchanting as ever!

I'll always have an appreciation for this perfume because it was given to me by my dad. My bottle is almost done and I am so sad.

I think it's a very pleasant, light, a bit fresh, a bit fruity, elegant but fun floral perfume.

Very enjoyable smell. I think it's complex and sophisticated enough to wear as a signature scent. I don't think anyone would have a problem with smelling this on somebody else, I think it's very likeable.

And if I smell this on you... I WILL envy you! 👿

Gosh, I really miss this scent y'all. I remember it was a gift from an ex that at first caught me off guard... I remember thinking the scent was odd_ too sharp and cold for me. At the time, I was always wearing Ralph and enjoyed that fruity and musky vibe. This was floral and peppery. So strange, and just not my style. However, I saw it was Gucci so I kept wearing it lol. I don't know at what point I decided I liked it, but I finished the huge bottle and was so sad when it was gone. I miss that scent, and feel that I could recognize it anywhere. Beyond sad it has been discontinued. Does anyone know where I could find a good dupe? Anyway, I miss this rose, pepper weirdo perfume, and it will always be one of my favorites. So fresh, chic and feminine :)

This is a truly beautiful, unique and complex composition. It is a fruity tobacco rose, so very juicy and extraordinary. Some things, like some perfumes, have just something about them, something you cannot put your finger on, a little something so alluring, so magnetic, so......... I do not have the proper words for Envy Me. It is the most beautiful romantic take on rose.

I remember the first time I tried 'Envy Me', on dry down it smelt like a beautiful medley of several flowers with rose, tuberose, marigold, magnolia, peony, jasmine, tagetes etc. irrespective of whether these notes are actually present or not. It also gave me the feeling of something just a tad bit like Dune, but if Dune was white gold, Envy Me was rose gold. We offer flowers at God's altar as a custom, and G-EM reminded me it. Also after drying down, it reminded me of the scent of a Sunsilk shampoo in the 90s with a silver shimmer and beautiful mauve / lavendar colour. But of late, I tried it, it felt like the petals were plucked out and whatever remained of it. Some people say its a meh scent, but I know it WAS NOT meh from what I recollect. I think the formula has changed several times to mimic popular perfumes. Such a metamorphosis in the formula in keeping up with the times, but I still miss that beautiful scent of old that is still fresh in my memory.
Very strong, straightforward peony/rose scent. I honestly barely get any fruity notes. Isn't particularly strong, but if you overspray it will be prominent all day.

A favorite perfume that stands out from its fellow perfumes in the Gucci lines. It’s a best seller perfume perfect for schools or hanging out with friends. A girly perfume for younger women. A safe bet for nice high school girls.

This is one fresh and energetic fragrance that never fails to draw in the compliments! I first received my first bottle as a gift from my cousin. When I finished the bottle, I decided that I loved it enough to purchase a large bottle for myself. This fragrance is cheeky, youthful and full of spunk! Suitable for 20-something women on the go, but I still love it today as a 30-something woman still on the go ;).

My first time wearing this I HATED it, but either my nose, tastes, or body chemistry has changed, because I tried it again today on a lark and have to say I'm enjoying it.The first time I tried it I thought it was a really immature, fake-fruity scent. Even the drydown smelled soapy to me. I do still find the top notes overwhelmingly synthetic and I don't really get any florals out of it, but it's a very fresh/clean smell, and since I was just out of the shower, it worked for me today. I noticed as I was driving that the warmer I got, the more whiffs of really fresh soapy smell I got. Like a fresh shampoo kind of smell (I hadn't washed my hair, though). About two hours later, I got a nice berry scent from my wrists, which was unexpected but really pleasant. I assume that was the lychee coming through. Finally, the drydown came out as a subtly sweet, gently musky scent. I didn't get any sandalwood, but musk and tonka beans seems about right.

I'm really glad a gave Envy Me another shot, I was about to get rid of my bottle. But the complexity and character of this will keep my trying it for a while.

...
...
Ho il cuore a posto quando penso a te
Mi si riallineano le stelle in cielo
Ti tengo sempre dentro di me
Nell'orizzonte in primo piano

(Eros R. In Primo Piano)

Subtle and discreet charm. An unforgettable love, for me.

I love this fragrance! I first bought it during a crazed collecting phase when I had run out of interesting ideas and saw this sitting on a shelf at a discount store.
